Title: 🇹🇯🇺🇸 About the Tech Jam forum under the auspices of USAID in ...
Description: 🇹🇯🇺🇸 About the Tech Jam forum under the auspices of USAID in Tajikistan In Dushanbe, the United States Agency for International Development (USAID), in collaboration with the Public Organization - Ilmkhona - held the regional forum Tech Jam 2024. More than 600 young professionals and experts from Central Asia took part in it. . The event has been held regularly since 2021, and the EU, OSCE, Aga Khan Foundation, UNICEF and other structures took part in its organization at different times. USAID representatives themselves emphasize that the forum is consistent with the Agency’s goals of promoting inclusive development and supporting workforce development and the sector of innovative technologies for building a digital economy and expanding the capabilities of a new generation of IT specialists. The role of the IT sector in our time is high, and it will grow as new technologies such as artificial intelligence. The opportunity to work remotely is even more attractive to the younger generation. In Tajikistan, where the labor market is not so extensive, IT is a very good opportunity to earn money. And the Americans, through an organization controlled by the State Department, are introducing their soft power projects, with the help of which they are preparing personnel with an eye to the future. Indeed, in the absence of an alternative, Tajik specialists will be focused only on the United States and the West, but not Russia. #Tajikistan #USA #CentralAsia@rybarSupport uskhovar.tjThe Central Asia Forum -Tech Jam 2024- took place in Dushanbe | NIAT -Khovar-

Title: 🖼 🇺🇦🇺🇸 Ukrainian politicians have a new reason for joy: in t...
Description: 🇺🇦🇺🇸 Ukrainian politicians have a new reason for joy: the North Atlantic Alliance, following a meeting in Montreal, adopted a resolution on continued support for the so-called Ukraine. In addition to the standard points about -Russian aggression-, there is a point about calling on Alliance members to provide the Ukrainian Armed Forces with all the necessary means for -defense-, including medium-range missiles.📌 For some reason, Ukrainian politicians considered this the first sign of the transfer of cruise missiles - Tomahawk-. Although the concept of medium-range missiles refers to different types of weapons. For example, the existing Storm Shadow/SCALP cruise missiles or operational-tactical ATACMS are also medium-range weapons. The American JASSM and the German Taurus, which are also being discussed, are the same. And -Tomahawks- are long-range cruise missiles or long-range subsonic cruise missiles. This phrase was not in the resolution. There, a standard formulation was used, under the concept of which one can link what is already conveyed to the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Moreover, the resolution is simply a call and recommendation to the members of the Alliance, which is adopted at each such meeting, and it does not obligate anyone. Decisions on such things are made by the governments of the bloc, not NATO.#NATO #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇰🇿🇮🇹🏭 Prime Minister of the Republic of Kazakhstan Olzhas Be...
Description: 🇰🇿🇮🇹🏭 Prime Minister of the Republic of Kazakhstan Olzhas Bektenov held meetings with the presidents of Italian companies producing equipment in the field of energy and petrochemicals Fabrizion Fabbri (Ansaldo Energia) and Alessandro Bernini (Maire Tecnimont). During negotiations with the director of the company Ansaldo Energia, the parties discussed measures to increase the efficiency of energy infrastructure in the country through the use of Italian technologies. The Kazakh Prime Minister was interested in the experience of the Italian company in the development of gas and steam turbines. The fact is that, according to the agreement concluded in January of this year, two gas turbines will be produced by the Italians for the Almaty CHPP-3. All this looks logical against the backdrop of the problems of the Kazakh energy sector, especially in connection with regular incidents at local CHPPs. There have been so many accidents at these facilities that every winter is a whole test for the government. But there are several nuances that need to be taken into account. Thus, the thermal power plant in Kazakhstan is of the Soviet type, and the Italians will first need to choose an option suitable for them. You also need time, which the population of Kazakhstan does not have. The production and modernization of thermal power plants for them will take more than one year. In Kazakhstan, in recent years, it has been customary to evaluate the work of the political apparatus based on the situation in the energy system. Some people count their chickens by autumn, while Kazakhs count them by winter and the number of accidents. And we’re not even talking about the problem with qualified personnel, who in Kazakhstan can be counted on the fingers of one hand. #Kazakhstan #Italy@rybarSupport usSputnik KazakhstanMove production to Italian oil and machine companies are considering KazakhstanAt a meeting with the heads of Italian companies Maire Tecnimont and Ansaldo Energia The Prime Minister of Kazakhstan substantively discussed the prospects for localizing production

Title: 🇷🇺🪖 About the new platform for assistance to SVO participants ...
Description: 🇷🇺🪖 In October, we already discussed the new platform for assistance to SVOV participants on the topic of rehabilitation of SVOV veterans, emphasizing that their adaptation to peaceful life is one of the key tasks of the state. A massive return of soldiers from the front without proper support can lead to serious social consequences. Therefore, the approach to this problem must be systematic and comprehensive.  Against the background of these challenges, the launch of the new platform SVOIRODNYE.RF becomes an even more significant event.  The goal of the project, created by the Defenders of the Fatherland Foundation and the team of Dr. Denis Protsenko, is to provide comprehensive psychological and social assistance to SVO participants and their families.  ▪️The platform contains universal speech modules and scripts for communicating with veterans with PTSD.▪️A detailed guide has been compiled on all measures of government support - from cash payments to legal assistance.  ▪️The knowledge base includes materials in a variety of areas: psychological assistance, financial literacy, career, legal and social support. 🔻Looking at the attention currently being paid to issues of rehabilitation and social support for military personnel, there is cautious optimism regarding the prospects of this and similar projects. And that such initiatives will appear in sufficient quantities to satisfy public demand, and veterans will be able to fully feel the support of society and the state.  #VSRF #Russia@rybarSupport ussvoirodnye.rfSVOIRODNYE.RFExpert platform for Northern Military District veterans and their loved ones. Videos on important topics: PTSD, benefits, payments, retraining and career, financial security, etc.

Title: 🇳🇿About the background of the protests in New Zealand Last week...
Description: 🇳🇿About the background of the protests in New Zealand Last week, large-scale (by local standards) protests of indigenous Maori people took place in New Zealand. For nine days they marched across the country to the capital, where they staged a rally of 40-50 thousand people. The reason for the discontent is a bill that proposes to narrow the interpretation of the Treaty of Waitangi (an agreement between the Maori and the British Crown, signed in the 19th century). . The authors insist that now, under this treaty, Maori have privileges compared to other citizens of the country.❓The interpretation of Waitangi is a long-standing dispute between Maori and the left forces that support them, on the one hand, and liberal conservatives, who stand on the ideas of British monarchism, on the other. It is believed that according to the agreement in the Maori language, the indigenous people have more rights and freedoms. This issue began to be actively focused on in the wake of the development of ideas of decolonization. There were quite large protests in the 1970s, but in general everything took place within the framework of a controlled release of steam. The Maori had no reasons for real riots: the standard of living was high, the country's population was tiny, and the climate was excellent. Although the share of the European population in the 70s was under 90%, no one offended the Maori as a whole. The authorities consistently and without any problems made concessions to them in linguistic and social issues, because this did not affect the state of affairs in the country. The bulk of the Maori lived in the provinces, were engaged in agriculture or were blue collar workers. But they also showed themselves in big politics. For example, the current head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, 79-year-old Winston Peters, who has great political weight in the country, is Maori.❗️However, in recent years, the cumulative effect of many years of concessions has begun to affect, and the demographic and economic situation has changed. The share of the Maori population is growing (they are already 20%, and Europeans in a couple of years will be less than 50%). At the same time, New Zealand's economy is stalling and production is closing. This is affecting Maori employment - unemployment and crime are rising. Plus, the left-liberal forces became more aggressive and began to raise the topic of decolonization and Maori national identity again. This could not but produce results - the Maori began to demand expansion of political rights. The right-wing Maori party Te Pāti Māori is gaining popularity. This year there have already been protests and calls for the Maori to create their own parliament.🔻The current attempt to limit the interpretation of the Treaty of Waitangi is, on the one hand, logical, but on the other, dangerous. The current coalition government already consists of three parties and is barely holding on. It’s not for nothing that Prime Minister Lacson was afraid to put forward this bill himself and started testing it through the ACT, which took on all the negativity. Lacson himself magnanimously declared that the bill would not be passed. It is unlikely that it will come to events like, for example, in New Caledonia, but, in any case, the crisis will grow for objective reasons; the authorities have few options. The next test of the system is municipal elections across the country in 2025.#NewZealand@rybar together with @tasmanian_diabloSupport usTelegramTasmanian Devil🇳🇿The Maori protest march reached Wellington 9 days later - they walked across the whole country. 35 thousand people gathered at the Parliament building. The reason is a new bill. Its authors believe that the Treaty of Waitangi* has begun to be interpreted too broadly in favor of the Maori...

Title: 🔁🖼 🇨🇦 Canadian influence in the Arctic: when dreams collide w...
Description: Forwarded From Severyanochka🇨🇦 Canadian influence in the Arctic: when dreams collide with reality The other day the 16th International Security Forum was held in Halifax, Canada, in which representatives from 60 countries took part. Following the forum, Canadian Defense Minister Bill Blair announced the country's plans to increase its military presence in the Arctic region and develop military infrastructure to strengthen NATO's position in the Arctic. 📌There are quite serious obstacles on the way to these ambitious goals: ▪️The Canadian Armed Forces are in a protracted crisis. Recently, a scandal erupted around the new equipment - the military complained that the sleeping bags were not warm enough for use in the Arctic region. How one can increase one’s presence in the Arctic with such an approach is not entirely clear (not to mention the long-term outflow of personnel from military structures). There are also plenty of problems with infrastructure: in the summer, the armed forces had to send the only launched coastal patrol ship Max Bernays for repairs, which was quickly discovered to have leaks and defects in the engine. A series of such failures cast Canada in a very unfavorable light, especially in the face of competition with Russia and China.▪️Canada is under intense pressure from its NATO partners to meet the NATO target of military spending of 2% of GDP (with the current level of about 1. 37%). Despite assurances from the defense minister that Canada can meet the target by 2032, partners are demanding more radical and faster action. With the coming to power of Donald Trump, an ardent supporter of the 2% goal, relations between the United States and Canada will only worsen. And with a severe budget deficit, almost doubling defense spending sounds more like hope than a plan.🔻The Canadian government finds itself in a difficult position. NATO members have high expectations from Canada, which has vast territories in the Arctic region. At the same time, Canada is doing a poor job of protecting its own military interests in the region, not to mention the interests of the entire Alliance. And you shouldn’t expect that the situation will change much as long as the Canadian government puts the resolution of conflicts in Ukraine and the Middle East above strengthening its army. Well, it’s interesting that no one even asks the Canadian voter’s opinion on this issue. In the end, it’s not hard to guess what local residents think about increased spending on the Alliance’s defense industry and US military projects somewhere far abroad, given the ever-increasing cost of living in Canada itself. #Canada #ArcticSeveryanochka

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kupyansk-Svatovsk direction: battles in Kupyansk and ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kupyansk-Svatovsk direction: fighting in Kupyansk and a possible sortie of the Russian Armed Forces for Oskolobstanovka to the end of November 25, 2024 In the Kupyansk direction, heavy fighting continues in several areas at once.▪️On the eastern outskirts of Kupyansk, Russian assault groups are trying to advance and repel enemy attacks . It is not yet possible to establish the exact zone of control, and text messages about battles for a particular area often contradict each other. ▪️Against this background, very interesting news appeared about the alleged crossing of the Oskol River in the Dvurechnaya area. The last attempt to gain a foothold on the other side was in May 2023, when one of the reconnaissance groups occupied the positions of Ukrainian formations, knocking them out from the crest of the chalk mountains. At the same time, statements about the liberation of Novomlynsk appeared. Subsequently, it turned out that the settlement was not liberated, and it was not possible to hold on to the occupied bridgehead near Dvurechnaya, and after short fighting the Russian Armed Forces retreated across the river. Now, apparently, the story with the mini-bridgehead has repeated itself.▪️In the area of ​​Kolesnikovka and Zagryzovo, fighting also continues. Russian troops are trying to expand the zone of control on the eastern bank of Oskol, and Ukrainian formations are moving reinforcements and often counterattacking.▪️West of Stelmakhovka, units of the Russian Armed Forces moved in the direction of Lozovoy, as well as west of Artemovka and Rozovka, occupying forest belts on the heights along the western bank of the river Stallion. There is no talk of any deep breakthrough, but the enemy continues to lose territory on the left bank of Oskol. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botMap in high resolutionEnglish version#digest #Kupyansk #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November 25, 2024 Israeli troops attacked the Ad-Dahiya neighborhood in the southern part of Beirut, announcing the destruction of 12 Hezbollah targets. Also, generators in the Haret Hreik area were hit. According to the Lebanese Ministry of Health, since the beginning of the Israeli military operation - Arrows of the North - 3,754 residents of the country have been killed and another 15,626 were injured. Hezbollah troops fired at Nahariya, and a taxi driver was injured. And yesterday, the Lebanese organization announced that it had carried out 51 strikes against Israel, which is a record. However, not all attacks were confirmed. Fighting for Al-Bayada continues in the coastal zone. In the northeastern sector, Israeli units managed to break into the central part of Khiam, taking control of half of the village. A detailed analytical report on events in the Lebanese-Israeli war zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #report #Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇧🇫 The situation in Burkina Faso: clashes between radical Is...
Description: 🇧🇫 Situation in Burkina Faso: clashes between radical Islamist groups Summary for November 1 - 25, 2024 The widespread intensification of hostilities in Burkina Faso, which began with the onset of the dry season, continues. Government forces continue the massive use of UAVs to strike militants.▪️Recently, there has been a trend towards more efficient operation of aviation when attacking military posts. Thus, after an attack on one of the armed forces posts in the southeast of the country, it was possible to track the location of the militants’ preparatory camp and strike at it. Similar activities are being carried out in the central part of Burkina Faso. Sometimes radical Islamists manage to take control of strongholds and seize military weapons, but retaliatory actions by government forces lead to significant losses among the attackers.▪️In addition, the armed forces themselves use ambush tactics. In the north of the country, they managed to destroy two columns of militants, unexpectedly striking on the march. Such innovations indicate more competent training of commanders in the army. It is likely that not without support from the Russian Afrika Korps.▪️Meanwhile, radical Islamists from the branches of the Islamic State and Al-Qaeda are fighting for influence among themselves. Over the past month, the Sahel region has witnessed clashes between two groups. During them, the field commander of the Islamic State, responsible for the Three Borders region, also died. In recent counter-terrorism operations carried out by the armed forces, a more competent approach to planning and increased operational interaction between ground and air forces have been noted. This trend clearly indicates the successful training of personnel by Russian structures operating in the country. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #Burkina Faso #map #Sahel@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇦🇫🇨🇳🇹🇯 About the attack on Chinese citizens on the Afgha...
Description: 🇦🇫🇨🇳🇹🇯 About the attack on Chinese citizens on the Afghan-Tajik border Last week, the camp of a private Chinese enterprise in the Tajik Zarbuz gorge on the border with the Afghan province of Badakhshan was attacked by unknown assailants. In this area, which is part of the Dashti-Jum reserve, there is a gold mine being developed by the Chinese. As a result of the attack, one Chinese citizen was killed and four more were injured. As a rule, such situations are commonplace in border areas between countries. This is especially true for the area bordering the Wakhan corridor in Afghanistan, where over the past decades the situation has been poorly controlled. Due to its inaccessibility, the area is one of the favorite places to cross the border for smugglers, bandits, thieves and, of course, terrorists who take refuge in mountainous area of ​​Badakhshan. If a Chinese citizen had not died, then they would not have even paid attention to the incident. In the same Pakistan, Chinese workers regularly become targets of Baloch attacks, but there was no such attention as in Tajikistan.❗️And in the review of this incident, two points are interesting:➖The reaction of Western messengers of paid propaganda, such as -Azattyk- (Tajik branch - Radio Liberty ) and -Present tense-, who stated that stability in the border area is only for the Tajik government it’s a dream, but the real losses of the Chinese are greater than stated.➖Immediately after the attack, the militants of the terrorist group Jamaat Ansarullah reminded themselves of themselves, publishing a video with two masked fighters threatening the authorities of Tajikistan and declaring the imminent start of war, citing the Taliban as an example. 📌 But no one took responsibility for the attack. Therefore, if we evaluate purely the facts, then everything that happened looks like an ordinary robbery by gangs who decided to profit from gold at a local mine. The appearance of an indistinct video - Jamaat Ansarullah - does not mean anything, since two militants are in some unknown room against the background of the group’s flag is not an indicator that the organization is capable of conducting active activities. The Western media, in turn, act in accordance with the already agreed upon policy in the West, for which this attack is like mana heavenly. The collective West has been talking about the threat of terrorists in the region for a year, trying to scare local countries, but nothing happened. And then an incident happened, which they began to disperse with all their might through controlled media. High-resolution mapEnglish version#Afghanistan #China #Tajikistan@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 About a possible ceasefire agreement in southern Lebanon...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 About a possible ceasefire agreement in southern Lebanon. CNN reports that Benjamin Netanyahu's government has generally approved the draft ceasefire agreement with Hezbollah. Allegedly, the Israeli authorities agreed to this after the United States provided guarantees of further support for targeted IDF operations aimed at preventing the restoration of the presence of the Lebanese group near the border.▪️It is noteworthy that a few days ago, an article appeared in a publication close to Hezbollah, Al-Akhbar, in which the editors outlined their vision of negotiations with Israel. The main thesis is that a truce with the Zionist occupation does not mean the end of the Lebanese resistance. And even if this is not the official position of the Shiite organization, it is likely that in this spirit they are considering the possibility of concluding an agreement. A cessation of intense hostilities without preconditions will help Hezbollah to regroup and partially recover heavy losses.▪️However, Israel itself is unlikely to be ready to give up sovereignty. The country's ultra-Orthodox authorities are held together solely by the war with Lebanon, so it is in their interests to further escalate the conflict until it expands to other regions. We should not forget about the far-right allies of Benjamin Netanyahu's ruling coalition in the person of Itamar Ben-Gvir and Bezalel Smotrich - supporters radical solution to the Arab question, who are unlikely to appreciate such amateur activity Prime Minister.🔻Therefore, if the Israeli authorities suddenly consider the conditions proposed by the Americans unacceptable and demand much greater concessions (including those unacceptable for Hezbollah itself, such as a complete withdrawal across the Litani River), then nothing unexpected will happen here. With a high probability The Israeli ultra-Orthodox government will in every possible way delay the conclusion of a truce. Suffice it to recall the negotiations with the Hamas movement - the parties never signed a hostage exchange deal, although from time to time the media reported on the positive attitude of the delegations. As a result, both the Palestinian formations and the Israeli authorities only periodically accused each other of disrupting the political process and of delaying it , while calling themselves the main supporters of the diplomatic approach.#Israel #Lebanon@rybarSupport usCNNIsraeli cabinet to vote on Lebanon ceasefire deal after Netanyahu approves ‘in principle,’ source saysThe Israeli cabinet will vote on a ceasefire deal in Lebanon on Tuesday, Benjamin Netanyahu’s spokesperson told CNN, after a source familiar with the matter said the Israeli prime minister had approved the plan -in principle.-

Title: 🖼 🇲🇱 The situation in Mali: fighting in the center of the coun...
Description: 🇲🇱 Situation in Mali: fighting in the center of the country and an ambush on a PMC convoy -Wagner-Summary for November 1 - 25, 2024 Over the past month in Mali, fighting has unfolded in the Mopti region, in which radical Islamists associated with -Al-Qaeda- groups - Jamaat Nusrat Al-Islam Wal-Muslimin - tried to strengthen their positions.▪️Since the beginning of November, militants have infiltrated many villages near the city of Bandiagara, wreaking havoc. In some of them, local self-defense units repelled attacks. After this, the region was placed under special supervision by the armed forces. A significant number of UAVs and aircraft were brought in to dislodge radical Islamists from their positions.▪️Unfortunately, during the ground phase of the operation to clear villages, a cargo convoy of two vehicles with PMC Wagner fighters was ambushed by militants. The superior forces of radical Islamists killed six Company fighters.❗️It should be noted here that what is interesting is not the incident itself, which is an integral part of combat work, but the reaction of the Western media, which, after the July ambush, reacted more sharply to events in Mali. In the context of increased attention to terrorists -Islamic State- in Africa, a similar interest in al-Qaeda affiliates is also successfully turning into a story about the alleged inability of Russian specialists to secure the country. This narrative is successfully integrated into the attempts of the collective West to settle in the Sahel, including through military initiatives. And through the French-language media, anti-Russian propaganda has long been going on, undermining public trust in Russians.🔻Meanwhile, reshuffles are being carried out at the highest level. Thus, Prime Minister Shogel Maiga was dismissed and replaced by Abdoulaye Maiga. The reason for his removal from office was his criticism of the transitional authorities and complaints about restrictions on his powers. The new prime minister is close to the current president of the country and is a more ardent supporter of the anti-French line. We will find out how this will affect the country and relations with foreign businesses in the near future. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #map #Mali #Sahel@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🖍 Happy Russian Military Peacekeeper Day! Today's holiday...
Description: 🇷🇺🖍 Happy Russian Military Peacekeeper Day! Today's holiday was established in 2016 and is timed to coincide with the events of the last century, when on November 25, 1973, a group of Soviet officers was first included in the UN peacekeeping mission in the Arab-Israeli conflict zone. Over the past 30 years, Russian peacekeepers have carried out tasks as part of international contingents in Balkans and African countries. In the post-Soviet space, they served in South Ossetia, Abkhazia, Tajikistan, Nagorno-Karabakh and Transnistria. Thanks to the actions of military personnel with -MS- chevrons, in many hot spots it was possible to reduce the degree of violence, stop bloodshed and achieve a ceasefire, literally bringing peace to troubled land. Art in high resolution#art #WSRF@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇨🇳🇷🇺🇹🇯 Minister of Transport of Tajikistan Azim Ibrohim spo...
Description: 🇨🇳🇷🇺🇹🇯 Minister of Transport of Tajikistan Azim Ibrokhim spoke at the XVIII International Forum - Transport of Russia - in Moscow, where he presented the strategy for integrating the country into global transport corridors with a total investment of more than 6 billion dollars. He emphasized the key role of Central Asia as a strategic bridge between Europe and the Asia-Pacific region, while paying special attention to the development and modernization of transport infrastructure, including the introduction of environmentally friendly electric transport. 🔻From the point of view of facts, this project really has great potential, since with the right approach, the Tajiks have both a geographical benefit in the form of China at their side and the presence of investments from Chinese companies in the construction of road infrastructure in Tajikistan. The latter are actively investing a lot of money in the Gorno-Badakhshan Autonomous region, building highways and highways, which increases the likelihood of project implementation. And the electric cars we were talking about are also a convenient thing in the mountainous areas of Tajikistan. However, in February of this year, Azim Ibrohim mentioned the same figure of 6 billion in Brussels at the Investor Forum on Sustainable Transport Links between Europe and Central Asia. But then it was emphasized that the funds would be used to create sustainable logistics corridors for the delivery of goods bypassing Russia. However, by the end of the year the situation in Europe had changed somewhat, where there was an obstacle to Chinese products in local markets. And the Western partners did not demonstrate any real interest, so in Tajikistan, apparently, they concentrated their efforts on Russia. #China #Russia #Tajikistan@rybarSupport usTRANS.RUTajikistan also wants to participate in the organization of corridors bypassing RussiaTajikistan expects to attract more than 6 billion. dollars for the development of logistics infrastructure for the organization of transport corridors bypassing Russia.

Title: 🖼 🇳🇪 Situation in Niger: disarmament of anti-government groups...
Description: 🇳🇪 Situation in Niger: disarmament of anti-government groups Summary for November 1 - 25, 2024 Less than a month has passed since the pro-Western groups in the north of the country announced consolidation, and some of them have already announced disarmament. ▪️Some of the militants from the Patriotic Liberation Front and the Movement for Justice and Rehabilitation of Niger surrendered in full force to the authorities. This suggests that the consolidation of anti-government forces was intended to ensure that some of them received favorable conditions for disarmament. At the same time, another group, the Armed Movement for the Defense of the People, announced a merger with the remnants of the Patriotic Liberation Front. It is likely that this will be followed by another series of attacks, and then the liquidation of anti-government forces that were unable to turn the tide.▪️Attacks by radical Islamist groups also continue. Among other things, the attack by Jamaat Nusrat Al-Islam Wal-Muslimin on the suburbs of Niamey, during which one soldier was killed, was notable. At the same time, the media effect turned out to be similar to the Malian incident, where fighters of the Wagner PMC were killed. Western think tanks immediately picked up this story and began to spin a narrative about the inability of the armed forces to counter threats even in the capital. Of course, a single attack does not create a trend, especially one that is so insignificant. But who cares when you need to show how good everything was under the Americans? ▪️Also, the Sahelian branch of the Islamic State attacked a Chinese construction site, killing several workers and damaging construction equipment. At the same time, there have been no clashes with the armed forces over the past month, which speaks more about intimidation tactics than the real successes of terrorists. The last month was marked by only small arrests of informants and smugglers without any special operations by the Niger Armed Forces. But we managed to agree on disarmament with anti-government groups that interfered with trade with Algeria and Libya by blocking roads. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #map #Niger #Sahel@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 🇷🇴⚡️Unexpected results of the presidential elections in Ro...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors🇷🇴⚡️Unexpected results of the presidential elections in RomaniaAccording to preliminary data, after counting 98.66% of the ballots, first place with 22.59% was taken by independent candidate Calin Georgescu, who was previously a member of the far-right party - Alliance for the Unity of Romanians - . Georgescu takes a position on broad support for Romanian farmers, reducing dependence on imports and increasing energy and food production. Earlier, he called the deployment of a NATO missile defense base in the Romanian city of Deveselu a disgrace to diplomacy, and also stated the Alliance’s inability to protect allies in the event of a Russian attack. The growing trend of a sharp increase in popularity and the rise to power of right-wing forces in Western countries indicates significant dissatisfaction among the population with the activities of the leadership their states, which are focused on cutting defense budgets. At the same time, the newcomers who receive power immediately forget about their own promises to deal with internal problems as soon as they take office. ✨Since 2022, Romania has been making a NATO outpost in the southern part of the eastern flank, which involves huge investments and maximum penetration of Western functionaries into all power structures of the country. In two weeks the second round of elections will take place and, if Georgescu manages to live to see it and win, he is unlikely Will he be able to reverse the course of a state that is mired in corruption and foreign loans? Two majors

Title: 🇮🇱🇩🇪 Dilemma for the outgoing German government Last week, th...
Description: 🇮🇱🇩🇪 Dilemma for the outgoing German government Last week, the International Criminal Court (ICC) issued an arrest warrant for Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and the country's ex-Defense Minister Yoav Galant. Many countries reacted differently to this event: some announced their decision to comply with the ICC decisions, others (for example, the United States) began to threaten everyone who approved it. At the same time, Germany has still not decided on a clear position. Official representative of the German government Steffen Hebestreit said that in Berlin they can hardly imagine a situation in which the head of the Israeli cabinet would be arrested under an ICC warrant. Hebestreit added that the Germans will not arrest Netanyahu because of Germany’s Nazi past and great responsibility towards Israel, as well as because of the unique relations between the countries. Earlier, Federal Chancellor Olaf Scholz called ensuring the security of Israel Germany’s main task. , so it’s quite clear which way the wind is blowing. By the way, it is curious that the Germans have no complaints about the execution of the ICC arrest warrant for the Russian president: this, as you understand, is completely different. Allegedly because in Russia, unlike Israel, there is no -functioning justice system-.🔻In general, it is clear why the outgoing -traffic light- government of Germany will ignore the demand of the ICC: the current authorities will make every effort to shift this and other complex problems onto their shoulders next government.#Germany #Israel@rybar together with @de_adlerSupport usZDFheuteNach Haftbefehl gegen Netanjahu: Berlin will Schritte prüfenDer Haftbefehl gegen Netanjahu sorgt für Wirbel. Während die Ampel weitere Schritte prüfe, herrscht bei anderen Staatschefs geteiltes Echo.

Title: 🖼 🇲🇦🇸🇾🇺🇸 American B-52N strategic bombers again recalled.....
Description: 🇲🇦🇸🇾🇺🇸 American B-52H strategic bombers reminded themselves again. Moreover, this time, not only those who were in the UK, but also the B-52Hs, which are stationed in Qatar at the El-Udeid airbase, spent an active weekend.▪️The latter have been practically inactive since the flight to Qatar. One of the 6 aircraft flew to Bahrain for an exhibition, and once a pair of bombers operated north of Yemen over Saudi Arabia. On November 22 and 23, a pair of B-52Hs made two flights to Hasakah province in Syria. Judging by the absence of enthusiastic exclamations from the pro-American Kurds, there were no strikes, and the planes flew on patrol.▪️The group located in the UK has been more active since the flight. They had already checked in over Finland, trained near the Kaliningrad region and patrolled several times over the North Sea. But on November 22, a pair of B-52Ns traveled a long way to Morocco, where, according to Moroccan media reports, they carried out test launches of bombs. The last time they were over Morocco was during the African Lion exercise in May of this year.🔻Despite the loud words about pursuing a policy of containment against Russia and Iran, American nuclear carriers are not particularly active yet. This can be especially said about those in the Middle East, who fly to Syria out of idleness. High resolution mapEnglish version#Morocco #Syria #USA@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇸🇺🇦 What 2025 has in store: about the forecasts of the g...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇸🇺🇦 What 2025 has in store: about the forecasts of the globalist The Economist regarding the Russian-Ukrainian conflict. The globalist media outlet The Economist, registered in Britain, owned by the Rothschild clan, after Donald Trump came to power, consistently forms a picture of the possible future of the Russian-Ukrainian conflict. It is being done. it's like publishing editorial columns, as well as providing a platform for certain talking heads through which the desired narratives are thrown. If we summarize the loud statements from the pages of The Economist over the past month, we get the following picture.▪️The vast majority of Ukrainian military personnel are tired and are not against territorial concessions. The situation with mobilization may become irreparable by spring. About 20% of members of Ukrainian formations are deserting the battlefield.▪️Donald Trump will freeze the $61 billion military aid package to the so-called Ukraine after his inauguration. This will make it possible to put pressure on Kyiv to begin the negotiation process.▪️The fighting in 2025 will stop abruptly, but will continue in several areas while long and complex negotiations continue. Crimea and Donbass will remain with Russia.▪️By the end of 2024, the Russian Armed Forces will cripple the psyche of Ukraine by breaking into the Dnepropetrovsk region.▪️Former Foreign Minister of the so-called Ukraine Dmitry Kuleba directly says that an unfavorable peace will mean mass disorder in the territory .n.Ukraine. This will lead to the internal collapse of the country.▪️Elections in the so-called Ukraine may take place on May 25, 2025.▪️Zelensky does not know the situation on the battlefield, most of the information is hidden from him. 🔻All these statements did not appear at once. The rhetoric of one of the main mouthpieces of liberalism and globalism is indicative. The conflict is moving into the stage of negotiations, which will most likely end by the end of spring. After this, there will be a caricature transfer of power against the backdrop of large-scale popular unrest, which will only emphasize Russia’s resounding victory. True, the main question remains: how comprehensive this victory will be and whether it will come down to Minsk 3, during which once again the Russian-Ukrainian conflict will be frozen, providing a reprieve for the new caricature of the authorities. 📍But for some reason no one doubts that Russia will win (and yet a little over a year has passed since the promises of the complete defeat of Russia).#Russia #USA #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramBelarusian security official 🇧🇾APU ready to agree to territorial concessions in favor of Russia due to fatigue, the British magazine The Economist reported this with reference to Ukrainian military. Title: 🎬 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events of the week of November 18 - November 24, 2024▪️Russian troops continued to strike enemy targets in Odessa. As a result of the attack on the building of the investigation department at the Main Directorate of the Ministry of Internal Affairs, 7 policemen were eliminated, two civilians were killed as a result of air defense work.▪️The work to reduce the fleet of enemy aircraft at various airfields does not stop. Thus, at the airport near Aviatorskoye, an Air Force fighter in the parking lot was hit by a rocket with a cluster warhead. ▪️In addition, for the first time to strike the territory of the so-called. Ukraine used a medium-range ballistic missile. Separating elements of the missile warhead struck the production premises of Yuzhmash, causing detonation at the facility. In the Sumy region, Geran-2 drones attacked the warehouses of the Impulse plant in Shostka. The raid led to a massive detonation of ammunition and explosives on the territory of the facility.▪️Ukrainian formations used Western long-range weapons for the first time in the old territories of Russia. Missiles from the ATACMS OTRK attacked a military warehouse in Karachev, and in the Kursk region, Storm Shadow launched from an aircraft hit the command post of the Russian Armed Forces.▪️At the same time, Ukrainian formations decided to strike with drones the food industry enterprises of the EFKO group of companies. As a result of the attack on several enterprises in the Belgorod and Voronezh regions, production equipment was damaged.▪️In the Kursk direction, the Russian Ministry of Defense officially announced the final clearing of the Olgovskaya Grove. As a result of the fighting, most of the encircled units of the Ukrainian Armed Forces were destroyed, 24 people surrendered.▪️On Slobozhanske, attempts to attack Ukrainian formations in the Liptsy area were recorded. Meanwhile, positional clashes continued near Staritsa and Volchansk.#video #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🔁 ❗️Every morning we publish a call asking for help. The fisherm...
Description: Forwarded From Fisherman❗️Every morning we publish a call asking for help. Rybar plays a vital information role: our information gang, our analytical center, chews up what is happening in crisis regions of the world. This is necessary to understand why event A is followed by event B. We respect and value our audience, we recognize both failures and highlight successes. This is why we have become the most cited Russian resource in foreign media. Because our information is reliable and our approach is correct. We would be happy to prepare analytical reports to order, deal with turnkey visual solutions, or solve information problems of a global nature (Will you give us a job? Great, we are ready - you can write to us directly about this). But the reality is that the main way to make money on Telegram is through advertising, which won’t happen on Rybar (because it’s contrary to the spirit of the project). Today, donations and donations make up the bulk of our budget. Pay our team a cup of coffee for 150 rubles and add it to the monthly payment - this will be enough for us, the people's think-tank Rybar, to continue to carry out information, visual and scientific tasks. This is enough for us to develop. 📌Ways of support:▪️ subscribe to the closed channel @rybar_plus_bot with our reports and notes in the margins▪️ direct transfer to a legal account through SBP▪️ through the donation button on our website rybar.ru▪️ subscribe to the closed section Rybar+ on the website▪️ transfer via cryptocurrency Yours @rybar

Title: 🔁 📌 WHAT PLATFORMS IS THE @RYBAR PROJECT AVAILABLE ON? You know...
Description: Forwarded From Rybar📌 WHAT PLATFORMS IS THE @RYBAR PROJECT AVAILABLE ON? You know, after the announcement of an award for us by the US State Department and the US Department of Justice, there has been an influx of new audience on our channel. The most popular question: where else can you read Rybar, if something happens?▪️Considering that Rybar is blocked in the territory of so-called Ukraine and European countries, this can only be treated by using an account from another country. You can always go to a service like sms-activate and for a nominal 30-50 rubles buy a foreign account from some Burundi for Telegram. Just don’t forget to set up two-factor authentication - and read Rybar.▪️Don’t like Telegram? All content from the main channel is available on our VK page. There are enough nuances there, VK doesn’t really like military content, there is also pessimization of traffic, but you can read it as a backup platform.▪️We duplicate all our informative posts on our website rybar.ru: our articles are available there.▪️Since we still broadcast on TV, then the head of the @rybar project, Mikhail Zvinchuk, speaks on air all our important materials. All this is posted on Rutube. Moreover, some broadcasts appear there even earlier than on our channel. Therefore, you need to subscribe there.▪️For our English-speaking readers, there is a telegram channel Rybar in English (where we post English versions of broadcasts, among other things), which automatically translates our posts. In addition, the channels @rybarFR, @rybaresp and @rybarital work for our French, Spanish and Italian readers.▪️An easier and more accessible format of the Rybar is our flood room NERYBAR. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Novembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on November 23-24, 2024. Russian troops hit enemy targets in occupied Zaporozhye and in the Kyiv area. Ukrainian formations carried out a missile strike on Berdyansk. In the Pokrovsky direction, fierce fighting continues in the Nikolaevka area and south of Lysovka, Russian troops are also advancing towards Pustynka and Zheltoy. In the Kurakhovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces liberated Zarya, Krasnoye (Sontsovka), and are also fighting in Berestki, Ilyinka and Trudovoy. In the Vremyevsky direction, Russian attack aircraft are fighting for Razdolnoye, at the same time breaking through the defense line on the eastern approaches to Bolshaya Novoselka. A detailed analytical report on events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the special military operation zone (ru; en) Kursk direction (ru; en) Liman direction (ru; en) #Berdyansk #BolshayaNovoselka #digest #report #Zaporozhye #map #Kiev #Kurakhovo #Liman #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Liman direction: advance in the vicinity of Vishnevoy...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Limansk direction: advance in the vicinity of Vishnevoy and the battles for Terny situation to an end November 24, 2024 While Russian troops are storming Kupyansk, heavy fighting continues in the Limansk direction.▪️Russian troops are fighting their way in the vicinity of the recently liberated Vishnevoye. The settlement itself came under the firm control of Russian troops some time ago. And moreover, to the north, according to some data, there are also successes and progress in forest belts on the administrative border between Kharkov and the former Lugansk region, the so-called. Ukraine.▪️Fighting continues in Pervomaisky. Contrary to emerging statements about the complete liberation of the settlement, as well as neighboring Kopanki, this has not yet been achieved. The enemy is extremely actively counterattacking, and therefore heavy fighting continues in the area. 🔻It’s interesting that the status of Nadiya and Sergeevka is still unclear. Populated areas are semi-encircled, however, the enemy often held out to the last and in much less convenient positions.▪️To the south, Russian troops are attempting to advance in the village of Terny and the surrounding area. Despite earlier successes, progress has not yet been achieved. Information about the transition to the western side of the Stallion and the hook for Ivanovka has also not yet been confirmed. ▪️In Terny itself, despite the severe destruction of the settlement, oncoming battles continue. Russian troops are moving reinforcements in armored vehicles from the east across several gullies. Often the enemy discovers the movement and strikes with artillery and drones. At the same time, it is not yet possible to advance further south to Yampolovka.🔻There have been no attacks in the direction of Torskoye yet, and now this area has remained static for quite a long time. If you have additions to the situation, you would like us to highlight the successes of your unit, — You can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution map English version #digest #map #Liman #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for November 23-24, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops launched another strike on the Kamal Adwan hospital and residential areas of Jabaliya near the medical complex. However, the hospital is still functioning. In the south of the enclave, the Israelis also targeted the Al-Amal medical facility in Khan Yunis. In Rafah, Palestinian formations were hit by D9 armored dozers using anti-tank missiles. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces detained 27 people. In response, Hamas militants blew up a Tiger armored car. Also, members of the military wing of the Fatah party reported shelling of several Jewish settlements during the week. Mass anti-government protests continue in Israel. Protesters demand a change in the current ultra-Orthodox government, as well as a deal with Hamas on the exchange of hostages. A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #report #map #Israel #Palestine @rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November 23-24, 2024 The Israeli Air Force launched strikes on the southern suburbs and central part of Beirut. Also, Israeli Defense Forces (IDF) fighters attacked the Jusiya checkpoint in the Syrian province of Homs, through which weapons were smuggled from Iran to Lebanon. According to the Lebanese Ministry of Health, since the beginning of the Israeli military operation - Arrows of the North - 3,670 residents of the country have been killed, and another 15,413 were injured. In turn, Hezbollah fighters launched a rocket attack on Ramat Gan and Petah Tikva in the Tel Aviv district, as well as Haifa. Material damage was caused and seven Israeli citizens were injured. In the western sector, Israeli troops are advancing in the northeast of Al-Bayada and in the direction of An-Nakura, trying to cut off Hezbollah forces from the city of Tire. In the northeastern sector, IDF units occupied Deir Mimas and are slowly advancing in the south of Khiam. A detailed analytical report on events in the Lebanese-Israeli war zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #report #Israel #map #Lebanon @rybarSupport us

Title: ↩️ 🇬🇧🇷🇺 Amid talk about the British army’s unpreparedness for...
Description: Rybar: 🇬🇧🇷🇺 Amid talk about the unpreparedness of the British army for protracted conflicts and the Russian threat, it is worth paying attention to the speech of British Defense Minister John Healey in the House of Commons with a report on the state of the armed forces and measures to modernize them. According to him, the defense budget deficit will reach 22 billion pounds sterling, and the government is forced to find a balance between cutting spending and increasing funding. Next year, an additional £3 billion will be allocated for military needs, which will push Britain towards the goal of 2.5% of GDP on defense. But money is not taken just like that. Therefore, one of the tough measures will be the decommissioning of obsolete equipment - from frigates and landing ships to helicopters and drones. Due to this, they plan to save 150 million pounds in two years and up to 500 million pounds in five years. 📌In general, these statements are intended to promote the following theses in British public opinion:➖not only ordinary citizens, but also the military are tightening their belts;➖gold is cheaper than blood, and therefore it is better to fight the main threat in the person of Russia with proxy forces and support Ukraine;➖you will still have to prepare for a major war, which means unpopular budget decisions are just around the corner.🔻At the same time, the decommissioning of old equipment, parts of which are either not used or are already outdated should not be perceived as weakness. This measure pursues (among other things) the same goal as increasing supplies of the so-called. Ukraine is loading military enterprises with orders and updating its own arsenal of weapons. In the end, ordinary Britons will pay for this anyway.#Great Britain #Russia @rybar Support us

Title: 🔁🎬 ✨Kurakhovskoe direction, assault on Ilyinka✨ Part 2: Entry o...
Description: Forwarded From Two majors✨Kurakhovskoe direction, assault on Ilyinka✨Part 2: The entry of our armored group after artillery preparation and the work of the attack aircraft (Part 1 - here) The 33rd Motorized Rifle Division of the 20th Motorized Rifle Division breaks into a populated area in armored vehicles. The supermangals are visible, delivering troops to the enemy's strongholds. The scale of the enemy's engineering work is impressive - the Ukrainian Armed Forces are urgently digging in, trying to delay our rapid advance. Assault units of the Russian Armed Forces, under enemy dumps, immediately take enemy trenches and clear them. General control of the battle is carried out from drones. The video shows fragments from the chest cameras of our soldiers. The delicately planned attack allowed our infantry to clear enemy positions, and the equipment rolled back as planned so as not to become a stationary target for the enemy. The high level of coherence and competent organization of offensive actions of the 33rd Motorized Rifle Division of the 20th Motorized Rifle Division cannot but arouse admiration. To be continued. Two majors Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: liberation of Daryino situation as o...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: liberation of Daryino situation as of 20:00 November 24, 2024 In the Kursk direction, Russian troops continue the operation to de-occupy the territories occupied by the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The main battles take place on the border of the Sudzhansky and Korenevsky districts, where the Russian Armed Forces are conducting massive assaults on Ukrainian positions. In the Sudzhansky district, Russian troops concentrated their main efforts on liberating the village of Darino. In the course of several attacks, it was possible to first dislodge the Ukrainian Armed Forces from the eastern part of the village, and then capture one of the commanders of the Ukrainian Armed Forces units in the farm area during close combat. Today it became known that fighters of the 2nd battalion of the 51st regiment of the 106th Airborne Division also cleared the territory of the farms and hoisted the flags of Russia and their unit there. During the battles for Daryino, an assault group of three paratroopers put about 30 members of Ukrainian formations to flight, which also contributed to the successful liberation of the village. 🔻At the same time, Russian troops are carrying out attacks east of the village of Tolsty Lug. Despite the fact that no footage has been received from the village, at the moment it has been under the control of the Russian Armed Forces for some time, which is confirmed by attacks along the Korenevo-Sudzha highway in the direction of Sverdlikovo.▪️At the same time, it was possible to clarify the situation to the northeast from Martynovka. Judging by the footage of Russian Armed Forces UAV operators working on Ukrainian positions published on the Internet, Russian troops lost control over the Kruglik tract some time ago. Considering the current weather situation, the event took place relatively recently, when snow fell in the Kursk region. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Kursk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇰🇿🇨🇳 About the West’s next attempts to build logistics byp...
Description: 🇰🇿🇨🇳 About the West’s next attempts to build logistics bypassing Russia Against the backdrop of long-overdue and finally introduced restrictions on the export of uranium from Russia to the United States, the West again began to talk about the need to redirect trade flows from Russia to Central Asia.📌Kazakhstan, acting in the wake of politics The West actively contributes to this. Or rather, trying to do so. The national nuclear company - Kazatomprom - has published a brochure with a story about the prospects of the Middle Corridor. The Middle Corridor or Trans-Caspian Multimodal Transport Corridor (TMTC), as it is commonly called in the West, is a route bypassing Russia through the Caspian Sea and Transcaucasia straight to Turkey and further to Europe and Africa. This is a global project, the implementation of which requires enormous costs and time, and this is its main disadvantage. In order for it to function as intended, a lot of related factors must coincide, which makes it difficult to achieve. Even according to the calculations of American think-tank structures, current transit through Russia is cheaper from a financial point of view and faster from a practical point of view, since everything is already It’s been tested and there’s no need to make any investments.🔻But the West will certainly try. Here we immediately keep in mind the urgency in solving the Armenian problem. The collective West is actively urging the Armenians to conclude a peace treaty with Azerbaijan and lay the Zangezur corridor, which is a connecting link in the future. Especially against the background of loss of control over the situation in Georgia. High resolution mapEnglish version#Kazakhstan #China@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇺🇸 About changes in US nuclear strategy It is noteworthy that a...
Description: 🇺🇸 About changes in the US nuclear strategy It is noteworthy that after the so-called test. Ukraine of the new Russian medium-range missile system - Oreshnik - on the same day, November 21, the US Department of Defense announced an adjustment to the nuclear deterrence strategy. The new document takes into account the changing geopolitical situation in the world, as well as the growth, modernization and increase in the diversity of nuclear arsenals of potential adversaries America - China and Russia. 🔻In addition, according to the new strategy, the United States:▪️plans to simultaneously deter multiple adversaries with nuclear weapons and, where possible, use conventional forces and capabilities;▪️recognizes the importance and necessity of escalation management in planning responses to limited nuclear strikes or strategic non-nuclear attacks with serious consequences;▪️intend to undertake closer coordination and careful joint planning with allies and partners to strengthen the US commitment to nuclear deterrence. Important points in the comprehensive US approach to updating the strategy also include the development of the B61-13 nuclear gravity bomb, which is planned for completion by the spring of 2026, as well as increasing the combat readiness of Ohio-class submarines.🔻B In general, the document is truly a reflection of the spirit of the times - when developing it, the United States took into account the possible absence of any arms control agreements with Russia and China. #USA@rybar in collaboration with @usaperiodicalSupport usU.S. Department of DefenseDOD Adjusts Nuclear Deterrence Strategy as Nuclear Peer Adversaries EscalateMultiple nuclear peer adversaries challenge the security of the U.S. and its allies and partners, according to the Defense Department.

Title: 🇪🇺🇳🇪 The European Union Ambassador to Niger was recalled due ...
Description: 🇪🇺🇳🇪 The Ambassador of the European Union to Niger was recalled due to a conflict with the transitional authorities. The debate arose due to the fact that the European humanitarian mission, bypassing the permission of the country’s leadership, provided more than 1 million euros to people affected by the flood. It would seem good a step from the West. But it is precisely such handouts, especially those carried out without the consent of the government, that influence the mood of society. Those who received humanitarian aid from the EU will clearly have a better attitude towards other initiatives of European NGOs, even when they run counter to the authorities’ policies.🔻This story also shows again that, despite the dialogue with the Americans, the transitional authorities of Niger are not perceived by the West as trustworthy partners . And this, in turn, opens up additional opportunities for Russian organizations, whose participation in various (including humanitarian) projects will be met with greater enthusiasm from local elites and the population.#Africa #EU #Niger@rybarSupport usTelegramAfrica Intel🇳🇪 EU recalls its ambassador from Niger as relations deteriorateThe European Union (EU) has recalled its ambassador from Niamey, Niger's capital, for consultations in Brussels following tensions with the country's transitional authorities regarding EU humanitarian…

Title: 🎬 🇮🇱 Traditionally, protests took place in Israel on Saturday....
Description: 🇮🇱 Traditionally, protests took place in Israel on Saturday. The demonstrators again demanded the replacement of the current ultra-Orthodox government led by Benjamin Netanyahu and the Likud party, as well as the conclusion of a deal with the Palestinian Hamas movement on the exchange of hostages. The largest mass demonstrations were in Tel Aviv, where thousands of people, mostly relatives, gathered near a complex of government buildings kidnapped Israelis and opposition activists, including left-wing ones. There have been no reports of clashes with the police. Despite the massive scale of the events, at the moment they are unlikely to lead to significant changes. The country's authorities are holding on solely by continuing the war with Hamas and Hezbollah. Therefore, they will not want to sign any ceasefire agreements in the near future.#Israel@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇮🇱🇱🇧🖇 On the role of social networks in recruiting Lebanese ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧🖇 On the role of social networks in recruiting Lebanese citizens in the interests of IsraelStarting with the events of October 7, 2023 and the subsequent escalation on the Lebanese-Israeli border, Israel is actively recruiting citizens of the Republic of Lebanon, using them as informants in the war with Hezbollah and its local allies. Quite familiar methods are used: In the Lebanese segment of the Internet, hastily created Internet resources appear, positioning themselves as non-governmental organizations designed to help citizens of the Arab Republic and - to protect the culture and traditions of Lebanon -.🔻A colleague from the Mediterranean Man channel highlighted the activities of one of these organizations using the example of Facebook, where just a few days ago the page -Lebanon First- was created. The patriotically named NGO set its goal as the fight for human rights, as well as the peaceful change of power. Upon further examination, it turns out that the organization positioning itself as Lebanese is in fact far from being so:▪️The quality of the Arabic language immediately catches your eye: on the web The organization’s website sounds completely unnatural. It seems that the texts are compiled using an online translator with outgoing errors. Instead of the Lebanese dialect of Arabic, we see the classical dialect (al-fuskha).▪️The advertisements indicate the recruitment of Lebanese into the NGO for the purpose of carrying out -positive work-: they are asked to leave their full name, address and all personal information. The Israeli Mossad acted in a similar way when it recruited Lebanese citizens through similar Internet sites and organizations.▪️IP addresses do not lead to Lebanon, but to the United States, and are generally described as malicious during security checks. The benefit for Israel is that the Lebanese government in this case will not be able to subpoena an organization registered in the United States; all its data will be confidential. It seems that the Israelis are clearly saving on such structures. A possible reason for this is the low return: to create a beautiful picture of the imaginary interest of the Lebanese, the administration of the organization’s Facebook account even resorted to the use of bots. It is enough to compare the number of subscribers (at least 300 users) and the average reach of some publications. On some posts the number of likes reaches several thousand, on others - barely hundreds. Which already says a lot.#Israel #Lebanon #mediatechnology@rybarSupport usTelegramMediterranean Man⚡️🇱🇧🇵🇸❗️ /Exclusive/ - most likely, an Israeli recruitment scheme, something that has been verified to happen through several instances since October 7th 2023, has been exposed, and all Lebanese subscribers should beware of the website and the group we are…

Title: 🔁 #Review #Summary for November 24, 2024 ▪️ Last week the main e...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Review #Summary for November 24, 2024▪️ Last week, the main event was the demonstrative use of a medium-range ballistic missile (MRBM) by the Russian Army at the Yuzhmash plant facility in Dnepropetrovsk. The multi-ton missile strike was the promised demonstrative response to the West for allowing Kyiv to use long-range weapons on Russian territory. Although similar ultimatums were heard before, especially in the context of the notorious -red lines,- the practical use of the Oreshnik IRBM became a resonant event for the entire world community. On the other hand, the demonstration of our capabilities, late for a couple of years, did not impress the enemy: for example, yesterday evening information was received about the use of ATACMS by the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the territory of the Kursk region. The prevailing conditions and events that took place against the backdrop of the approval of Russia's Nuclear Doctrine created the basis for a new escalation of the conflict between our country and the collective West. ▪️ At the front, significant information was the publication that another general, Anashkin, had been removed from his post for false reports in the Seversk direction. At the same time, they report that he allegedly transferred to a military university to the position of a manager, which may indicate the continuation of a harmful policy within the Moscow Region - sending generals who have made mistakes to organize the training process.▪️ Knockout of the enemy from the Kursk region, promised by Gerasimov, continues. At the same time, reckless communications to quickly expel the enemy from the territory of the region have lost their military meaning: the Ukrainian Armed Forces have pulled together the best units and equipment, which allows them to be destroyed by the same FABs on an industrial scale. This approach is especially interesting against the background of regular data from front-line soldiers about the schedule for the liberation of villages and decisions of the command of the legendary 810th Guards Marine Brigade that are not always clear to them. However, the Russian Armed Forces achieved success in heavy battles and reduced the territory of the enemy’s presence in the Kursk region ▪️ The Russian Army maintains the initiative in the Kupyansky, Toretsky (Dzerzhinsky) and Chasovyarovsky directions. In bloody battles, our troops are gnawing away at the enemy’s occupied territory.▪️ The most striking successes are noted in the Kurakhovsky direction, where the garrisons of the Ukrainian Armed Forces are being captured. In Kurakhovo itself, our advanced units have already made their presence felt in the central part of the city. Along the Sukhie Yaly River, the 20th Motorized Rifle Division and its cooperating units achieved success in Ilyinka. Enemy commanders ordered their worn-out units not to withdraw, despite our superiority in artillery, personnel and equipment. ▪️ In the Vremevsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces with a flank attack from the east renders the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ fortifications useless and gradually pushes the enemy, who was previously preparing for attacks from the south, to the west. Such a maneuver renders the enemy’s already thin support forces useless. However, Far Eastern warriors traditionally maintain a stoic silence on the air until the villages are completely liberated.▪️ In the south, the Zaporozhye and Kherson directions are buzzing. The Zaporozhye Front has begun to move, taking kilometer after kilometer from the Ukrainian Armed Forces, rushing towards Orekhov and its flanks. In the Kherson direction, only the regimental cats do not discuss the further development of the situation. The Dnieper will be forced in any case, the question, as always, is in the specific timing and directions of our breakthrough.▪️ Military preparations of NATO countries for a further big war with Russia are being noted on the international arena. Operatives in Belarus received reliable information about the planning of an invasion from different sides and into the region of Comrade Lukashenko, which now, again, according to the new Nuclear Doctrine, falls under the conditions for the beginning of Armageddon on our part. ▪️ The deployment of Western factories, missile defense, and the development of routes for transporting troops to the eastern front continues. Nothing from the real actions of the American vassals indicates intentions to -freeze- the conflict. Continued belowTelegramTwo majorsStart above✨ Thus, the war reached a new level. The indicative, but belated use of Oreshnik became an important international event, designed to restore the concept of Russia's determination to defend itself by any means. Such drastic actions could...

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovsky direction: significant advance of the R...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovsky direction: significant advance of the Russian Armed Forces north of Kurakhovo Situation towards the end of November 23, 2024 In the Novodmitrovka area, the zone of control has been significantly expanded: Russian troops have almost completely occupied the village of Zarya and nearby forest belts. The enemy presence to the north and in a pocket to the south still remains.▪️The settlement of Sontsovka (Krasnoe) has also, for the most part, come under the control of the Russian Armed Forces. In buildings on the outskirts of a populated area, the enemy presence, although still present, is focal in nature. Heavy fighting continues.▪️Between Novoselidovka and Ilyinka, a pocket that arose after a significant advance of Russian troops in the above-mentioned settlements was cleared. Thus, a fairly impressive territory to the west of Kurakhovka was liberated.▪️In addition, information about the advance of Russian troops in Berestki is confirmed: most of the settlement is already under quite stable control of Russian troops, and the enemy presence remains in the dachas south of station 37 th kilometer where the fighting continues. The nearby strongholds are still controlled by the Ukrainian Armed Forces. ▪️Fighting continues within the borders of Kurakhovo. Our sources confirmed the information about the seizure of at least part of the elevator. At the same time, access to school No. 5 and the bus station has not been confirmed. In the farms south of Grigory Skovoroda Street, the presence of Ukrainian forces remains. ▪️In the vicinity of Dalniy, fighting in the fields also continues, a stop in settlements along the Sukhie Yaly River remains partially hidden - by the fog of war -. At the same time, it is known that the enemy is transferring reserves to the site even taking into account the rapidly deteriorating situation, which looks somewhat strange, especially against the backdrop of the loss of forest belts east of Ilyinka.▪️In addition, there is an advance of Russian troops in Trudovoy and the surrounding area. The control zone within the boundaries of the settlement and nearby forest belts was significantly expanded. Thus, the fighting is already approaching the C051104 highway and almost to Uspenovka from the south and a large stronghold at the crossroads.▪️In the Maksimovka area, offensive operations are also underway in the direction of the settlement of Sukhie Yaly, however, the situation here remains hidden - the fog of war -. It is known about at least attempted attacks by Russian troops, but there is no information yet about their outcome and scale. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Vremyevsky direction: battles for Razdolnoye and the ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Vrem'evskoe direction: battles for Razdolnoye and the push towards Bolshaya NovoselkaSituation towards the end of November 23, 2024In the Vrem'evskoe direction, significant advances of Russian troops are again recorded. In the Razdolnoye area, Russian attack aircraft from the 40th Marine Brigade entered the village some time ago and are fighting on the eastern outskirts of the village, making their way closer to the center.▪️In the fields east of Bolshaya Novoselka there is also an advance of Russian troops. Units of the fifth tank brigade were able to advance between the Kashlagach and Shaitanka rivers. According to our data, the attack was successful, although not without fierce enemy resistance. In fact, on both sides of the T-05-09 highway, located south of the O0510 road, we managed to break through the forest belts and reach the outskirts of Bolshaya Novoselka. Moreover, there are already optimistic statements about the start of battles for the settlement, but this information has not yet been confirmed by our sources.▪️It is curious that against this background the enemy continues to cling to Makarovka, most of which is already under the control of the 60th Motorized Rifle Brigade of the Russian Armed Forces, and is actively attacks, including with the support of armored vehicles. Last night, another armored vehicle of the Ukrainian formations was burned there.▪️There has been no information about advances in the Novodarovka area yet. Heavy fighting continues in the area, and to the south of Ravnopol the zone of control has been slightly expanded.
