Title: 🖼 🇮🇷☢️ About the IAEA resolution against Iran This week, the A...
Description: 🇮🇷☢️ About the IAEA resolution against Iran This week, the Board of Governors of the United Nations Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA), under pressure from Great Britain, France, Germany and the United States, adopted a resolution ordering the Iranian government to give a -comprehensive- account of its nuclear program. In the resolution, according to Reuters agency, repeats the Agency’s language from November 2022 and June this year: Iran -there is an urgent need to explain the presence of processed uranium particles at two sites near Tehran - Varamin and Turkuzabad. At the same time, IAEA Director General Rafael Grossi denied some statements about Iranian facilities, including Israeli words about the Parchin facility, which they attacked. He noted that the IAEA does not consider it a nuclear facility and does not have any evidence of the presence of nuclear materials in this place.  The Iranian government needs to submit new data by the spring of 2025. Immediately after the vote (only China, Russia and Burkina Faso voted against), a statement appeared from Iran that new and improved centrifuges would be activated.🔻In fact, it can be stated again that the IAEA has completely lost its sovereignty, which has been observed more than once over the course of recent years, including when it came to the Zaporozhye Nuclear Power Plant and regular attacks by the Armed Forces of Ukraine on a nuclear facility. Without any significant evidence Pressure was increased on the Iranian government, which expectedly responded by increasing the number of centrifuges used. Tehran did not specify where the modernization will take place, but it is highly likely Natanz or Fordo. The Iranian media does not pay much attention to this, since the authorities expected such an outcome, despite the efforts of Foreign Minister Abbas Araqchi. But now all the fuss about Iran and the nuclear program is postponed until spring. If there is no change, the collective West will likely consider returning to the sanctions that were lifted in 2015. Moreover, in January, Donald Trump returns to the political Olympus in the United States, who is interested in total pressure on Iran. High resolution mapEnglish version#Iran@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 🇲🇩 The first Moldova Security Forum was held in Chisinau on ...
Description: Forwarded From Systemic pesticide🇲🇩 The first Moldova Security Forum was held in Chisinau on November 19-20, where the prospects for cooperation between the republic and NATO, hybrid warfare and disinformation were discussed. The entire forum was devoted to discussing the fight against Russia, as well as the topic of rapprochement between Moldova and NATO. Speakers questioned the value of the country's constitutional neutrality, arguing that the republic should join the alliance.▪️The list of organizers and partners of the forum is eloquent, most of which are recognized as undesirable organizations in the Russian Federation. Thus, the main organizer is the German Konrad Adenauer Foundation, as well as the NATO Liaison Office in Moldova and the Institute for European Policy and Reform.▪️The forum also has serious partners. For example, the Soros Foundation in Moldova, from which came the entire galaxy of politicians of the ruling PAS party, led by President Maia Sandu. ▪️The American International Republican Institute (IRI), which is conducting vigorous activity in the post-Soviet space, is also declared as a partner, providing local authorities with a disservice in promoting the anti-Russian vector. ❗️In Moldova, there has been a campaign to discredit neutrality and agitation for the republic’s entry into NATO for a long time. However, it is significant that public events at which such a political agenda is outlined are carried out by the same NGOs. It is not for nothing that in Russia their activities are recognized as undesirable, since after breaking all covers they conduct open anti-Russian activities in neighboring countries. #Moldova #Russia #NGO @pezdicide no chemicals - just factsSecurity Forum MoldovaHome - Security Forum Moldova

Title: ↩️🖼 🌍🏴 In connection with the increased attention to the ISIS ...
Description: Rybar: 🇸🇴🇺🇸🏴 About the influence of the -Islamic State- in East Africa In addition to the danger from the Islamic State - Vilayat Khorasan - exaggerated by the West, the issue of the threat from the Somali branch of terrorists has recently been raised. In particular, the American command of the US Armed Forces is increasingly considering... 🌍🏴 In connection with the increased attention to the IS branch in Somalia, the question arises: is the threat of the Islamic State in East Africa really real?▪️So, in Somalia itself they practically do not carry out attacks with end of 2018. Only in February, in propaganda materials, they announced the seizure of territory from their competitors from Al-Shabab, which cannot be confirmed.▪️The largest branch of the Islamic State in the Democratic Republic of Congo is also not the main problem for the Congolese army. Basically, terrorists only sow panic in peaceful villages and occasionally attack military posts. There is no need to talk about its prospects: Islam in the country is a minority religion in one of the provinces and the group will not achieve real success.▪️As ​​for Mozambique, here is the situation really poorly controlled by government forces. A few militants skillfully hide in the jungle, from where they make PR forays, temporarily capturing villages or cities. At the same time, their tactics mainly come down to intimidating the population, which clearly does not add to their authority among the locals. Accordingly, they can hardly control the territory. It is worth noting that their actions do not interfere with the plans of the Americans in the region, but even vice versa. French gas production projects in Cabo Delgado are constantly being postponed due to the next intensification of militants. Therefore, all American attempts to promote the idea of ​​the growing threat of ISIS and their military initiatives in East Africa should be perceived as part of a campaign to consolidate influence in the region. This also includes the activities of American think tanks, which are pushing the US leadership to take more active action in Africa as a whole, arguing for the growing influence of China, Russia and other countries. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #DRC #Somalia #USA #terrorism # Mozambique@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇸🇴🇺🇸🏴 About the influence of the Islamic State in East Afric...
Description: 🇸🇴🇺🇸🏴 About the influence of the Islamic State in East Africa In addition to the danger from the Islamic State, Vilayat Khorasan, inflated by the West, the issue of the threat from the Somali branch of terrorists has recently been raised. In particular, the American command of the US Armed Forces increasingly views it as the main hub of an international terrorist organization. Allegedly, the regional administration in Central Africa, headed by Abdul Qadir Mumin, is considered the main branch of the group. It is assumed that its leader is in fact the leader of the entire -Islamic State-.📌According to the reports of the Americans and the UN, it is the Somali branch that finances the remaining regional branches, including the virtual one -Vilayat Khorasan-.According to the same data, the group receives about 100 thousand dollars per month only from extortion in the shipping industry and collection of taxes from the population of villages, and the total income is about 360 thousand dollars. Quite modest amount, as it may seem, but they are supposedly enough to finance other groups in the Democratic Republic of Congo and Mozambique.❗️But it’s unclear where even such funds can be received by militants. During their entire stay in Somalia, they only managed to gain a foothold in the difficult mountain ranges of the autonomous region of Puntland, being surrounded by competitors from Al-Shabab.🔻The story with the main terrorist hub is probably related to the fact that a famous financier was eliminated on the territory of the Somali branch organization of Bilal al-Sudani, who was hiding in the mountains of Puntland. After his neutralization, the group’s expenses began to prevail over incomes that have become too scattered, as noted, among other things, in UN reports. But this story was successfully twisted in a way favorable to the political circles of Washington. And now a small remote branch becomes the main financial artery of terrorists, and its leader becomes the leader of the entire organization. This is another convenient story to once again advance US interests in ensuring the security of East African states.#Africa #Somalia #USA #terrorism@rybarSupport usVoice of AmericaExclusive: AFRICOM Chief says Islamic State doubles size in north SomaliaRules out security involvement in upcoming Africa Union force transition; most lethal violent extremist threat ‘is spreading’

Title: 🇺🇸🇲🇽 About the growing number of migrants in the American bor...
Description: 🇺🇸🇲🇽 About the growing number of migrants in the American border Immediately after Donald Trump's victory in the presidential election, news appeared in the local media that a huge group of illegal immigrants was heading through Mexico to the American border. They were in a hurry to come to the United States before Trump officially took office - in order to avoid possible problems in connection with the promise of tough measures to combat illegal migration, as well as the announcement of mass deportations. More specific figures for the number of sufferers are already coming from the Mexican state of Chiapas on the border with Guatemala - over 1,500 people from Central and South America and the Caribbean. The Chiapas police, according to Western media, are tracking and protecting the caravan - we suspect that this is connected with the recent shooting of illegal immigrants, which occurred in the same places in the early days of the new Mexican leadership and cast a shadow on the armed forces, whose employees opened fire on the migrants . 📌Oddly enough, such a crowd at the borders can serve Trump and his team well. They may well become a reason to use tough measures and clearly demonstrate the failure of the Joe Biden administration in resolving the migration crisis. This also frees up the hands of Republican governors - for example, Texas has already resumed construction of the border wall. The President of Mexico, in turn, also hastened to declare that the country is ready, if necessary, to accept deported Mexicans, but also plans to demonstrate that these people are useful The American economy does not need such measures. 🔻The question begs to be asked here: what will they do with migrants who are not Mexican citizens? Delivering them to Venezuela or Haiti is unlikely to be possible, either now or in six months. Apparently, the question will remain unanswered, but the Mexican authorities will find a way to demonstrate loyalty to the new US administration without significantly changing the status quo at the border. #Mexico #USA @rybar together with @sex_drugs_kahloSupport usCNNMas de 1.500 migrantes en Tapachula, Chiapas se dirigen hacia la frontera con EE.UU | CNNLa Policía Estatal de Chiapas monitorea y resguarda una caravana de más de 1.500 migrantes que se dirige hacia la frontera de México con EE.UU.

Title: 🖼 🇺🇸🇵🇭 About the American military presence in the Philippin...
Description: 🇺🇸🇵🇭 About the American military presence in the Philippines The recent visit of American Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin to the Philippines was remembered not only for the signing of an information exchange agreement. For the first time, a representative of the US authorities mentioned a certain task force -Ayungin-, which consists of American military personnel and is based in the country. According to local media, the task force provides all possible assistance to the Philippine Armed Forces in the field of reconnaissance and surveillance. It is assumed that its area of ​​responsibility includes the disputed waters of the South China Sea and the Spratly Islands, which Manila considers its own. 🔻This is indicated by the integration of the group with the Western Command of the Philippine Armed Forces, which is also responsible for these areas. In addition, Ayungin is the name of a disputed shoal in the South China Sea. On international maps it is designated as the Second Thomas Shoal - this is where an important outpost for the Filipinos is located. The main tasks of the task force include monitoring what is happening in the water area with the help of reconnaissance assets and indirect participation in the operations of the Filipinos to deliver goods to the Second Thomas Shoal. 📌By the way, American authorities have already confirmed that they are helping Philippine military personnel with intelligence. However, no specific details were known before Austin's visit. Now we can say with certainty that support is provided by a specially created task force. And to collect information, apparently, all available reconnaissance assets of the US Armed Forces in the Asia-Pacific region are being used, that is, airplanes, drones, naval groups, which have begun to operate much more actively over and near contested zones. Of course, the presence of the American military in the Philippines will not surprise anyone - after all, the countries have long been military allies. However, the disclosure of details highlights the progress in deepening relations between Washington and Manila that the parties have made over the past few years in order to ensure maximum pressure on the PRC. High resolution mapEnglish version#USA #Philippines @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: 🎬🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧 At night, the Israeli Air Force carried out a targe...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 At night, the Israeli Air Force carried out a targeted strike on the Al-Basta al-Fawqa area in central Beirut. The hit was on an eight-story building where a meeting was taking place between Hezbollah commanders. ▪️During the raid, 11 people were killed and another 33 were injured. According to the Saudi TV channel Al Hadath, the target could have been the commander of the sabotage Unit 910, Talal Hamiya, whom some had already -buried- in September this year.▪️The British edition of Sky News, citing Israeli sources, also reports the neutralization of Muhammad Haidar (-Abu Ali Haydar-) - head of the operational department of Hezbollah, as well as in fact the new chief of the general staff organization.▪️It is also possible that the Israelis tried to eliminate the Secretary General of Hezbollah, Sheikh Naim Qassem, who was appointed as such after the death of Hassan Nasrallah. However, this version is currently the least possible. The Israel Defense Forces have not yet reported details, limiting themselves to a daily report on attacks on the infrastructure of the Shiite group in the Ad-Dahiya neighborhood in the southern suburbs of the Lebanese capital. Hezbollah's resources also remain silent. However, given the effectiveness of such attacks by Israeli aircraft, just a day later Hezbollah will name the high-ranking martyr who died on the way to Al-Quds (Jerusalem). #Israel #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇬🇧🇨🇾 Speaking of the Watchkeeper WK-450 drones, which will be...
Description: 🇬🇧🇨🇾 Speaking about the Watchkeeper WK-450 drones, which will be written off to save money in the British Ministry of Defense, it should be added that, in addition to those cases of operation in Afghanistan and over the English Channel mentioned by Janes, there was another one. For almost five years about 2-3 UAVs of this type were regularly deployed in the Mediterranean Sea from the British Akrotiri airbase on the island of Cyprus. They were used to an extremely limited extent around Cyprus, but not further. It was difficult to say whether this was due to their defects or other shortcomings, but they had no practical use. As of October 2024, the pair of drones that were there are no longer noted, preparing to be decommissioned. Currently, reconnaissance missions in the interests of the British Crown are carried out by manned Shadow.R1 aircraft, of which there are two on Akrotiri. But in comparison with American aviation, the British have everything quite meager in this regard. #Great Britain #Cyprus@rybarSupport usTelegramWings of War🇬🇧 The British Air Force will write off the Watchkeeper WK-450 Mk1 UAV and a number of other platforms to save money. Title: 🔁 🛡🇵🇱🇺🇸 The Poles, by the way, use this provocation as best...
Description: Forwarded From Warsaw mermaid🛡🇵🇱🇺🇸 The Poles, by the way, use this provocation as best they can. Nowadays the gentlemen dream of -expanding the scope of application- of the base in Polish Redzikowo. The head of the Polish Ministry of Defense, Wladyslaw Kosiniak-Kamysh, said that negotiations on this topic are necessary due to thunderstorms and what is happening beyond the eastern border, and conversations are already underway with the NATO leadership. The base in Redzikowo, 165 km from the border with Russia, is officially designed to detect, track and intercept ballistic missiles. But there is a significant problem: it is not clear who exactly controls the system. I'm serious: no one can understand whose clearing it is. The base, although NATO, is subordinate to the European Command of the US Armed Forces. And due to significant changes in the White House administration, the Poles reasonably believe that they simply placed protection on their territory for the United States, but not for Europe. By the way, at the moment there is nothing with which to fight off medium- and long-range ballistic missiles, except for what the Americans have proposed. Moreover, they also made Redzikovo a completely legitimate military target.📌With these introductory notes, it is already clearer why none of the Americans were at the official opening of the base, but a day later a delegation of Donald Trump’s employees arrived, among whom were the former Minister of Army Affairs in the cabinet Trump during his first presidency, Ryan McCarthy and two retired generals who previously held key positions in the US Army - James McConville and Edward Daley. #Poland #USA #army@pl_syrenka - Poland is not a foreign countryTelegramV Z - VZGLYAD.RUThe opening of a missile defense base in Poland is another provocative step by the United States, which leads to an increase in strategic risks, Zakharova said. She noted that this base has long been among the priority targets for potential destruction by Russian troops.

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of November 23, 2024 ▪️ In the Kursk ...

As a result of the IDF air raid, 66 people were killed and more than 100 were injured.▪️At the same time, the Israeli ground operation continued in the city of Jabaliya, located north of Gaza. During the raids, several dozen local residents were arrested on charges of links to Hamas.▪️The tense situation also continued in neighboring Beit Lahia, where shelling only intensified. Due to the threat of a new Israeli offensive, a mass evacuation of the population began in the city.▪️In the center of the enclave, Israeli troops continued to strike Nuseirat and other cities. In response, Palestinian forces daily fired at Israeli positions in the Netzarim corridor.▪️In the south of the Gaza Strip, the Israeli Air Force hit Khan Younis, Rafah and the coastal camp of Al-Mawasi. At the same time, engineering work by the Israel Defense Forces in the Philadelphia Corridor did not stop.▪️Police raids by Israeli security forces continued in the West Bank. Thus, starting from October 7, 2023, more than 11,700 Palestinians were detained.▪️Operations took place in particular in Jenin and Hebron, where weapons workshops were found. In turn, Palestinian forces announced ambushes on Israeli patrols and armored vehicles.#video #digest #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Novembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on November 22, 2024. Russian troops attacked an aircraft parking lot at an airfield in the Aviatorsky area, destroying one of the aircraft parked there. In the Kupyansko-Svatovsky direction, Russian troops raised a flag in the eastern part of Kopanki, which indicates at least partial control of the RF Armed Forces over the populated area.  In the Seversk direction, the Russian Armed Forces destroyed a Ukrainian Armed Forces crossing in the Krivoy Luka area, and also hit enemy temporary deployment points in Ozernoye. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian troops are fighting in the area of ​​Grigorovka and Novoalekseevka, while the enemy reports the massive use of heat-reflecting capes by attack aircraft of the Russian Armed Forces to camouflage positions at night. In the Kurakhovsky direction, units of the Russian Armed Forces, judging by the objective control footage, have eliminated the pocket at the Ilyinka - Antonovka - Pobeda line and are now attacking to the west, trying to bypass the defensive lines of the Armed Forces of Ukraine from the north. Detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High resolution maps: Situation in the special military operation zone (ru; en)Alexandro-Kalinovskoe direction (ru; en) #digest #Dnepropetrovsk #report #map #Kurakhovo #Pokrovsk #Russia #Seversk #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Alexander-Kalinovsky direction: urban battles in Dzer...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Alexander-Kalinovsky direction: urban battles in Dzerzhinsk and counterattacks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Leonidovka area situation by the end of the day on November 22, 2024 In the Alexander-Kalinovsky direction, Russian troops are conducting urban battles in Dzerzhinsk, overcoming enemy defenses. The most violent clashes are taking place in the Zabalka microdistrict - some of the streets here have changed hands several times over the past month.▪️At the Dyleevka-Dachnoe line, Russian units regularly strike observation points and other enemy positions, using drones and cannon artillery. Aviation is also working in the area - in early November, the Aerospace Forces destroyed one of the temporary deployment points of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the area of ​​​​the Dyleevka railway station. ▪️In the north of Dzerzhinsk, attack aircraft of the Russian Armed Forces advanced in the private sector, knocking out the enemy from several strongholds. Without additional objective monitoring personnel, it is not possible to determine whether they managed to gain a foothold at the achieved milestones. Success in this sector will make it possible to create a semi-encirclement around enemy units in a strong point on the territory of the Shcherbinovka substation - 110/35/6 kV. ▪️In the central part of the city, fighting continues in the area of ​​Mayakovsky Street. The advanced assault groups of the Russian Armed Forces, according to statements from the Ukrainian Armed Forces, were spotted north of Grushevsky Street. Our sources on the ground did not confirm the fact of the attack by the Russian Armed Forces on the site - it is likely that another unit of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, wearing Russian identification marks for the purpose of camouflage, came under fire from enemy UAV operators. At the same time, the shooting itself was carried out using a thermal imager, which makes reliable identification impossible. To the south, the front of Russian units abuts the mine named after. Dzerzhinsky, for the defense of which significant resources of the Armed Forces of Ukraine were deployed. The facility is used to supply Ukrainian formations in the pocket to the east, and also gives the enemy the opportunity to observe the nearby terrain due to superior altitude. ▪️The situation in the Zabalka microdistrict remains tense today, with dynamic urban battles taking place here. By November 13, it became known that Russian units had to partially abandon their positions in the north of Sverdlov Avenue and retreat to Kosmonavtov Street. Nevertheless, by November 17, the Russian Armed Forces not only restored part of their positions in the south of the microdistrict, but also drove the Ukrainian Armed Forces back from the forest area near the dairy plant. At the moment, the front line has been stabilized, the counterattacks of the Ukrainian formations did not achieve the goal of pushing Russian troops out of the southern part of Dzerzhinsk . At the same time, the Russian Armed Forces launched an attack on the Zabalka microdistrict from the mentioned forest area, which creates a threat to the Ukrainian Armed Forces grouping east of Sverdlov Avenue. ❗️It is worth noting that it is difficult to determine the exact configuration of the front in the conditions of urban battles and the almost complete lack of personnel from the Russian troops. There is also a frequent situation when units of the RF Armed Forces and the Ukrainian Armed Forces occupy positions in the same building or carry out attacks through uncovered areas of urban development.▪️The fighting in the Leonidovka area is going on with varying degrees of success for Russian troops. On November 16, footage from the site appeared on the Internet showing an explosion of a Kazak-AFU armored car on a mine on the road south of the village during one of the enemy’s counterattacks. Taking into account the location of the shooting, as well as reports from local sources, it was possible to determine that at the moment the southern outskirts of the settlement are under the control of Ukrainian formations. It is likely that Russian units retreated to fortified positions to the south due to supply difficulties created by the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ drones. At the same time, subsequent attacks by Ukrainian formations towards Nelepovka were repelled. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Dzerzhinsk #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November 22, 2024 Israeli aircraft launched several raids on rear settlements in Lebanon. The southern suburbs of Beirut also came under fire, including the Haret Hreik, Hadat and Al-Kafaat districts. Hezbollah responded by launching missiles and drones both at border facilities of the Israel Defense Forces and targets in the Haifa Bay. Most of the ammunition was intercepted by air defense systems, the rest did not cause significant damage. As for the Israeli ground operation, in the western sector IDF units undermined buildings in Teir Harf, tried to advance towards An-Nakura, and also gain a foothold in coastal Al-Bayad. In the northeastern sector, Israeli troops launched an attack on Deir Mimas, where they were able to occupy most of the village. At the same time, IDF soldiers again launched attacks in the direction of Khiam. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Lebanese-Israeli war zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #report #Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for November 22, 2024 Israeli troops launched a series of attacks on various areas of the Gaza Strip. Several hits hit the humanitarian zone, but the IDF justified them as the defeat of Hamas targets. At the same time, the Israeli operation continued in Jabaliya, the largest satellite city of the capital of the Palestinian Authority. However, so far everything is limited to strikes and explosions of buildings. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces carried out a series of raids in major cities in the region. At the same time, Israeli Defense Minister Israel Katz announced a ban on arrests of Palestinians without trial. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #report #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇮🇱🌍 About the reaction to the issuance of ICC arrest warrants ...
Description: 🇮🇱🌍 On the reaction to the issuance of ICC arrest warrants for Netanyahu and GalantWe are watching with interest new statements in the context of the decision of the International Criminal Court to issue arrest warrants for war crimes in the Gaza Strip of the Prime Minister and former Minister of Defense of Israel - Benjamin Netanyahu and Yoav Galant . ▪️As we predicted yesterday, Israel decided to accuse the International Criminal Court of anti-Semitism, declaring an attempt to isolate the country and facilitate terrorist attacks. And Israeli Minister of National Security Itamar Ben-Gvir even proposed, as a response, to extend the country’s sovereignty to the West Bank .▪️Palestinian representatives expressed support for this decision, pointing out that the issuance of warrants restores hope and trust in international law. The reaction of Hamas members is also noteworthy, who not only welcomed the ICC decision, but also called on all countries to cooperate with the international organization. ▪️In the United States, they were expectedly outraged by such a decision and doubted the results of the investigation. Incumbent President Joe Biden stressed that Hamas cannot be equated with Israel and indicated continued support for the country. Supporters of the Republican Party expressed a similar position, and Senator Lindsey Graham even called for sanctions against the International Criminal Court. ▪️EU High Representative for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy Josep Borrell stated the need to implement the ICC verdict. Similar statements were published by other EU members, including the Foreign Ministries of France, Belgium and the Netherlands. However, Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban, who holds the EU presidency until the end of the year, invited Benjamin Netanyahu to visit the country, promising to refrain from implementing the ICC decision. The German government took an ambivalent position, emphasizing both its support for the International Criminal Court and its intention to continue cooperation with Israel against the backdrop of -historical responsibility-. At the same time, they postponed the issue of studying and executing the warrants until the visits of Galant and Netanyahu to the country. ▪️Press Secretary of the Russian President Dmitry Peskov refused to comment on the issuance of the ICC warrants, explaining the insignificance of both the decisions themselves and expressing doubts about the usefulness of the actions of the organization itself. ▪️Representatives of South Africa, Canada, Colombia, Jordan and Turkey also supported the ICC decision. And dissatisfaction with the issuance of warrants was expressed in Argentina, Kenya and Nigeria. 🔻As we said earlier, additional forces will now be concentrated in Israel to mobilize everyone they can under the pretext of resisting hostile pressure from the outside. And this means nothing more than the continuation of an aggressive policy against neighbors and additional difficulties for resolving the conflict in the region.#Israel@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇮🇱🇺🇸🇺🇦 About the ICC arrest warrant for Netanyahu and Galant Less than an hour ago, the International Criminal Court issued an arrest warrant for the prime minister -Minister and former Minister of Defense of Israel - Benjamin Netanyahu and Yoav Galant for war crimes committed in the Gaza Strip...

Title: 🔁 🇷🇺 Head of the Russian Presidential Council for the Developm...
Description: Forwarded From Global Studies🇷🇺 Head of the Russian Presidential Council for the Development of Civil Society and Human Rights Valery Fadeev said that the refusal to accept migrant children without knowledge of Russian into schools should not lead to their marginalization, the state should educate them if they have Russian citizenship.📌 First, before chopping everything with an axe, you need to understand that situations where foreigners who have received citizenship do not know the language occur regularly. Parents communicate in their native language at home, but children hardly speak Russian before school. This is important to realize. And this applies not only to migrants in Russia. Representatives of the Russian diaspora in the countries of Central Asia have the same situation. In Kazakhstan, the majority of the Russian-speaking population also does not know Kazakh. The situation is the same in Kyrgyzstan, and no one expels them for this or prohibits them from living in the country. It is necessary to adapt the conditions for those who are really committed to living in our country legally, and then there will be an opportunity to improve the situation as a whole.❗️But it is important to emphasize: without knowledge of the Russian language, studying in Russian schools should be prohibited, since it slows down the learning process. And this is not discrimination; it is simply necessary to create conditions for newly-minted citizens to correct the situation themselves. For example, if parents do not bother with this in their homeland, then mandatory paid courses for children to study the Russian language should be organized. The amount should be symbolic, but only under this condition can one hope for a result. And at the very beginning it is worth checking those who received a passport of a Russian citizen without knowing the Russian language and on what grounds this happened. If the situation was illegal, then this should be followed by deprivation of citizenship and expulsion from the country, followed by a ban on entry. And with the right systematic approach, one can hope to correct the current situation. #migrants #RussiaGlobalistics - subscribe to the Telegram channel before anyone else. Well, almost.❗️The refusal to accept migrant children without knowledge of Russian into schools should not lead to their marginalization; the state should be involved in their education if they have Russian citizenship. This was stated by the head of the Presidential Council for the Development of Civil...

Title: 🖼 🇵🇰🏴 On a new terrorist attack in Pakistan and an extremist ...
Description: 🇵🇰🏴 About a new terrorist attack in Pakistan and problems of an extremist nature Yesterday another terrorist attack occurred in Pakistan, a little more than a week after another major attack. Unidentified militants attacked a convoy in Kurram Agency in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Province. As a result, 39 people were killed and another 28 were killed. No one claimed responsibility for this attack, however, unlike what is happening in the province of Balochistan, this time there is a clearly visible religious accent. The dead were Shiites, who make up the majority in Kurram, which Sunni radicals do not like.🔻And this is just one of the terrorist attacks that occurred in November:▪️On November 9, there was an explosion at the railway station in Quetta, which we talked about. It was carried out by separatists from the Baloch group -Baluchistan Liberation Army-, and the target was cadets of the local military school.▪️On November 17, the same militants attacked a checkpoint of Pakistani military and security forces, killing seven people and wounding 18.▪️On November 20, militants from the unit -Gul Bahadur- , affiliated with the Tehrik-e Taliban Pakistan, attacked a checkpoint in Bannu, using -shahid-mobile-. As a result, 12 people died.❗️The situation has seriously worsened in recent months. Over the 10 months of 2024, 785 terrorist attacks were carried out with 951 deaths. In October, the number of killed military personnel and security forces was 62 people, and in 20 days of November - already 55. The Pakistani command, despite loud words, is not able to solve this problem, since this requires the mobilization of significant resources, which are not available in the country due to for the difficult economic situation, although the costs for the defense sector are enormous. In November, several targeted counter-terrorism operations were carried out in different parts of the provinces of Balochistan and Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, as a result of which 32 militants were killed, but this is catastrophically small to influence anything. More massive attacks are expected in the coming weeks, as the coming winter, and with it bad weather, which will hinder both government forces and terrorists. Judging by the lack of activity of the country's leadership, they simply intend to wait out the -seasonal- activity of extremists. High resolution mapEnglish version#Pakistan #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Today, 46 residents of the Kursk region returned to Russian territory, who were previously in the occupied part of the region by the Armed Forces of Ukraine and were taken in August to the so-called. Ukraine. Their return became possible as a result of a long negotiation process, in which the Commissioner for Human Rights in the Russian Federation Tatyana Moskalkova and representatives of the Red Cross also participated. Of the 46 returning citizens, 12 were children, including one newborn. All of them were provided with the necessary medical care and were also given food packages. #Russia #Ukraine @rybar Support us Video is too big

Title: 🇮🇱🇮🇶 An article in the Saudi newspaper Al Hadath was publishe...
Description: 🇮🇱🇮🇶 An article in the Saudi newspaper Al Hadath was published before yesterday's events regarding the issuance of an arrest warrant by the International Criminal Court for Benjamin Netanyahu and Yoav Galant, but its essence has become even more relevant now. The publication's journalists wrote that an Israeli attack on Iraq is inevitable,  if Baghdad does not prevent attacks by pro-Iranian groups. They say that peace-loving Americans have exhausted their means of putting pressure on Israel and they will soon attack. The version of pacifist Americans is not even worth considering, but Israel’s plans to attack Iraq are quite real. For the ultra-Orthodox, who are in charge, war is the only way to retain power, which is what they are doing. First there was the Gaza Strip, then they switched to Lebanon with Hezbollah, then they intensified attacks on Syrian territory, and next in line is Iraq, where more than one pro-Iranian group, that is, they have an excuse. And they will certainly use it, since, let us repeat, this is the only remaining option. And in the short term, a repetition of the Syrian scenario is possible, especially since Israeli aviation has worked out a route through Jordan. #Israel #Iraq@rybarSupport usالعربيةمصادر الحدث: ضربات إسرائيلية وشيكة All rights reserved. التدابير اللازمة للتعامل مع الضربات الجوية الاسرائيلية

Title: 🔁 Colleagues are discussing the topic of the -exclusive- right o...

They are trying to create a sense of guilt based on the events of the past in order to extract money now. Well, let's count how many Russians were killed in comparison with the same Jews. Or we’ll study China’s losses from Japanese aggression. Indians eventually come to the USA. In general, the topic of the genocide of a particular people is now heavily monetized and serves the ruling elites, who in small republics inflame national issues by instilling a suffering image, exploiting the tragedies of the past. Title: 🇺🇸🇵🇭 In the administration of the American President, they do...
Description: 🇺🇸🇵🇭 The American presidential administration is not wasting the rest of its time and continues to strengthen relations with partner countries in the Asia-Pacific region. US Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin visited the Philippines this week, where the parties confirmed their intentions to deepen cooperation and concluded an important agreement. We are talking about an agreement on the exchange of military information. Now it will be easier for Filipinos and Americans to share and use intelligence information with each other. ▪️The main beneficiary of the agreement is, of course, the Philippines. The country's intelligence means are many times inferior to American capabilities, which complicates operations in the South China Sea. By the way, most likely, Washington agreed to conclude such an agreement precisely to provide further assistance to the authorities in Manila in countering the plans of the PRC in the disputed waters. 🔻In the Philippines, they can thus access data from American satellites. They will be extremely useful when planning operations in the South China Sea, because sometimes Chinese coast guard ships turn off their identification systems, making them very difficult to track. Satellite imagery can help solve this problem. Another thing that the Americans can help with is information collected by reconnaissance planes and drones that fly daily in the South China Sea from Japanese air bases. We cannot help but note the trend that has recently been clearly visible in the region. Before the inauguration of Donald Trump, Democrats continue to formalize relations with partners in the region in order to protect their legacy as much as possible. In allied countries this approach is only welcomed. However, the authorities most likely continue to have concerns that Trump's foreign policy course may turn out to be radically different.#USA #Philippines @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usINQUIRER.NETPH, US seal intel-sharing pact during Austin visitMANILA, Philippines - The Philippines and the United States signed a deal on Monday that allows the real-time sharing of highly classified intelligence and technology, further strengthening the long-running security alliance of the two countries amid shared…

Title: 🇺🇸🇷🇺🇺🇦 On the US reaction to Russia's use of a medium-range...
Description: 🇺🇸🇷🇺🇺🇦 On the US reaction to Russia’s use of the medium-range missile system - Oreshnik - Vladimir Putin’s speech yesterday about the use of the new hypersonic missile - Oreshnik - made the headlines in American newspapers - what shocked the West most was not so much the new Russian weapons, but statement by the Russian president about the escalation of the Ukrainian conflict into a global one.▪️On social networks There are speculations about who will be hit by the first Russian strike, and they are also weighing the risks of a nuclear war. It is noteworthy that the majority agrees with the theses of popular political bloggers that the people of Western countries do not want war - they are being pushed towards it by -crazy elderly politicians-.▪️As ​​for the US administration, its representatives pretended that they were not surprised by anything - White House yesterday said that the launch of a Russian missile would not have a deterrent effect on Washington’s policy towards Ukraine.▪️The Pentagon was more objective and did without bravado statements - the American Department of Defense expressed concern about the emergence of new weapons in Russia, however, they mentioned that the United States had been warned in advance about their use by the Russian side.▪️The press perceived Russia’s use of Oreshnik as ambiguous: while the New York Times rightly characterized happened - a new stage in the Russian-Ukrainian conflict - rabid propagandists from CNN launched the old barrel organ that such Russia has two or three missile launches left.▪️Donald Trump’s team and the future president himself did not pay any attention to Putin’s statements yesterday - they are now having their own war. Title: 🇺🇸🇨🇳🌏 And again about the analogue of NATO in the Asia-Pacif...
Description: 🇺🇸🇨🇳🌏 And again about the NATO analogue in the Asia-Pacific region Compared to a month earlier, the topic of the NATO analogue in the Asia-Pacific region has calmed down a little. This is due to the reasons that we described earlier, namely the lack of such plans among potential member countries of the union. 🔻However, this does not mean that such an idea may not be realized in the future. And it may take a different form, moving away from the principle of mutual defense, but retaining the main goal of containing the threat from the PRC. The recent conclusion of an agreement on the exchange of military information between the United States and the Philippines suggests such thoughts. The bloc can be created on the basis of agreements and initiatives for the exchange of intelligence information between the participating countries, which will make it possible to more effectively counter the policies of the PRC. ▪️It cannot be said that the base for such an organization is being prepared purposefully. But the parties, whether they like it or not, create some basis for this. For example, some of the members of the Five Eyes organization are located in the Asia-Pacific region. QUAD, which includes the United States, Japan, Australia and India, already has an initiative to more effectively monitor what is happening in their waters. In 2023, a mechanism for the exchange of intelligence data between Washington, Seoul and Tokyo was launched. Officially, it is needed to counter the DPRK, but if the parties wish, it will not be difficult for the parties to reorient it towards China. 📌By the way, in the same year, the media wrote that the USA, Japan and Taiwan would exchange information received from sea drones. So far the materials have not been confirmed, but the appearance of such articles means that there may be discussions about this. Of course, there are limitations to creating such an organization. However, a softer analogue of NATO in the Asia-Pacific region may better coincide with the positions of potential participating countries that are not interested in a direct military conflict with the PRC, but want to put pressure on Beijing in every possible way.#China #NATO@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usTelegramRybar🇯🇵 In Japan , it seems, are not going to abandon the idea of ​​the new Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba to create an analogue of NATO in region. ▪️The ruling Liberal Democratic Party (LDP) announced the formation of an internal party group to study this proposal.…

Title: 🎬 🇸🇸 Yesterday evening, clashes between...
Description: 🇸🇸 Yesterday evening in the capital of South Sudan, Juba, clashes occurred between government forces and subordinates of the former head of the National Security Service, General Akol Kura Kuk. However, they were short-lived. Soon after the clashes began, the rebel commander was detained and taken to the headquarters of the South Sudan People's Defense Forces. At the moment, his fate is unknown.📌 Akola Kura Kuk was recently demoted from head of the National Security Service to the governor of the troubled, but native to the current president, Warab region. Many regarded this as training for the president's successor, which somewhat calmed down the local population prone to riots. But the general himself took it personally as such - a demotion and a reduction in powers. Because of this, he decided to overthrow the government. As we can see, the unlucky revolutionary did not succeed. Although all this was short-lived, the young state again faced instability and a struggle for power. The country has not held elections since 2011 due to persistent civil wars, and a 2018 peace treaty has failed to stop violence between ethnic groups in various regions of the country.#Africa #Russia #SouthSudan@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇲🇩🇬🇧 On the new security agreement between the UK and Moldova...
Description: 🇲🇩🇬🇧 On a new security agreement between the UK and Moldova The UK and Moldova have concluded a defense and security agreement, under which London will allocate another tranche to Chisinau to combat the -Russian threat-. In total, the British are going to allocate 7.6 million pounds.▪️The head of the British Foreign Ministry, Jvid Lammy, during his visit to Chisinau called Moldova an -important partner in the security field.- ▪️In London, funds will be allocated for the next anti-corruption project in the amount of 600 thousand pounds ($760 thousand) and 2 million pounds ($2.5 million) for cyber security. Through UN funds and other international partners, the British will allocate another 5 million pounds ($6.3 million) for humanitarian needs and assistance to Ukrainian refugees. 🔻Interestingly, the parties signed a readmission agreement under which the UK will be able to expel Moldovan citizens who arrived illegally. For example, the EU refuses to sign the readmission agreement with London. But Moldova is not yet a member of the EU, so in exchange for substantial financial assistance, Maia Sandu’s office can easily be persuaded to such agreements. After all, it will help the British authorities show their citizens that they are fighting against illegal immigrants, although the flow of Moldovans to the UK is not the largest. Let us not rule out that after such an issue is included in the agenda of Moldovan-British relations in London, in the future they may discuss the possibility of deporting not only Moldovan illegal immigrants to Moldova. At least, such negotiations with Armenia are already known.  🔻Moldova for Great Britain remains only a buffer zone in the conflict with Russia. It is the British who are credited with the desire to resolve the Transnistrian issue by force. Considering the recently revealed facts about the existence of an anti-Russian military lobby in the UK, which is promoting the escalation of the conflict with Russia to the so-called. For Ukraine, it is quite logical for the British to push through a military scenario for Moldova as well. At a minimum, for this purpose there are already financial injections into Sandu’s entourage and open work of British intelligence in the Moldovan direction. #Great Britain #Moldova #Transnistria #Russia@rybarSupport usTACCBritain announced the establishment of a defense partnership with Moldova. The parties also entered into a readmission agreement, thanks to which the UK will be able to return Moldovan citizens who arrived illegally to their homeland

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of November 22, 2024 ▪️ The main even...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of November 22, 2024▪️ The main event of the past day was the use by the Russian Armed Forces of a medium-range ballistic missile - Oreshnik - (speed - Mach 10, 2.5-3 kilometers per second) and the ultimatum from the Supreme Commander, addressed to as much for Ukraine as for its Western masters, who openly allowed the Ukrainian Armed Forces to use ATACMS and Storm Shadow missiles against Bryansk and Kursk regions, respectively. The Yuzhmash plant in Dnepropetrovsk, which has been producing rocket technology since Soviet times, was hit. It is significant that shortly before the strike, Moscow warned Washington about the launch in order to avoid the accidental start of a nuclear war. From an information point of view, the event was out of the ordinary; Western politicians and the public reacted violently to the events.▪️ Heavy fighting continues in the Kursk region. The group of troops - North - advanced in the area of ​​the settlement with heavy fighting. Daryino and forest areas near the settlement. Malaya Loknya. 3 Ukrainian servicemen were captured. The total number of prisoners of the Ukrainian Armed Forces is 475 people. 2 counterattacks of the Ukrainian Armed Forces using armored vehicles were repelled: in the village. Novoivanovka and in the area of ​​the settlement. Daryino.▪️ In the Kharkov direction, the next attacks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Liptsovsk direction were reflected, the enemy lost personnel and armored vehicles, and did not achieve success. Fighting continues in Volchansk near the area of ​​high-rise buildings.▪️ In the north of the Kurakhovsky direction, battles for the settlement are reported. Birch trees. To the south of Kurakhovo, the Russian Armed Forces established a foothold in the settlement. Farther, which cuts the defense pocket of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in two and creates a threat to the cascade of villages near the river. Dry Yaly. ▪️ In the Vremevsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are fighting on the approaches to Razdolny and Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka, advancing from Novodonetsky and Yasnaya Polyana. From Razdolny, our troops pose a threat of cutting off the enemy in Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka from the main road to the north (Bogatyr settlement). Judging by the LBS diagram, the road is already under the fire control of the Russian Armed Forces.▪️ At night, at least 11 enemy aircraft-type UAVs were destroyed over the Bryansk region.▪️ The governor of the Kaluga region reported that at night on the outskirts of Kaluga, 6 UAVs were destroyed by air defense systems, and one UAV was destroyed in Dzerzhinsky area. ▪️ In the DPR, as a result of an attack by the Armed Forces of Ukraine on the settlement. Gorlovka (Tsentralno-Gorodskaya district) two 155 mm cluster shells injured 12 civilians. In Donetsk, as a result of a PFM mine explosion  -Lepestok- on the street. Yuzhnogornyatskaya, a man born in 1949 was injured. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramRybar🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the ICBM strike on DnepropetrovskTonight, Russian troops carried out another attack on Ukrainian territories. The most important was the strike on the YuzhMash industrial enterprise in Dnepropetrovsk, during which intercontinental missiles could have been used...

Title: 🎬 ❗️🌍🎞 Exacerbation of the situation in the Middle East: event...
Description: ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week of November 15 - 21, 2024▪️Pro-Iranian formations from Iraq again launched UAVs into Israel. The press service of the Israeli army reported on the interception of kamikaze drones in the southern part of the country. ▪️Later, pro-Iranian forces repeated the drone launch in Eilat. This time the drone was able to fly to the outskirts of the city. Where he was shot down by an Israeli air defense missile. It is noteworthy that one of the missiles lost its trajectory and fell within the boundaries of a populated area.▪️Even later, another launch of drones from Iraq took place in Eilat. For the third time during the period under review, the drone did not reach the city. Apparently, it was intercepted either over the territory of Jordan, or even fell in Iraq. Already on Wednesday, pro-Iranian groups launched drones, this time across the northern part of Israel. However, unlike Eilat, it was not possible to fly to the territory of the country.▪️The Yemeni Houthis once again announced drone strikes on Eilat. However, their UAVs did not reach their targets. There were no reports of any hits in the city or air defense operations during this time. They were probably intercepted by the American coalition.▪️The Yemeni Houthis reported an attack on the cargo ship Anadolu S, which had previously allegedly entered one of the Israeli ports. There is no footage yet that could not only confirm the damage to the ship, but also the fact of the attack itself.▪️The Israeli Air Force once again struck the western outskirts of Damascus. The target, according to statements from Syrian opposition sources, was an apartment where Hezbollah representatives were located. ▪️Israeli troops once again carried out an airstrike on the border crossing between Lebanon and Syria. This, like previous similar strikes, is associated with attempts to interrupt the supply of weapons to Hezbollah from Syria by other pro-Iranian formations.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovo direction: battles for Kurakhovo and the ...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovo direction: battles for Kurakhovo and the liberation of a number of settlements situation to the end November 21, 2024 In the Kurakhovsky direction, Russian troops continue their successful advance in three areas in the Kurakhovo area, isolating the Ukrainian Armed Forces garrison in the city from three directions at once, increasingly squeezing ring of encirclement.▪️In the northern On the flank, Russian troops liberated most of Novodmitrovka and hold approximately half of Sontsovka, the capture of which will open the way to Starye Terny. At the same time, the fighters liberated Novoselidovka and the fields to the west of it: in the village itself, the movement of infantry of the Russian Armed Forces was recorded, and the fighting shifted to the south.▪️Near the northern shore of the Kurakhovsky reservoir, Russian units from the 5th Motorized Rifle Brigade liberated Novaya Ilyinka and started fighting for Berestki, moving along towards Starye Terny, from where the path to the exit opens to the rear of the Ukrainian positions in the center of Kurakhovo.▪️In Kurakhovo itself, Russian troops hoisted flags on the territory of the energy site of the Maryinskaya Distribution Zone near Zaporozhye Avenue directly in the city. 🔻According to unconfirmed information, fighting is already taking place in the area of ​​the Kurakhovsky elevator and bus station, located in the city center near the bridge to Novaya Ilyinka. To the southeast, attack aircraft are advancing along the Dolgaya ravine - some time ago, during the battle, an important stronghold was taken under control, which precedes the path to the southern outskirts of the city. To the south, Russian troops finally liberated Dalneye with the forces of soldiers of the 102nd regiment of the 150th motorized rifle division of the 8th OA. And during the raid of a Russian armored vehicle in the fields north of Ilyinka, it was possible to establish a more accurate configuration of the front at the Dalneye - Pobeda line.▪️ At the same time, on the southern flank from Bogoyavlenka, a successful attack was noted by the assault group of the 2nd battalion of the 39th Guards Motorized Rifle Brigade. The fighters expanded the zone of control and occupied part of the enemy positions in the grove - Lesnaya Dacha - south of Vesely Gai, the complete clearing of which will allow them to bypass the Ukrainian Armed Forces fortifications near Elizavetovka from the rear.▪️ At the same time, a few days earlier, Russian troops entered Trudovoye and hoisted a flag on the southern outskirts of the village . Currently, clashes continue in the locality. To the west, the control zone has been expanded in the fields near Maksimovka and along the O0510 highway, where Ukrainian formations are trying to carry out counterattacks and fire at the forward lines of defense of the Russian Armed Forces. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Donetsk #Kurakhovo #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November 21, 2024 The Israeli Air Force once again struck the Ad-Dahiya neighborhood in Beirut. In total, the Israelis destroyed at least 260 buildings in the southern suburbs of the Lebanese capital. According to the Lebanese Ministry of Health, since the beginning of the Israeli military operation - Arrows of the North - 3,558 residents of the country have been killed, another 15,123 were injured. Fighters of the Lebanese Hezbollah launched a missile strike in Nahariya: most of the ammunition was intercepted, but one fell on a playground in the city. An Israeli was killed. In the western sector, Israeli units attacked in the direction of Al-Bayada; to the south, parts of Teir Harfa and Abu Shesh were occupied. In the northeastern sector there are battles on the southeastern outskirts of Khiam. Title: 🎬 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Well, Vladimir Putin revealed the details of today's ...

The attack was a response to US plans for the production of medium- and shorter-range missiles at the facility. The President also stated that in the event of an escalation, Russia will respond decisively and in a mirror manner, and targets for destruction will be selected depending on threats to the country’s security. It is characteristic that previously there was no information about Oreshnik in open sources, and even many specialized experts today about heard it for the first time. This means that the complex was developed without understatement in the strictest secrecy.❗️Vladimir Putin also directly stated that Russia has the right to use weapons against military facilities of those countries that give permission to use their long-range weapons to strike Russian territory. Title: 🖼 🇸🇴The situation in the Horn of Africa: elections in Somalila...
Description: 🇸🇴The situation in the Horn of Africa: elections in Somaliland and discord in Jubalandes summary for October 22 - November 21, 2024 Last month in the Horn of Africa was marked by the formation of an anti-Ethiopian pact, which slightly constrained the Ethiopians in their ability to influence Somalia. And this trend, where the Addis Ababa government is losing its position, continues.▪️The elections held in Somaliland made adjustments to the subsequent situation in the region. An opposition group came to power, open to dialogue with the federal authorities of Somalia and refusing the intervention of foreign powers. The latter means opposition to the Ethiopian authorities in influencing Somaliland, which Addis Ababa wanted to use as a logistics port for their needs.▪️But at the same time this triggered a new round of constitutional crisis, which led to a break between the leadership of autonomous Jubaland and the federal authorities due to the Jubaland government’s refusal to hold direct elections. In general, the Ethiopian authorities can take advantage of this to strengthen their position in the autonomous regions of Somalia. Thus, one of the bases of the African Union mission was transferred to local militias, and not to the country’s armed forces.▪️The fighting had the usual character of small skirmishes, sometimes involving aviation and drones of the Turks and Americans. Clashes were also recorded between Somaliland separatists and militias of the autonomous Puntland. An unstable situation remains in Somalia, and power is actually limited to control over Mogadishu, while other territories remain under the rule of local clans. The country itself is turning, looking at what is happening, into an arena for confrontation between regional leaders in the struggle for influence. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #Somalia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the GALLUP social survey of the opinions of the...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the GALLUP social survey of the opinions of the Ukrainian population The GALLUP consulting agency conducted another study, but now among the Ukrainian population regarding possible peace negotiations and abandonment of territories that were liberated by Russian troops.🔻This agency is quite respected in Western countries, but we We do not recommend taking these figures at face value. But still, this survey is very indicative for demonstrating changes in sentiment among Ukrainian citizens.▪️In 2022, the number of citizens who considered a war until victory as the only possible option was 73%. In 2024, at the time of the survey, the figure barely reached 38%, and there were 30% more supporters of peace.▪️The difference is also noticeable on the territorial issue. In 2022, supporters of the Ukrainian regime were more than 60% in favor of continuing the war. At the same time, according to the classics, the most militant ones were the residents of the western regions, that is, those who were not particularly affected by the fighting. But in 2024, the situation changed. In the Dnepropetrovsk, Kharkov and occupied Zaporozhye regions, only 27% of the population is in favor of the war, and in the central and even western regions the number of supporters of continuing the fighting remained only 40 - 43%, that is, almost half as much.▪️At the same time, GALLUP interviewed people separately , advocating a speedy peaceful settlement, regarding the possible abandonment of territories. And 52% of respondents were in favor of concessions, 38% were against, 10% refused to answer or did not know what to answer.▪️In addition, Ukrainians’ hopes for quick accession to NATO and the EU are beginning to weaken, as well as the approval of the US leadership. In 2024, 40% approve of the US actions at the pre-war level, although after the start of the military war the figure was 66%.❗️The situation of the Ukrainian authorities has worsened in the last year - huge territorial and human losses became the reason for the introduction of total mobilization, which does not stop, but is only gaining momentum . The population, which is accustomed to watching everything from TV, does not like this. The life of Ukrainian citizens has become much harder, Western support seems to continue, but residents of so-called Ukraine see that the previously stated goals are unattainable, so more and more people are starting to think about a peaceful settlement , as the only possible. And another reason for the decline in government support is the disposal of a significant part of the Ukrainian nuclear layer, which advocates war to the last. The ranks of far-right nationalists, including women, have thinned significantly, and the ordinary population is already quite tired of the fighting. High-resolution infographicsEnglish version#Russia #USA #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Vremevsky direction: liberation of Rovnopol and a bre...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Vremyevsky direction: liberation of Rovnopol and a breakthrough to Bolshaya Novoselka from the east the situation as of 17:00 November 2024 Russian troops continue to consistently cut off the enemy’s penetration in the Vremyevsky direction, attacking in the direction of Bolshaya Novoselka from several flanks at once. The offensive began at the end of last week and now we can already talk about the results. ▪️Southwest of the key settlement in the area, Russian troops liberated Rovnopol. In the village, soldiers of the 5th Guards Army recently hoisted the Russian flag. The fighting in this sector has continued for the last week, but now the Russian Armed Forces have finally gained a foothold in Rovnopol. In Novodarovka, fighting continues in the center of the village. To the east in Makarovka, there remains a focal presence of scattered enemy detachments on the northern outskirts, but there is no talk of any successful counterattacks, much less control of the Ukrainian Armed Forces over the populated area.▪️From Yasnaya Polyana and Shakhterskoye, a very significant advance was noted towards Razdolnoye. Several forest belts, as well as strongholds, came under the control of Russian troops. In fact, now units of the 40th Infantry Brigade and the 5th Tank Brigade managed to reach the outskirts of Razdolnoye, and the 139th Infantry Brigade managed to bypass the settlement from the north from the side of the Nalivach and Shulicha gullies, almost reaching the T-05-18 highway. Some of the strongholds to the southeast were taken without any problems, and at some the Ukrainian formations are desperately resisting.▪️South of Razdolny, according to available data, in some areas it was possible to move up to five and a half kilometers to the west south of the Maltabar gully. The Russian Armed Forces were able to reach almost the outskirts of Bolshaya Novoselka, advancing along the O0510 road. It is between the Kashlagach River and the highway that the greatest advance of Russian troops is recorded. In the interval between the Kashlagach and Shaitanka rivers, the enemy was also knocked out of several forest belts. South of Shaitanka, west of Novodonetskoye, there are also noticeable successes, where units of the 37th Motorized Rifle Brigade are advancing: the advance was about five kilometers in the direction of Blagodatnoye. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot. Title: 🇫🇷🌾 In France, protests by farmers against the EU agreement co...
Description: 🇫🇷🌾 In France, protests by farmers against the EU agreement with the MERCOSUR countries on the removal of customs duties on their agricultural products continue for the fifth day. The protests began on Sunday at the call of the main agricultural trade union FNSEA.🔻Protests related to the discussion of a free trade agreement between the EU and MERCOSUR are timed to coincide with Macron’s visit to Argentina and the G20 summit in Brazil, but have every chance of continuing after events. On Sunday, in unison with their German colleagues, French business executives blocked the border in Strasbourg - the Kehl Bridge. Ports in Le Havre, Rouen and Bordeaux are also blocked. A march of farmers to Brussels is planned for Monday. 🔻The protesters represent different interests: ▪️The main trade union of farmers, FNSEA, represents large farmers and the agro-industrial complex, who do not need competition in the form of cheaper, more massive products from Latin America and stuffed with pesticides banned in the EU. Of the 178 pesticides used in Brazil, 138 are banned in France, the French Corn Society proved in March. However, it is the difference in phytosanitary standards that makes these products much cheaper, and everyone understands that, due to inflation, the French will buy them. ▪️The more conservative and radical trade union Coordination Rurale, well represented in southwestern France, including near the city of Agen, represents small and medium-sized livestock farms that are already losing money due to the import of Ukrainian agricultural products into the EU, including chicken meat. Any duty-free quotas from Latin America - and now we are talking about 98,000 tons of beef, 25,000 tons of pork and 160,000 tons of chicken - would be a death sentence. In recent days, farmers have marched on tractors in the regional centers of southwestern France: Oche, Perigueux, Limoges, Bordeaux, Pau, Nimes, Rodez, Guere, and also reminded of themselves in the middle cities of Brittany, and the cities of the northeast of the country. In rural areas, farmers disable road cameras - however, since 2013, they have suffered at every mass protest. And in the suburb of Bordeaux - Pessac - brave suppliers of agricultural products break into councils, confiscate EU flags and burn them.❗️So far, it seems, there is a simple warm-up with symbolic actions, but they are overlaid with general dissatisfaction with the policies pursued to please the world transnational elites, the plight of farmers and winemakers after a rainy summer and political instability in France after parliamentary early elections at the end of June.🔻The French themselves do not support the protests of the farmers, but they do not interfere either. According to polls, 81% of the local population supports the rallies, and 75% are opposed to signing an agreement with MERCOSUR in principle. But most EU governments are in favor of the initiative, including industrialists in Germany and Spain, where they are looking to Latin American markets as a salvation from the EU's own recession. Poland (where the agrarians are also strong) and Italy may join France in the protest front against the treaty. #France@rybar together with @fifthrepublicSupport usTelegramFifth Republic

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kupyansk-Svatovsk direction: breakthrough of the Ukra...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kupyansko-Svatovsk direction: breakthrough of the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ defense to the west of Petropavlovka and assault on Kupyansksituation as of 17:00 on November 21, 2024. The Kupyansko-Svatovsk direction in the past weeks was marked by an intensification of hostilities and a breakthrough of Russian troops into Kupyansk itself. While fighting is going on in the city in the eastern part, to the south the Russian Armed Forces are gradually pushing through the defenses of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the area of ​​Kolesnikovka and Zagryzovo. ▪️In mid-November, Russian troops broke through the defenses of Ukrainian formations northwest of Petropavlovka. The offensive began during the rotation of Ukrainian Armed Forces units, which did not allow them to organize defense and quickly transfer reserves due to a shortage of manpower. 🔻As a result of a successful attack, the entire forest area and the Kulagovo railway station came under the control of the Russian Armed Forces, which Russian attack aircraft subsequently relied on to advance to Kupyansk. After the liberation of the station territory, the Russian Armed Forces began an offensive along the railway track, taking advantage of the elevation changes and disorganization of the enemy. Soon, advanced armored groups entered the northeastern outskirts of Kupyansk and gained a foothold in the private sector. ❗️After this, one of the main goals of the Russian units became the territory of the Kupyansky feed mill, which is one of the key strongholds of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the eastern part of the city. Its release will allow the Russian Armed Forces to take under fire control the section of the N-26 highway from Kupyansk to Petropavlovka, while the object itself is protected from enemy counterattacks from the latter by an impassable peat bog. In parallel with this, the attack aircraft began to advance towards the dairy plant and sugar factory, without encountering significant resistance. Fighting broke out over the territory of both enterprises, while the enemy transferred reserve units to the site. According to available data, the Ukrainian Armed Forces managed to partially stabilize the situation and at the moment neither side has stable control over the industrial zone. ❗️It is currently difficult to determine the exact configuration of the front in the city and its surroundings. The enemy, trying to reduce the media effect of the breakthrough of the Russian Armed Forces in Kupyansk, publishes footage of objective control with a serious delay. Russian units have also so far refrained from covering the fighting in the city, focusing on the success of the operation. ▪️To the south there are battles on the outskirts of Glushkovka. Earlier, the RF Armed Forces managed to dislodge the Ukrainian Armed Forces from the territory of the Kolesnikovka station in the forest and advance north, reaching the outskirts of the village both along the left bank of Oskol and east of Kolesnikovka. Success in this sector will allow Russian troops to form a southern claw encirclement of Ukrainian Armed Forces units in the Petropavlovka-Novoosinovo sector, aimed at reaching Kupyansk-Uzlovoy, which is regularly subject to air raids by the Russian Aerospace Forces. Over the past month, the Russian Armed Forces have carried out several successful local attacks south of Berestovoe. During one of them, a Russian armored group attacked the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces from the north and landed troops that drove the enemy out of the strong point. Tactical successes were also noted in the Stelmakhovka area - several forest belts to the west of the village came under the control of the Russian Armed Forces. 🔻Probably, the main efforts of the Russian command on the southern flank of the Kupyansk-Svatovsky direction are aimed at expanding the wedge driven into the defense of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Kruglyakovka area. In the long term, it is also possible to create the preconditions for a future attack on Borovaya, another important enemy logistics hub on the left bank of the Oskol Reservoir. Simultaneously with this united front, work is also underway in the Liman direction, where the Russian Armed Forces are fighting in the Pervomaisky area, control over which is also important for the breakthrough to Borovaya.
