Title: 🇮🇱🇺🇸🇺🇦 About the ICC arrest warrant for Netanyahu and Galan...
Description: 🇮🇱🇺🇸🇺🇦 About the ICC arrest warrant for Netanyahu and Galant Less than an hour ago, the International Criminal Court issued an arrest warrant for the Prime Minister and former Minister of Defense of Israel, Benjamin Netanyahu and Yoav Galant, for war crimes committed in the Gaza Strip.🔻Since the information is confirmed by Israeli media, it can be stated that the ultra-Orthodox government of Israel with acceleration drove into the wall. In fact, this is a continuation of the confrontation, the next episode of which was the investigation against ICC Prosecutor General Karim Khan, probably initiated by supporters of the current Israeli leadership. Of course, no one will arrest Netanyahu and Galant (as well as our President Vladimir Putin). This is rather a slap in the face and a serious diplomatic blow to the reputation of the ultra-Orthodox.📌 But the ultra-Orthodox themselves and also their supporters (for example, like Chabadniks, many of whom are first-rank officials in the so-called Ukraine) will have cause for great concern. After all, for them this does not mean anything good, at least in the short term. Everything that happened is similar to the demobilization chord of those who stand behind Biden. In recent weeks, the US authorities have been doing everything that will undoubtedly affect Donald Trump after his inauguration. Granting permission to Ukrainian formations, new packages of military assistance - this was done to complicate the resolution of the conflict. Donald Trump himself has close family ties with the ultra-Orthodox, and the order against Netanyahu and Galant will also affect Trump. And this, in turn, will have an impact on the Ukrainian elite, which will be more difficult for Trump to support.❗️In the short term, the ultra-Orthodox in Israel will begin to try on the image of victims of anti-Semitism, simultaneously mobilizing everyone they can, supposedly to resist hostile pressure from the outside. That is, continue to pursue an aggressive policy against its neighbors.#Israel #USA #Ukraine@rybarSupport uswww.news1.co.ilבית הדין הפלילי בהאג הוציא צווי מעצר Please contact us, * Please: Please contact us חיילים

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇸🇾🇺🇦🏴 Another group from the Idlib terrarium reminded...
Description: 🇷🇺🇸🇾🇺🇦🏴 Another group from the Idlib terrarium reminded itself: the terrorist group Katiba al-Tawhid wal-Jihad (KTD, operating under Hayat Tahrir al-Sham) published footage of its activities in Syria. The main feature of the video was that militants began using drones to attack government forces, and the narrator particularly noted the influence of Ukrainian forces on new combat tactics using drones. According to a member of the KTD (Uzbek, judging by the language), drones have become an effective tool that is much cheaper than missiles or other weapons , but they can strike at concentrations of people, equipment and firing points, as they showed in the published footage.🔻The news that immediately comes to mind is that units of the Ukrainian The GUR trained militants in Idlib to assemble, modernize and use drones against the Russian Armed Forces and the Syrian Arab Republic. Before the appearance of this information, terrorists were not observed in the methodical use of these technologies. There were isolated episodes, but not so often. The Uzbek terrorist KTD did not directly say who trained them, but the facts in the form of hints about the success of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in this direction speak for themselves. All this once again demonstrates the influence of the special operation on the course of armed conflicts. Interest in unmanned technologies has increased due to the low cost of materials and high possibilities for their use, which is expressed not only in Syria, but also in other regions such as Africa or Myanmar.#Russia #Syria #terrorism #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🌍🇪🇸 About migrant flows to the Canaries Exacerbation of the...
Description: 🌍🇪🇸 About migrant flows to the Canary Islands The aggravation of the internal political situation in northeast Africa has caused significant changes in the routes of migration flows. In the past few years, African refugees have chosen routes not through Libya, but through the Comoros Islands, which belong to Spain. Numerous migrants from Gambia, Senegal, Mauritania and other West African countries use the services of smugglers to cross the sea. The relative cheapness and geographical accessibility attract Africans who have little to lose. Moreover, various Western NGOs calmly distribute money, which is just enough to transport them to Europe.❗However, this route is the most dangerous. According to Western analysts, approximately 95% of all fatal migration flights occur in the Atlantic. At the same time, the number of migrants does not decrease, but rather increases. So, since 2023, the number of arrivals to the Canary Islands has increased by more than 1000%.🔻This issue raises concerns in the EU. The Spanish authorities clearly do not want to see tens of thousands of illegal migrants on their territory, especially in the tourist area, which could create security problems and affect the tourist flows that bring in a lot of money. Therefore, more than 200 million euros were allocated from Europe to Mauritania to fight illegal immigrants. And the Spanish fleet participates in joint patrols with their Senegalese and Mauritanian counterparts. And, of course, this does not bring any results while there are millions of Africans living in poverty and dreaming of moving to Europe. And the financing of social programs by various NGOs only encourages people to spend the money they receive on a -new life-.High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #migration@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the ICBM strike on Dnepropetrovsk Tonight, Russ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the ICBM strike on Dnepropetrovsk Tonight, Russian troops carried out another attack on Ukrainian territories. The most important was the strike on the YuzhMash industrial enterprise in Dnepropetrovsk, during which an intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) could have been used. According to some signs, an ICBM could actually be used for this (this can be seen from the characteristic multiple warheads), which is the first successful combat use of this type of weapon in the history of military conflicts. The combat units were non-nuclear. Although there is talk on the Internet about the RS-26 Rubezh, the type of missile is not reliably known. Ukrainian formations were unable to shoot down the ICBMs, as evidenced by the arrival footage.❗️This can be called a clear signal to the sponsors of so-called Ukraine (especially on the anniversary of the Maidan) against the backdrop of Western permission to use long-range missiles. Time will tell how much they understood it. But today’s strike is truly a non-trivial move, since nothing like this has happened before. And there is reason to believe that this is not the last such application.#Dnepropetrovsk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇫🇩🇪 Ambassador of the former Afghan government to Germany Ya...
Description: 🇦🇫🇩🇪 The Ambassador of the former Afghan government to Germany, Yama Yari, and the Consul General in Bonn, Lutfullah Sadat, announced their resignation, noting that they did so under pressure from the German authorities. According to them, they were given an ultimatum: to surrender their powers or establish contacts with the authorities of the Islamic Emirate. Recently, many of this kind of pressure on the ambassadors of the now defunct republic has intensified. Many countries began to demand similar actions from them. In July, the Taliban announced that they no longer recognize the diplomatic missions created by the former government of Afghanistan and the passports, visas and other documents they issued. It is logical that it was in Germany that they took drastic measures: the Germans are trying to resolve the issue of deportation of Afghan refugees. This issue was already discussed during the chancellor's visit to Central Asia two months ago. And taking into account how the migration situation in Europe and Germany, in particular, has worsened, the new trends are quite understandable. The funny paradox is that people who fled the war with the Taliban indirectly and without their desire help the new Afghan authorities resolve the issue of their legitimization at the international level arena. And the Germans, quite possibly, will give impetus to other European states to do the same. But, looking at these actions of Germany, theses about the growing danger of the Islamic State in Afghanistan look even more artificial. In Europe, the Taliban are accused of allegedly not coping with the Islamic State, but at the same time they themselves are taking steps towards recognition of the Islamic Emirate as the legitimate government in the country. #Afghanistan #Germany@rybarSupport usfergana.mediaGerman authorities forced the Ambassador of Afghanistan and the Consul General in Bonn to leave resign

Title: 🇦🇿🇮🇷🇷🇺 Minister of Energy of the Islamic Republic of Iran A...
Description: 🇦🇿🇮🇷🇷🇺 The Minister of Energy of the Islamic Republic of Iran, Abbas Aliabadi, spoke in favor of connecting the power grids of Iran with the Russian Federation through Azerbaijan, as this will create a powerful source of electricity in the region, which other countries can also use.📌 This is a rather promising proposal that is quite feasible. Synchronize the frequency of Iran's power system with ours or make a direct current insert, and then the power systems will be connected. This will allow Iran to have additional external support from the powerful unified power system of the CIS countries, which will facilitate the balance of the local power system due to the flow of electricity from outside; for us, it will be possible to export electricity to new market.#Azerbaijan #Iran #Russia@rybarSupport usIRNA RussianIran: connecting the electrical networks of Iran and the Russian Federation will create powerful source of electricity in the regionTehran, November 20, IRNA - Russia and Iran have large electrical networks, and if these networks are connected, they can create a powerful source of electricity in the region, from which other countries can also benefit. Title: 🇷🇺🇹🇲🇺🇿🇰🇬 About the transport corridor from Russia to Kyrg...
Description: 🇷🇺🇹🇲🇺🇿🇰🇬 About the transport corridor from Russia to Kyrgyzstan A number of Central Asian media published articles about the creation of a route that would connect Russia and Kyrgyzstan through the Caspian Sea, Turkmenistan and Uzbekistan, bypassing Kazakhstan. They are planning this because of difficulties crossing the Kazakh-Kyrgyz border, which arise with enviable regularity. In fact, in Astana, they use their geographic location in this way to fight competitors in favor of their carriers, which causes damage to other sectors of the Kyrgyz (and not only) economy. This is not the first time this corridor project has been talked about. Last summer, Governor Igor Babushkin announced the participation of Astrakhan shipping companies in it. Later, in November 2023, a memorandum of understanding was signed at the first SCO transport forum in Tashkent. For the Kyrgyz economy, as well as for the Russian one, the presence of alternative routes (and multimodal) is important, since there must be diversification in any area. The position of Kazakhstan, which increasingly declares and defends the interests of Western countries, makes the search for new ways even more urgent. #Russia #Kyrgyzstan #Turkmenistan #Uzbekistan #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usOrient ExpressKyrgyzstan and Russia are building a new transport corridor, leaving Kazakhstan | Main topic: Kyrgyzstan and Russia are building a new transport corridor, moving away from Kazakhstan. The latest news from the East on Orient Express 24.

Title: 🇹🇷 The Turks continue to sell their drones to Africa. Here are ...
Description: 🇹🇷 The Turks continue to sell their drones to Africa. The Moroccan armed forces are purchasing the Akinci drone, which has already proven itself on the Dark Continent, and the Turkish Armed Forces themselves are actively using them against the Kurds in Iraq. For Morocco, this is not the first Turkish drone - they have already used the Bayraktar TB2 in operations against Western Saharawi rebels. Not to say that it is very effective, since sometimes their attacks led to the death of civilians and gold miners in Mauritania. In addition, Turkish companies are interested in exporting their training aircraft to Egypt. The Hürjet presented by TAI is a cheaper analogue of Western products for air force modernization, and according to plans it can be used as a light attack aircraft. But here, too, the nuance is that these are promising aircraft that have not even been put into production yet, and their real capabilities are unknown. So far, only two prototypes have been built, which should replace the American training T-38. In general, the fact that Ankara is trying to sell its products to unstable markets is a long-established trend. And they have success. Due to their low cost and the lack of dense air defense in the countries of the region, these drones are a formidable weapon against rebels and militants.#Africa #UAVs #Egypt #Morocco #Turkey@rybarSupport usMilitary AfricaMorocco acquiring Akinci drone from TurkeyMorocco is reportedly in talks to acquire Turkish Bayraktar Akinci drones. Title: 🇦🇲🇺🇸 On the appointment of the head of the Ministry of Intern...
Description: 🇦🇲🇺🇸 About the appointment of the head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Armenia In Armenia, after a wave of resignations in the government, there was an eloquent appointment of another Western protégé to one of the key positions. Thus, Arpine Sargsyan, who previously served as deputy minister, became the head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs. Sarkissian works closely with the US Embassy in Armenia and Ambassador Christina Quinn, who plays an important role in Armenian political life. It was Sargsyan, in the status of deputy minister, who represented the Armenian Ministry of Internal Affairs to American officials, reporting on the progress of reforms in the law enforcement sphere and the development of new programs under the auspices of the State Department and the US FBI.❗️As we wrote, in the United States they are putting Armenian security forces under the control. And it is obvious that the main motive of the Americans is not related to the real fight against crime. Moreover, in recent years, violence and crime in Armenia, on the contrary, have increased. It is much more important for Washington to place its protégés in responsible positions in the field of state security in order to bring it completely under its control. #Armenia #USA@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇦🇲 About resignations in the government of ArmeniaThere is a wave of resignations of high-ranking officials in Armenia. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Novembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on November 20, 2024. Russian troops attacked the Impulse plant in Shostka in the Sumy region, causing a powerful detonation at the facility. Ukrainian formations hit a facility in Maryino in the Kursk region with Storm Shadow cruise missiles. In the Kursk direction, Russian fighters hit another M1A1SA Abrams tank in the Sudzhansky district, and also completed clearing positions in the Olgovskaya Grove area in the Korenevsky district. In the Pokrovsky direction, attack aircraft are fighting in the eastern on the outskirts of Petrovka, advancing towards Pokrovsk along the railway. In the Kurakhovsky direction, Russian troops liberated Novoselidovki, are fighting in Sontsevka, and have also made significant progress within the borders of Kurakhovo.🔻A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botMaps in high resolution: Situation in the zone of special military operation (ru; en) Kursk direction (ru; en)#digest #report #map #Kurakhovo #Pokrovsk #Russia #Sumy #Ukraine #Shostka@rybarSupport us

Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for November 20, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, the operation of Israeli troops continues, several air strikes were carried out on Jabaliya and nearby areas. Israeli drone activity has also been observed in the air. In the central and southern parts of the enclave, the situation has not undergone significant changes. Israeli aircraft carried out several strikes on the outskirts of Rafah, Al-Mawasi, as well as Nuseirat. Police operations continue in the West Bank. The largest clashes took place in Jenin and several nearby towns, where local Palestinian factions reported attacks and ambushes on Israeli security forces. Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November 20, 2024 The Israeli offensive continues in the western sector. In the central sector, the situation is relatively calmer, with only a few IDF air and artillery strikes reported. In the northeastern sector, IDF units are trying to advance from Markaba. In response, Hezbollah units strike at concentrations of Israeli troops. In the sector north of the Golan Heights, the Israeli offensive began in the direction of Kafr Shuba and Shebaa, but its details at the moment remain unknown - there is only information about exchanges of fire. Israeli aircraft again inflicted several attacks on Syria, hitting targets in and around Palmyra. According to official reports, 36 people were killed and another 50 were injured. Title: 🇬🇧🇷🇺🇺🇦 The other day, documents were published indicating a...
Description: 🇬🇧🇷🇺🇺🇦 The other day, documents were published indicating the key role of Great Britain in the escalation of hostilities in the so-called. Ukraine. As it turned out, almost immediately after the start of the SVO, Project Alchemy was assembled under the auspices of the British Ministry of Defense. 🔻In addition to military personnel, it included intelligence workers, analysts, specialists in the field of honey, industrialists, scientific experts and other persons united by the goal of achieving an increase in the escalation of the current conflict. Their tasks included organizing cyberattacks, sabotage, even terrorist attacks on Russian territory, as well as drawing up a plan to change power in the country. They were also involved in developing a strategy for conducting combat operations and drawing the maximum number of NATO countries into the conflict. As part of the project, the sabotage of negotiations in Istanbul in the spring of 2022 was carried out. Some of the recommendations of Alchemy have already been implemented, including a strike on the Kerch Bridge and the creation of cells for murder, sabotage and terrorist attacks in the Russian rear. At the recent NATO summit, British Prime Minister Keir Starmer voiced the ideas developed within the project, and the British crown officially promised to support the so-called. Ukraine -as long as it takes -.📌 Another heap of official documents again proves the facts of subversive activities and deliberate escalation, but Great Britain is only a tool here. In fact, the plan is much broader and includes further stressing the population, discrediting national governments. Evidence of such work (and not only from the UK) will emerge more than once, but in the short term it will change little.#Great Britain #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramSystem pesticide🇬🇧🇷🇺🇺🇦 Project -Alchemy- - anti-Russian military lobby in the UK Underside has published a translation of an investigation about the key role of Great Britain in the escalation of hostilities in Ukraine, because it was the British who demanded to sabotage the peace negotiations in the spring...

Title: 🇨🇳🇵🇭 Despite the ongoing tension between Manila and Beijing, ...
Description: 🇨🇳🇵🇭 Despite ongoing tensions between Manila and Beijing, the Philippines successfully delivered essential supplies to its outpost in the disputed South China Sea last Friday. According to the PRC, the delivery was agreed with the Chinese authorities. If earlier the Chinese coast guard gave a tough response to such actions, then recently there has been no reaction to the delivery of goods. It's all about the bilateral agreement concluded in July 2024, which made it possible to resolve this issue at least temporarily. When the document was first signed, some observers argued that it would not be respected due to conflicting provisions. However, four months have already passed since the end of July, and the Filipinos have already delivered cargo three times without resistance from the Chinese side. 📌 And yet this does not mean that relations between China and the Philippines have normalized. Manila recently passed a law delineating the country's exclusive economic zone, parts of which are disputed in Beijing. China responded by releasing a map of the territorial waters of one disputed island and increasing patrols near it. At the same time, there have been no serious clashes in the waters between the Chinese and Filipinos for some time. However, after the determination of a new US foreign policy course, the time may come to review the existing agreements between the Philippines and China. Therefore, if it is beneficial for both sides to sabotage the situation, they will definitely take advantage of this opportunity, which could lead to further incidents of varying degrees of severity. #China #Philippines@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usAP NewsChinese and Philippine forces again avoid a clash in a fiercely disputed shoal under a rare dealThe Philippine navy has transported food and other supplies to a territorial ship outpost in a shoal in the South China Sea without any confrontation with Chinese forces guarding the area.

Title: 🇩🇪🇺🇦 New revelations about sabotage on -Nord Streams- German ...
Description: 🇩🇪🇺🇦 New revelations about sabotage on the Nord Streams. The German publication Der Spiegel published another sensation about the bombing of the Nord Streams: according to journalists, it was allegedly carried out by 12 citizens of the so-called. Ukraine under the leadership of Roman Chervinsky, who previously trained at the CIA. ▪️The article says that the bomb was prepared by a retired demolition expert, and the training took place in a lake and a flooded mine on Ukrainian territory. Later, the group with fake Romanian and Bulgarian passports arrived in Poland, where they rented a yacht.▪️In the process, saboteurs from among IT administrators and air conditioning specialists encountered many problems, including seasickness. As a result, they were able to plant six bombs on the branches of the gas pipeline, but one did not work, and Pipe-B of Nord Stream 2 remained untouched.▪️Der Spiegel also claims that the operation was approved by the commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Zaluzhny, and Zelensky allegedly said nothing about it knew. Later, Western curators gave an order to cancel it, but the executors simply disobeyed it. They also planned to disable the Turkish Stream, but the attack failed.📌 Let's imagine for a second that everything stated is actually true. The following picture emerges: a certain group of Ukrainian amateurs prepares to undermine international infrastructure off the coast of NATO countries in secret from the leadership, ignores the direct order of its sponsors, cuts off Germany from cheap energy resources and provokes an economic recession there. Be that as it may, with such articles, the overseas beneficiaries of sabotage kill two birds with one stone - they lay the blame on the so-called. n. Ukraine and create for it the image of an uncontrollable monkey with a grenade. To which you can always switch the arrows, relieving yourself of responsibility for any such actions.#Germany #Ukraine@rybarSupport usSpiegel(S+) Nordstream: Wie ein ukrainisches Geheimkommando Pipelines sprengteIm September 2022 zerstörte eine Truppe aus Agenten und Hobbytauchern die Nord-Stream-Pipelines. SPIEGEL-Recherchen zeigen nun: Sie brauchten nicht viel mehr als Wagemut und Todesverachtung.

Title: 🇺🇦 One of the representatives of the Kyiv regime said that sinc...
Description: 🇺🇦 One of the representatives of the Kyiv regime said that since the beginning of the NWO, the population of the Chernobyl exclusion zone has officially grown by 135 thousand people. According to him, citizens of the so-called. Ukraine is doing this in order to receive payments due to residents of areas with radiation contamination. This now costs the Ukrainian authorities 15 billion hryvnia annually, so in Kyiv they are trying to reduce this expense item. In particular, in the budget for 2025, these payments will be given only to those who lived in the exclusion zone from 1986 to 1993. However, the real reason for such increased interest of the local population in the vicinity of the Chernobyl nuclear power plant is not only the desire to enrich themselves through benefits. Indeed, in this area with minimally developed social infrastructure, it is very easy to get lost from the supervision of the authorities. This is especially true for mobilization: TCC workers do not go there often, so in the exclusion zone you can quite successfully hide from conscription. Moreover, the level of radiation contamination in most of it is not much different from the standard, and it is quite safe to be there. It is paradoxical: the area of ​​one of the largest man-made disasters of the last century has turned into a refuge, thanks to which many Ukrainians are saving their lives. #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramUnofficial Bezsonov Since the beginning of the Northern War, more than 135 thousand Ukrainians have settled in the Chernobyl zone - Deputy Minister of Social Policy Daria Marchak According to her, people are moving to radiation-contaminated areas for the sake of payments from the state. I am sure that there are also many Ukrainians there who...

Title: 🇬🇧🇷🇺🇺🇦 As we wrote a few days ago, the use of Storm Shadow ...
Description: 🇬🇧🇷🇺🇺🇦 As we wrote a few days ago, the use of Storm Shadow after the approval of ATACMS strikes on the -old- Russian regions was a matter of time - this is indicated by the found fragments of British ammunition in the Kursk region, as well as information about the interception of two more on approach to Yeysk. In this case, what is most noteworthy is that the Ukrainian Armed Forces continue to launch Western long-range missiles in salvos at single targets to increase the likelihood of their destruction. That is, there is apparently no talk of accumulating reserves for the next media offensive. 📌 At the same time, the number of both ATACMS and Storm Shadow/SCALP among Ukrainian formations is quite limited. And it’s not just a matter of supply volumes—first of all, we’re talking about the current production capabilities of Western manufacturing plants. However, hoping that the Ukrainian Armed Forces will simply run out of all these missiles and the threat will go away on its own is also reckless. With a high probability, the West will supply components for the expansion of production of Neptunes and other long-range missiles in the so-called territory. Ukraine. So, in any case, it will not be possible to sit out in a passive defense, and this issue can only be resolved by military measures, which are extremely clear to the sponsors of the Kyiv regime.#Great Britain #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramTwo majors❗️Kursk region, use of Storm Shadow by the enemy We are informed that from 14:50 the enemy fired up to 12 Storm Shadow missiles into the region, fragments of which are shown in the photo in the village. Maryino.Today the United States lifted its objections to the use of Storm Shadow missiles to strike...

Title: 🔁🖼 Ukrainian propagandists made a poster that, in their opinion...
Description: Forwarded From Andrey Medvedev Ukrainian propagandists made a poster that, in their opinion, should symbolize the will to victory of citizens of the former Ukraine and fighters of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. It is characteristic that the central figure on the poster is traditionally a woman. In this case, Ukraine. Moreover, not just a Ukrainian woman, but in the form of a pagan priestess or a pagan goddess. And no, this is not an angel, despite the presence of wings. Angels are sexless and incorporeal. Just the other day we discussed with colleagues what role women play in shaping the ideology of war in the territory of the former Ukraine. And on this poster, a normal person sees a priestess of a pagan cult leading a crowd of zombies. The cult of the Great Mother or the goddess of war in a modern version. The authors of the idea certainly understood why it was necessary to make just such a poster. This reflects the strange ideological reality in which the population of Ukraine lives.

Title: 🇬🇧 Yesterday a large protest by farmers took place in London, i...
Description: 🇬🇧 Yesterday, a large farmers’ protest took place in London, in which about 20 thousand people took part. The demonstration was originally due to take place in Trafalgar Square, but organizers had to move the event to Whitehall Street and Parliament Square to accommodate everyone. Such a strong public reaction was caused by the decision of Chancellor Rachel Reeves to introduce a 20% inheritance tax on agricultural land worth more than 1 million pounds. Critics warn the new levy will destroy family farms, which make up around 60 percent of Britain's agricultural base. Labor Party member John McTernan added fuel to the fire by declaring that -the country does not need small farms.- In turn, Reeves described her tax changes as -fair and proportionate- and insisted that they would affect only 25 percent of farms. It is unlikely that the UK government did not understand what the consequences of tax increases could be for the agricultural sector. Therefore, the decision taken is a targeted blow to the industry and may in the future lead to an increase in food prices. But ultimately, such actions are aimed at stressing one’s own population in order to make it more pliable. #UK@rybarSupport usThe Independent'It's become so tough I'm looking for a second job': Inside the farming crisisAs figures show a decline in smaller farms, farmers tell Alex Ross that Rachel Reeves' Budget 'tractor tax' is the latest blow to a family industry struggling to survive amid rising costs and extreme weather

Title: 🎬 🇹🇷✈️⚓️ Yesterday footage of test flights of a new modificati...
Description: 🇹🇷✈️⚓️ Yesterday, footage of test flights of a new modification of the Turkish attack drone Bayraktar TB3 from the Anadoly universal landing ship (UDC) appeared on the Internet. Previously, a UAV of this type practiced takeoff from a ground-based ski jump simulating a deck. The video demonstrates the fundamental possibility of using Bayraktarov and similar drones on aircraft-carrying ships. They cannot completely replace carrier-based jet aircraft, but they are quite capable of completing a significant part of the tasks. This is especially true for states whose navies cannot support full-fledged aircraft carriers, but have cheaper UDCs. As a result, countries like Egypt, Indonesia, Japan or Spain will be able to significantly expand the strike and reconnaissance capabilities of their fleets. At the same time, this is further evidence that once again - burying - large ships with the advent of BeKov is very reckless and short-sighted. And also another clear illustration of the importance of aircraft-carrying ships, contrary to some populist slogans.#UAV #Turkey #fleet@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬 🇩🇪🇷🇺🇺🇦 The Russian FSB reported the detention of German ...
Description: 🇩🇪🇷🇺🇺🇦 The Russian FSB reported the detention of German citizen Nikolai Gaiduk, who entered Russia from Poland with the aim of organizing sabotage at energy facilities. The security forces called him involved  to the explosion in March 2024 of a pipe at a low-pressure gas distribution station in Kaliningrad using an improvised explosive device. According to the FSB, he came to the Kaliningrad region from Poland with the aim of organizing sabotage at energy facilities on the instructions of Ukrainian citizen Zhirov, living in Hamburg. Liquid explosives were found in his car. It is clear that he is a Ukrainian who received German citizenship. But what passport did he use to cross the border? A German citizen was detained who was involved in one act of sabotage and was planning another on Russian territory. Who will be charged besides the detainee? The German government, whose citizens commit bombings in Russia, and their country is home to SBU curators with a residence permit in Hamburg. And now the German government has a choice: either provide assistance to the terrorist, or strengthen measures to control refugees from the so-called Ukraine . But we can guarantee that for Ukrainian migrants neither the first nor the second option will give anything good.#Germany #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🇲🇩 About reshuffles in the government of Moldova The government...
Description: 🇲🇩 About reshuffles in the government of Moldova The government of Moldova announced a reshuffle that had been expected for several weeks. After the elections, President Maia Sandu and the leaders of the ruling PAS party admitted -mistakes- in the work of the government and promised to take into account -the opinion of citizens- in the formation of a new cabinet of ministers. However, in this matter, Sandu’s team did not keep their promises, since no real changes occurred. ▪️The head of the Ministry of Agriculture, Vladimir Bol, was transferred to head the Ministry of Infrastructure and Regional Development. Boley is associated with the agricultural crisis in Moldova: he is also credited with protecting large agricultural holdings offshore to the detriment of national interests and local producers. ▪️Bolya took the place of Andrei Spinu, who is called one of the main corrupt officials of the Sandu era and one of the most influential people in her team. He himself recently announced his resignation, but this is seen as a political move by PAS to temporarily remove the main irritant for society. ▪️The only new face in the government was the Minister of Agriculture Lyudmila Katlabuga. At the same time, she admitted that she does not yet have a program of action, although she was entrusted with the most critical area. ▪️The head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs, Adrian Efros, resigned, and his position will be taken by the ministry’s Secretary of State Daniela Misail-Nikitina, who does not even have a specialized legal education. As a result, the government limited itself to only three minor changes, although mass resignations were predicted. Even the Minister of Justice, Veronica Mihailova-Moraru, remained in office, although Sandu herself recently announced the complete failure of reform in this area. Once again, Sandu and PAS are not keeping their promises, since there will clearly not be any fundamental changes in the work of the already ineffective government. This is also due to the fact that Sandu’s team does not tolerate dissent and people of other views, which is why the choice of managers is limited in advance.#Moldova @rybarSupport usInterfaxThere will be personnel changes in the Cabinet of Ministers of Moldova. New ministers of internal affairs, infrastructure and regional development, and agriculture will be appointed and food industry

Title: 🎬 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Yesterday, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Yesterday, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu decided to visit the Gaza Strip - he walked along the Netzarim corridor between the northern and central parts of the enclave to the Mediterranean coast. However, his visit gained popularity for completely different reasons. While on the beach, the head of the Israeli government addressed the Palestinian population with the following proposal - he promised to pay $5 million for each freed Israeli hostage held captive by Hamas. He guaranteed those who responded to the call free departure from the enclave along with their families. 🔻It is noteworthy that Benjamin Netanyahu made a similar proposal 13 months after the escalation of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict. This is not something new - previously everything was limited to SMS messages and leaflets, which offered to transfer information about the places of detention of captive Israelis for a fee. However, even if the IDF manages to obtain informants in this way, it will not be so easy to save the hostages. Especially considering that often such operations not only did not produce results, but also led to the death of Israelis in captivity. Among Hamas members there are even fewer willing to agree to such a proposal, and this is not only due to fears of being exposed. Agreeing to the Israeli proposal does not guarantee protection: at best, such militants will end up in an Israeli prison, at worst, they will simply be taken by the IDF to an unknown destination after completing their mission. 📌 Such statements are much more aimed at the Israeli audience, especially those participating in anti-government protests demanding a deal with Hamas. This allows Israel's ruling authorities to claim that they did everything possible for a peaceful outcome, but the Palestinians left them no choice.#Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of November 20, 2024 ▪️ Yesterday, ag...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of November 20, 2024▪️ Yesterday, against the backdrop of the signing of the Decree on the approval of the Fundamentals of the country’s state policy in the field of nuclear deterrence (the so-called Nuclear Doctrine), the Armed Forces of Ukraine launched a strike on a military facility in the Bryansk region with six operational American-made tactical missiles -ATACMS. In addition, the activity of enemy aircraft-type UAVs has sharply increased. At night, 5 drones of the Ukrainian Armed Forces were shot down over the Smolensk region. The governor of the Novgorod region also reported that several unmanned aerial vehicles were discovered and destroyed over the region. During the day, 48 UAVs were shot down over the Bryansk region. In the Voronezh region, more than five drones attacked an industrial enterprise that produces exclusively civilian products. In the evening, it was reported from the Kaluga region that work was underway to destroy the UAV in the south of the region. In Alekseevka, Belgorod region, drones attacked a manufacturing plant. The Ministry of Defense also reported downed UAVs over the Moscow, Kursk, Oryol and Rostov regions. ▪️In the Kursk region, the North group of troops continues to advance in the area of ​​the settlement. Nizhny Klin and Daryino, and also carry out a cleanup in the Olgovsky forest. During the cleanup, a group of 13 Ukrainian Armed Forces was identified who were trying to break out of the encirclement. In a shooting battle, 2 enemy soldiers were destroyed, the remaining 11 surrendered. In total, 472 Ukrainian Armed Forces servicemen are in captivity. The enemy carried out counterattacks in the forest area near the settlement. Malaya Loknya and in the village Novoivanovka, used armored vehicles, but did not achieve success. The OTRK crew carried out a missile strike on the base of the reserves of the 22nd mechanized brigade of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the area of ​​the settlement. Yunakovka, Sumy region. Our aviation continues to be used to destroy the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Kursk region with heavy bombs with UMPC.▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), there are constant heavy battles, the Russian Army is attacking. Enemy channels recognize the advance of our attack aircraft in high-rise buildings in the city center.▪️ In Chasov Yar, battles began for the main fortified area of ​​the Ukrainian Armed Forces on the territory of the Chasovoyarsky fireproof plant. The advance in the Oktyabrsky district of the city was 2 km.▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are expanding the zone of control near Yuryevka and Novoalekseevka. ▪️ A Russian flag has been installed in the Kurakhovsky direction in the western part of Novaya Ilyinka, and attacks continue in two directions towards Berestki. ▪️ From the Zaporozhye Front, information is received about attacks by our troops in the Malaya Tokmachka area and north of Nesteryanka. The Russian Armed Forces are trying to break into the defenses of the Ukrainian Armed Forces to create conditions for enveloping Orekhov from the west and east. There are battles in the Gulyai-Polye area.▪️ The Ukrainian Armed Forces’ strikes against the civilian population of the Belgorod region continue. Shebekino came under fire and one civilian was wounded. Drones attacked Borisovka and Ustinka. ▪️ In the DPR, in the Nikitovsky district of Gorlovka, when an IED was dropped from a UAV of the Armed Forces of Ukraine onto a passenger car, employees of the Nikitov bakery - men born in 1989 and 1983 - were injured, and a teenager born in 2007 was also injured at the Golmovsky turn. In the Central City district of Gorlovka, a man born in 1978 was wounded by cluster artillery shells, and a woman born in 1979 was also injured. The ambulance station was damaged. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsBelgorod channels are distributing footage of the arrival at a civilian enterprise.Two majors

Title: 🇨🇬🇷🇺 On Sunday, November 18, during a meeting of Deputy Minis...
Description: 🇨🇬🇷🇺 On Sunday, November 18, during a meeting between Deputy Minister of Defense Alexander Fomin and the Minister of Defense of the Republic of Congo, a memorandum of cooperation in the naval sphere was signed. The agreement opens up the opportunity for joint exercises and training of Congolese military personnel. It is also another episode of increasing interaction with the authorities in Brazzaville.📌 In fact, the Republic of Congo is becoming the next point of attraction for Russian interests on the West African coast after Equatorial Guinea, whose leadership is also building bridges with Russia. Previously, a construction agreement was concluded with the Congolese authorities oil pipeline with the involvement of Russian companies. Now interaction with the country is being established through military-technical cooperation. Yes, this memorandum is more like a -declaration of intent- than a more serious agreement. However, in any case, this is another small step to strengthen positions in West Africa.#Africa #Congo #Russia@rybarSupport usfunction.mil.ruMeeting of Deputy Minister of Defense A. Fomin with the Minister of Defense of the Congo: Ministry of Defense of the Russian FederationThe parties exchanged views on current issues in Russia -Congolese cooperation in the military and military-technical fields, discussed promising cooperation projects in the defense sector and outlined ways for their effective implementation.

Title: 🔁 📍💰 Other ways to support We publish calls for support on a d...

But part of our audience asks questions about other types of support: we mentioned that we are ready to do the work as a contractor. And yes, we constantly emphasize this: we are not some kind of parasites. We are committed to carrying out joint tasks with business representatives for the common good. We are not talking about the format - add us to your asset list and add money -: if we are going to do something, then do it normally. What can we do?🖼 we can organize a cool event together event, exhibition or educational event;🖍 Rybar has become a leader in visual propaganda: create a cool comic book, graphic novel, or develop another solution that will allow you to gracefully close the one needed for a particular region the question is our strong point;🔖 you want to get advice on setting up a business in other countries - write, we’ll tell you how, and also accompany the whole process from start to finish;📌 you’ve reached a dead end and don’t understand what kind of information campaign to organize or how to implement an information campaign ? Title: 🔁 ATACMS and media sovereignty In 78 days of autumn, Russian air...
Description: Forwarded From NechaevATACMS and media sovereignty During 78 days of autumn, Russian air defense intercepted 79 ATACMS missiles. Until November 17, few people were interested in this, since analyzing statistics from the Ministry of Defense reports had become a routine even for employees of specialized media, let alone ordinary people. But on November 17, everyone became alarmed. Why suddenly? Oh, yes: The New York Times reported Biden's decision to approve long-range strikes deep into Russia. In the language of NATO countries, this is called -allowing Ukraine to use long-range missiles on Russian territory.- The phrase requires translation: • Allow Ukraine = try to shift responsibility to a proxy, in order to then repeat the sacred phrase that the United States and NATO are not parties to the conflict; • Apply = pretend that the -red button- is being pressed by proxies that have their own reconnaissance and target designation system. In reality, this is done by the American satellite constellation, data processing and transmission centers in the USA, Britain and France, as well as specialists loading flight missions into rockets (details here); • On the territory of Russia = on the territory of Russia within the borders of 1991-2013, of course, because missiles are flying across Crimea, eastern Novorossiya and Donbass without Biden’s sanction, since in their picture of the world it is Ukraine. Further, this phrase is picked up not only by Reuters, Le Figaro and other El Pais, but also by almost all Russian federal media, including state ones. And everything is presented as if there are no new regions, as if the air defense does not shoot down ATACMS missiles month after month, as if the Supreme Commander in June and September did not explain the operating principle of such systems and did not voice Russia’s possible responses to the obvious expansion of the conflict zone. Further - worse. After lunch on November 19, one of the most quoted Russian agencies releases news with the headline -The Ukrainian Armed Forces launched the first strike with an American ATACMS missile on Russian territory-. First? No, colleagues. Not even 101st. A few hours later, apparently, one of the agency employees came to his senses, remembered the referendums of 2014 and 2022, the changes in the Russian Constitution, the successes of air defense - and changed the headline: -The Ukrainian Armed Forces launched the first ATACMS strike deep into Russian territory-. Also a controversial formulation, but oh well. Let's note a more important thing. The ATACMS story exposed the lack of media sovereignty in Russia. What does this lead to in practice? On the one hand, to the psychosis of the masses and the formation of a distorted picture of the world among millions of readers. This can be seen in media traffic, comments on social networks and query statistics in search engines. People ride on emotional swings. And on the other hand, it leads to the creation of an erroneous illusion for the enemy: -Judging by their reactions, if you press a little more, then maybe they will flinch?!-. They won’t flinch, of course. But the perception of the limits of what is permissible will be adjusted not in our favor and will require much greater resources to restore parity and balance of power. What to do? To begin with, it is worth realizing that sovereignty is not only political, economic, military, technological, cultural - but also media, because this is the 21st century and multi-domain operations are only gaining momentum. Therefore, you should not help the enemy in information and cognitive wars. And most importantly, sovereignty begins not with an official in the Kremlin, the Ministry of Defense, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs or the FSB, but with your loved one, your way of thinking, self-discipline and responsibility. Otherwise, a strange situation arises: the military shoots down ATACMS in commercial quantities, and the media (not all) do not even try to repel someone else’s media missile and launch a counterattack. And it should be!

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Novembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on November 19, 2024, Ukrainian formations attacked a facility in the Bryansk region with OTRK ATACMS missiles. Russian troops attacked targets in the territory controlled by the Ukrainian Armed Forces, including in Glukhov, Sumy region and occupied Zaporozhye. In the Kupyansk direction, fighting continues in the industrial zone of Kupyansk, and to the south, Russian troops have advanced to the west of Kolesnikovka. In the Pokrovsky direction, units of the Russian Armed Forces expanded the zone of control in the area of ​​Yuryevka and Novoalekseevka, and also cleared a strong point to the north. In the Kurakhovsky direction, Novoselidovka was officially liberated. Also, the Russian flag was hoisted in the Novaya Ilyinka microdistrict, which is part of the administrative boundaries of Kurakhovo. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru; en)#Bryansk #digest #report #Donetsk #Zaporozhye #map #Kupyansk #Kurakhovo # Pokrovsk #Russia #Sumy #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November 19, 2024 Israeli troops launched attacks on the border and rear areas of Lebanon. The center of Beirut and its suburbs came under fire, where several more buildings were destroyed. Hezbollah units launched rockets into central Israel: ammunition fell in Bnei Brak and Ramat Gan, damaging residential buildings, destroying cars and injuring seven civilians. In the border zone, the IDF advanced in the western sector, where the Israelis occupied Alma al-Shaab, and were also able to reach the Mediterranean coast and gain a foothold in the center of Al-Bayda. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Lebanese-Israeli war zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #report #Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for November 19, 2024 Israeli troops launched a series of attacks on the Gaza Strip. The capital of the Palestinian enclave, its satellite cities and Nuseirat came under the most concentrated fire. In Jabaliya, IDF units arrested several dozen local residents on charges of connections with Hamas, and the total number of those detained since the start of the fighting reached 1.3 thousand people. The evacuation of Beit Lahia also continues. In the very south of the enclave, the operation in Rafah is still ongoing, where Israeli troops are demolishing the remaining buildings and carrying out engineering work along the entire so-called. -Philadelphia Corridor-. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces carried out routine raids in several localities. The largest one took place in Jenin, where three local militants were killed. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #report #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇸🇩 The situation in Sudan: the cutting of the Sennar ledge a...
Description: 🇸🇩 Situation in Sudan: cutting off the Sennar salient and fighting in the capital as of November 19, 2024 With the onset of the dry season and increased supplies of Iranian weapons, government troops began to liberate the territory from the rebel Rapid Reaction Forces (RRF).▪️In the northern suburbs of Khartoum The Sudanese armed forces established almost complete control over the Samrab region. The goal of the operation is to unblock those encircled in the Signal Corps, which have been holding it since April 2023. To do this, the Sudanese army will have to break through either through industrial zones or through densely populated Shambat and Samrab.▪️Also a significant event was the cutting off of the Sennar salient, as a result of which it will become more difficult for the RRF to supply its group in the Blue Nile and Sinj. During the fighting, government troops took the large city of Dinder. The rebels did not sit on the defensive and during the counterattack they occupied the village of Tambol, carrying out a massacre in it: ▪️There were reports of the successes of the RSF in the Ed-Dueim area and their capture of several villages north of the city, and in El-Fasher, neither side cannot achieve success. At the same time, recently there have been more and more incidents related to violence against the civilian population by the rebels. Despite the successes of government forces, they still find it difficult to regain territory. And the lack of dialogue between the parties due to the fact that all peace initiatives are taking place under the patronage of the United States only prolongs the conflict. Against this background, contacts between representatives of the Sudanese authorities and Russia look curious: Energy Minister Mohiddin Al-Naim Said said that Russian companies are invited to work at oil production facilities in safe Sudanese areas. He also agreed on the supply of turbines to the Power Machines company for the hydroelectric power station in Merowe. In fact, even a war-torn side can provide projects attractive to domestic investors. This also means that prospects for post-war cooperation in civilian areas are already being laid. High-resolution map Russian version#Africa #Sudan@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 🇩🇪⚡️Germany is seriously preparing for war with Russia The...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors🇩🇪⚡️Germany is seriously preparing for war with Russia. The Bundeswehr has intensified the implementation of the Operation Plan -Germany-. The secret strategic document includes the procedure for preparing the country in case of war with Russia, writes Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitun. For these purposes, military department officers provide consultations and training to enterprise management during wartime. In particular, at the events of the Hamburg Chamber of Commerce and Industry, recommendations were made to train at least five additional truck drivers for every hundred employees. This measure is due to the German military’s concerns about the unreliability of 70% of German drivers who come from Eastern European countries. In relation to such workers, it is recommended to draw up a plan outlining what to expect and how to handle such employees. In addition, it is recommended to engage in self-sufficiency in backup sources of electricity, through the purchase of diesel generators or wind power plants. The document also lists all structures and infrastructure that are especially worthy protection for military reasons. Earlier, in September 2024, Bundeswehr Colonel Kronstadt from the headquarters of the NATO Joint Support and Enforcement Command (JSEC) announced work to create a permanent march corridor through Europe to the borders of Russia and Belarus. ✨Whatever figure comes after Scholz’s puppet, the policy of confrontation (hidden or open) will continue in the German state. Two majors

Title: 🖼 🇨🇳🇫🇷 About the French operation in the Asia-Pacific region...
Description: 🇨🇳🇫🇷 About the French operation in the Asia-Pacific region The trends of 2024, where European countries are increasingly immersed in the geopolitical confrontation between China on the one hand and the United States with its allies in the region, will continue in 2025. In addition to the British command, which announced the deployment of an aircraft carrier groups (AUG) led by the Prince of Wales in the Asia-Pacific region, from Paris officially confirmed similar plans. AUG Charles de Gaulle by the end of this year will first go to the Eastern Mediterranean to participate in joint NATO events, and then to the Red Sea. There they will probably show their presence to the Houthis and move on.▪️The French are planning their main maneuvers in the Indian and Pacific oceans. South of the coast of India, the French will conduct a joint exercise with the Indians - Varuna -, which is annual. ▪️ After this, the aircraft carrier will sail to the coasts of Australia and Indonesia, where a multinational exercise led by France - La Perouse 2025 - is planned, in which 10 countries, including the United States, will take part , Britain and the countries of the region.▪️The final exercise for the French AUG is considered to be the Pacific Steller exercise together with the USA, Canada, Australia and Japan, which will take place east of the Philippines. However, adjustments to plans are possible. The French, following their European partners, are increasing their presence in the Asia-Pacific region, reaffirming NATO’s shift of emphasis to the East towards China. The Chinese leadership, by the way, has already expressed its dissatisfaction with the plans of Britain and France, calling them provocative. And you can’t argue with them on this, since all these maneuvers are designed to show the unity of the West in the confrontation with China. High resolution mapEnglish version#India #China #USA #France@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇰🇿🇪🇺 Global threats as the calling card of the West in promot...
Description: 🇰🇿🇪🇺 Global threats as a calling card for the West in promoting interests in Central Asia The EU Delegation together with the Dutch Embassy, ​​with the support of the Government of Kazakhstan, held a discussion on critical transnational threats. More than 70 experts, government officials and international representatives took part in an active dialogue, dedicated to terrorism, human trafficking, migrant smuggling and other pressing security issues. EU Ambassador Alyoshka Simkic, appointed in early October, assessed the event as an important step forward in security relations between the EU and Kazakhstan. However, for the collective West, discussing such problems is a way to consolidate their influence in the region, where Kazakhstan serves as a convenient platform for them. For example, inflating the threat from ephemeral groups such as the Islamic State - Vilayat Khorasan - is one of the main trends of the past year. We especially note Simkic herself: she served as deputy chief observer of the OSCE special monitoring mission in the so-called Ukraine. OSCE observers are those people who turned a blind eye to the shelling of the civilian population of Donbass and supplied the Ukrainian Armed Forces with the necessary information.#Kazakhstan #EU #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usdknews.kzThe EU and Kazakhstan are strengthening cooperation in the fight against global threatsRound table on transnational threats affecting the EU and Kazakhstan, passed in Astana, reported DKnews.kz. Representation of the European Union together with the Embassy

Title: 🔁 We waited and it was published. What can we say about our new ...
Description: Forwarded From Watfor | Freeway think tank (Dmitry Stef)We waited and it was published. What can we say about our new -nuclear fundamentals-? Let's formulate it in three words: continuity, allies, threshold. Let's decipher: many provisions repeat the content of a similar document from 2020 (which we examined here), we now provide nuclear protection to our allies more specifically (paragraphs 18, 19d), and we nuclearly restrain others more strictly (paragraphs 10, 11) , the nuclear threshold has been lowered and raised more than once in our recent history. As expected, now we have a threat to the very existence of the state, in fact, replaced by a threat to sovereignty and territorial integrity. In fact, other formulations voiced at the end of September were reflected in the document. Interesting things have also been added, for example, regarding attacks on our facilities and troops outside the national territory (clause 18b), as well as actions aimed at isolating some of our lands and blocking transport communications (clause 15g) and possible attacks on , for example, our nuclear power plants (clause 15z). By and large, this was understandable as it was, but it is useful to have a document. Let us note that despite all the fuss about our possible intentions to deploy nuclear weapons in space, according to the Fundamentals, our nuclear deterrent force is so far exclusively ground-based, sea-based and air-based ( paragraph 17). As before, it is emphasized that nuclear weapons are a means of deterrence, and in order to reduce the nuclear threat, any military conflicts, not just nuclear ones, must be prevented (paragraph 5). The author’s favorite point about the continuity of nuclear deterrence, but only until the use of nuclear weapons, has also been preserved (paragraph 14). Accordingly, without any restoration of deterrence through use, we will find ourselves in some new world. In a very uncomfortable world. Let us also note the preservation of the somewhat crooked formulation about ballistic missiles (clause 19a). Apparently, we are talking about SLBMs, ICBMs and, possibly, IRBMs, but, of course, now everyone is running in circles around the ATACMS- dispenser. Let us emphasize once again - in any case, there is no automatism in the entire section III and there cannot be. These are the conditions, and the decision will be made by the President (clause 20) based on the completeness of the data processed by decision support systems. Well, then he will, perhaps, inform his counterparties in other countries and international organizations (clause 21). What is the reason for all these changes? Everyone talks about the air defense system, about attacks by Western missiles, and so on, but global subjects cannot be taken out of the equation. Nuclear arsenals tend to grow; the emergence of new nuclear powers cannot be ruled out; in recent years, nuclear weapons have been returning as a key factor in international military-political relations. At the same time, you should not consider nuclear weapons to be a magic wand: it is a useful tool, but by no means a universal one. You have to be strong, as they say among their people, across the entire spectrum. We’ll interrupt the quick analysis here, but we won’t finish it. Stay with us.#stratdelaPS And references to arms control, including as a basic principle of nuclear deterrence, have also disappeared from the current text. It's sad, but it seems true. Perhaps, by the next update of the document, this tool will return to its rightful place in the national security arsenal.

Title: 🖼 ⚡️🇷🇺🇺🇦🖍#Comic from Rybar No. 34: Once upon a time in Kras...
Description: ⚡️🇷🇺🇺🇦🖍#Comic from Rybar No. 34: Once upon a time in KrasnogorovkaWhat to do when relatives find themselves in the territory where hostilities are taking place? A serviceman cannot just break away and go to another sector. Here the connections of unit commanders come to the rescue, and the relatives of one soldier are sent to rescue others... Synopsis: The Russian Armed Forces continue to liberate the territory of the Donetsk People's Republic. On the way – the city of Krasnogorovka. As is often the case in the city, combat operations are complicated by the presence of civilians, who are often trapped or even used as cover by the enemy. Russian troops face a difficult task: to organize the evacuation of civilians without losing fighters. In such conditions, the professionalism of drone operators is fully revealed, who not only carry out timely reconnaissance, but also cover attack aircraft, leading people to a safe place. Among the civilians who find themselves in a trap, there are also relatives of those military personnel who are fighting in other directions. Soldiers, fulfilling their duty, cannot themselves come to the aid of their relatives. But fighters from other units know: today they will save the loved ones of their comrades in arms, and tomorrow their comrades will most likely help out their families.📌 You can download the comic using the links: RU | EN | AR | CN#Russia #Ukraine @rybarWe hope you liked the comic from our artists. We will be glad to receive any support (here is a convenient link to payment via SBP).

Title: 🇺🇦 Foreign colleagues from SITREP report that the Kyiv regime i...
Description: 🇺🇦 Foreign colleagues from SITREP report that the Kiev regime is actively canceling -reservations- from mobilization from employees of the state-owned company -Ukrspetsexport-, authorized for the supply of Ukrainian military products abroad and their after-sales service. The reason is a natural reduction in arms exports from the so-called. Ukraine under contracts concluded before the SVO. This was caused not only by our own increased needs, but also by the consequences of Russian attacks on enterprises of the Ukrainian military-industrial complex. What happened as a whole is a logical consequence of the current situation, when, in the face of problems with recruiting manpower for the so-called. Ukraine is undergoing an audit and is trying to ensure replenishment even at the expense of specialists from critically important enterprises, whom they previously tried not to touch. If Kyiv does not agree to lower the conscription age below the current 25 years, then the mobilization of reserved workers of Ukrainian strategically important companies will gain momentum. After all, the so-called people Western sponsors cannot provide Ukraine with military assistance in their packages.#Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegram🇬🇧 SITREP - Independent OSINT Channel 🇬🇧🇺🇦 Unsurprising but true: Ukrainian authorities are beginning to revoke mobilization exemptions from an increasing number of specialists. Now, specialists from Ukrspecexport are being called up - those who in current circumstances have become unnecessary…

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the details of last year’s operation of the Arm...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the details of last year’s operation of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on the Dnieper The Ukrainian publication published material about last year’s operation to land the Ukrainian Armed Forces on the left bank of the Dnieper, the battles in the village of Krynki and the subsequent retreat after more than six months of clashes. The article contains interesting details: ▪️The main inspirer of the landing was Great Britain, which oversaw the creation of the Marine Corps of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and called for its use - for its intended purpose, and not in the fields near Donetsk -. At the same time, in London they demanded that the crossing of the Dnieper begin immediately after the explosion of the Kakhovskaya hydroelectric station in May 2023.▪️The minimum task was to create and expand a bridgehead with access to the M-14 highway, and the maximum was access to the Crimean Isthmus. For this, all four marine brigades were involved, and the calculation was based on the fact that the Russian Armed Forces did not have a second line of defense.▪️During the landing, the village of Krynki was captured, but insufficient planning, a lack of boats and electronic warfare equipment led to serious logistical difficulties. In other areas, the situation was even worse: in the area of ​​the Poyma Marines, 36 infantry infantry fighting units were covered by Iskanders, the losses amounted to 90 people killed and wounded.▪️Although initially high hopes were placed on the operation until the course of hostilities changed, by the beginning of 2024 they were in a poorly supplied the bridgehead demotivated the personnel. The situation was worsened by the transfer of reinforcements by the Russian Armed Forces from airborne units and bombing strikes, which turned the area into a lunar landscape.▪️As ​​a result, in July the Armed Forces of Ukraine completely abandoned Krynki, but this decision was late by at least two months and only led to unnecessary losses. Due to attacks on watercraft, sometimes it was necessary to escape by swimming. Although this was certainly not an easy walk for the RF Armed Forces, the enemy did not achieve a single goal - participants from the Armed Forces of Ukraine note that as a result, they only managed to draw the forces of the RF Armed Forces to the site at the cost of considerable losses - very valuable people -. At the same time, the same brigades of the so-called Marine Corps. Ukraine could rationally use it in the same Donbass. And from a more global point of view, the operation is a clear example of how Great Britain is waging a war by proxy. And all costs are borne by the so-called. Ukraine, losing operational reserve to meet sponsors' demands.#Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🖍 Happy Missile Forces and Artillery Day! On the morning ...
Description: 🇷🇺🖍 Happy Rocket Forces and Artillery Day! On the morning of November 19, 1942, a powerful artillery barrage marked the beginning of the Soviet offensive near Stalingrad, which became a turning point in the entire Second World War. Two years later, the date was chosen as the holiday of Artillery Day, and later - the Day of Missile Forces and Artillery. It is this branch of the military that today performs the main tasks of gaining fire superiority over the enemy. It is impossible to do without it in high-intensity conflicts: in the absence of artillery on one side, the war sooner or later becomes a one-goal game. Over the course of two and a half years in the Northern Military District, gun crews, MLRS and OTRK completed a truly colossal volume of tasks to destroy the forces of Ukrainian formations in forward and in the rear. And significant changes in tactics of use and other areas have greatly increased the effectiveness of fire destruction. On this day, I would like to wish artillerymen and missilemen many new guns, ample ammunition and sharp eyes in the sky. As well as supplies to the troops of the long-awaited new systems with a higher firing range to increase the capabilities of counter-battery warfare. Art in high resolution#art #VSRF@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇲 About resignations in the government of Armenia There is a w...
Description: 🇦🇲 About resignations in the government of Armenia There is a wave of resignations of high-ranking officials in Armenia. Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan asked the heads of the Ministry of Internal Affairs, the Investigative Committee, the Anti-Corruption Committee, the Ministry of Territorial Administration, the State Revenue Committee, and the Supreme Judicial Council to resign. ▪️At the end of last week, at a government meeting, Pashinyan criticized the work of law enforcement and judicial authorities. Among the reasons he named are an increase in the crime rate and citizens' complaints about corruption.▪️Armenian experts agree that the demonstrative resignations are only preparation of Pashinyan and his -Civil Agreement- for early parliamentary elections, which could take place next year. The systemic crisis of governance in Armenia needs new faces, and it is obvious that Pashinyan himself should not be among them. After all, the latest opinion poll just showed mass dissatisfaction with the work of the prime minister and the government. ▪️In the country, over the past few years, the level of violent crime has been growing, which is associated with corruption and a sense of impunity, as well as the low professional level of security forces. Even the American money for reforms and police support, which the Biden administration allocated to the Armenian security forces, also for some reason does not help.▪️Another version - purges - is called a possible signal from the new US administration, in which an audit of the allocated funds may be carried out. However, not all members of the security forces who were seen collaborating with American officials resigned. So for now, among the reasons for such dismissals and reshuffles, which in Armenia are also taking place at the local level and in the diplomatic corps, there is a desire to somehow improve the image of the authorities. Pashinyan recently even shaved his beard for the first time since the Velvet Revolution to revive his -revolutionary image- in society. Finally, Pashinyan’s testing of his officials for loyalty before the coming changes also plays an important role. #Armenia@rybarSupport usVedomostiThe Prime Minister of Armenia asked a number of high-ranking officials to resign.The Prime Minister of Armenia Nikol Pashinyan asked several high-ranking officials to resign.

Title: 🖼 🇩🇪🇱🇹🇫🇮🇸🇪 About incidents on submarine cables in the Ba...
Description: 🇩🇪🇱🇹🇫🇮🇸🇪 About incidents on submarine cables in the Baltic The Finnish operator company Cinia reported the rupture of the submarine communication cable with Germany C-Lion1, which is located near the Nord Stream 1- and Nord Stream 2 gas pipelines. The cause of the problem has not yet been identified. This is the only Finnish telecommunications cable that runs under water and connects Finland with Europe. Its length is about 1.2 thousand km and it runs from the Finnish Hanko to the German Rostock. And a few hours later, the Lithuanians and Swedes reported a similar incident on the NordBalt cable, which was later called sabotage. Moreover, this happened exactly in the same place where the Finnish-German cable was cut. A very interesting situation is developing. The day before yesterday we wrote that in the Gulf of Finland and at the Dragsvik training ground in southern Finland, on November 18, that is, today, the NATO exercise Freezing Winds-2024 starts , in which various countries participate, including the USA and Great Britain. An area of ​​​​the Finnish coast closed for training - this is also where Hanko, the city where the telecommunications cable begins, is located. The incidents themselves occurred near the active phase of the exercise, in which American Marines are participating. The event involved Marines from the 2nd Separate Reconnaissance Battalion of the 2nd Marine Division of the US Navy. This is a unit from North Carolina. In addition, from November 11 to 14, another NATO naval exercise, Merlin 2024, was held for the first time at the Swedish naval base at Karlskrona, which also included underwater operations. We, of course, will not be surprised by new attacks on the destructive activities of the Russian Federation. but the situation is clear. We are not hinting at anything, but before the explosion at Nord Stream, the Alliance also intensively conducted training in the area of ​​​​the incident. Then the Baltops exercise took place. High resolution mapEnglish version#Germany #NATO #USA #Finland@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 🇲🇩🇪🇺The West is more actively integrating Moldova into l...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors🇲🇩🇪🇺The West is more actively integrating Moldova into the logistics routes to Ukraine. An EU grant (32 million euros) within the framework of the EU-Ukraine Solidarity Route project will carry out a major overhaul of the railway sections in Moldova:◾️-Valchynets-Ocnita - – is part of the route from Romania to Ukraine through the Vinnytsia region. The route passes through the city of Mogilev-Podolsky and has long been used for the delivery of weapons and fuels and lubricants for the Armed Forces of Ukraine;◾️-Balti-Ungheni-Chisinau- - will help improve capacity in the Romanian direction and is intended to relieve congestion on the northern routes of communication with Ukraine; ◾️-Chisinau-Cainary- - will connect the central railway tracks with the southern route for the delivery of goods from Odessa to the Black Sea and Danube ports through the stations - Cimislia-Bessarabka-Etulia-Giurgiulesti-. These sections provide for the replacement of the canvas, restoration of the embankment and other work. on 128 km of roads. The seriousness of the EU's intentions to restore the tracks is indicated by Moldova's commitment to establish supervision over the work. For this purpose, the State Enterprise - Railway of Moldova - has already signed a contract with the Greek 🇬🇷 Obermeyer Hellas and the German 🇩🇪 DB Engineering&Consulting. In October 2024, more than 8 thousand tons of rails were delivered to Moldova by four ships for the reconstruction of the railway section - Bendery - Bessarabka-Etulia-Giurgiulesti- (233 km). Previously, we analyzed the plans and progress of projects to connect the railway infrastructure of the EU countries and Ukraine. Some of those routes will connect with Moldovan railways. These actions are consistent with plans to create a permanent march corridor through Europe, which were announced by the head of the communications department of the NATO Joint Support and Support Command (JSEC), Colonel Kronstadt. The corridor involves the transfer of troops from the 🇺🇸USA and 🇪🇺Western Europe through 🇳🇱The Netherlands, 🇵🇱Poland and 🇩🇪Germany. As part of this project, solutions - military Schengen - and - military mobility - are being implemented, simplifying the procedures for transporting military cargo to the -eastern flank - and creating infrastructure for this.✨Moldova is confidently walking along the path of -Anti-Russia- and wants to become the next NATO proxy that will go at the first command, expended in favor of the interests of the West. Two majors
