Title: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🖇 A cycle of lies from near Seversk: the final (?) Une...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🖇 A cycle of lies from near Seversk: finale (?) Suddenly, very unusual news came from the Seversk direction, although again related to the fake capture of populated areas. This time it was positive.▪️Several commanders in this direction were detained and removed from their positions due to deception of the higher command. We are talking about some commanders from units of the 3rd Army: someone was detained and arrested, someone was removed or transferred to a lower position. The event affected several brigade and battalion commanders. ▪️This, as we wrote, was expressed in -occupation- exclusively on the Internet through friendly bloggers and war correspondents of Serebryanka, Grigorovka, Belogorovka and Verkhnekamensky, as well as, apparently, Vyemka (as well as feverish attempts to recapture it).▪️Alas, instantaneous there was no reaction: the system is inert, and attempts to expose lies are perceived as -pressure- (principle - if they criticize, it means I’m doing everything right-). As a result, the initial reports about, to put it mildly, -problems- (although this can more be called outright outrage) ultimately did not result in anything: commanders of different levels synchronized watches and continued to fool high headquarters. It’s good that after that scandal there were no statements about the liberation of new settlements (and that’s a joy).🔻As a result, everything turned out to be much more prosaic: higher authorities came and wanted to visit the -liberated-Belogorovka, which was already, in theory, deep-deep the rear, since Grigorovka and Serebryanka were allegedly taken. And only then the scale of the deception was revealed, which went not only to the media, but also to higher headquarters. Moreover, the lies were not only not only in the reports, but also -legendized-. Correspondents were invited to the positions to interview fighters who boasted in the media about the capture of non-existent villages. 📍On the Internet, of course, there is an opinion that they allegedly managed to take some positions, then the enemy counterattacked, after which they had to be abandoned. However, in reality there was no talk of any capture - neither then nor now. And now, regardless of whether the voice of those crying in the wilderness was heard, or the deception was actually revealed by accident, the activities of at least some of those responsible have already attracted the interest of specialized services. And we very much hope that questions about both the mediocre waste of personnel in unprepared assaults and the wearing down of armored groups from month to month against the same support will be raised at the very top. #media technologies #Russia #Seversk #Ukraine #fake@rybarSupport usTelegramCallsign《OSETIN》After coverage of the situation by Comrades Majors, Rybar, Podolyaka and other channels near Belogorovka (in the Seversky direction), namely, incorrect reports from the command, incomprehensible assaults and more - the result appeared. The commander of the 3rd Army was removed from his post...

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Footage of the use of the Russian Ka-52 to intercept ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Footage of the use of the Russian Ka-52 to intercept a Ukrainian UAV near Kazan has surfaced on the Internet. At first, the helicopter crew unsuccessfully tries to shoot down the drone with a cannon, but ultimately uses an air-to-air missile to destroy the target. The video shows several points at once. On the one hand, this is further evidence of the fundamental possibility of using helicopters to combat drone strikes, given the appropriate organization and technical equipment. At the same time, the recording illustrates the difficulties in defeating drones. As we wrote a year ago, not every type of aircraft is suitable for this - the Mi-24 and Mi-8 with old avionics are worse suited for this role than the Mi-28 and Ka-52. However, the number of the latter is limited, and they are required at the front. In any case, one can observe an active search for means of countering UAV attacks in rear areas, from mobile fire groups and protective metal screens at oil refineries to interceptor drones. It cannot be ruled out that specialized small aircraft will soon appear.#Russia #Tatarstan #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇸☢️ Russia introduces temporary restrictions on the supply...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇸☢️ Russia is introducing temporary restrictions on the supply of enriched uranium to the United States. The decision was made at the direction of Vladimir Putin in response to US sanctions, implying restrictions on the import of Russian uranium products in 2024-2027 and a complete ban from 2028. 🔻In accordance with the new decision, it will no longer be possible to simply export enriched uranium to the United States or do so under foreign trade agreements with persons registered in the jurisdiction of the United States. However, an exception is provided in the form of supplies under one-time licenses issued by the Federal Service for Technical and Export Control (FSTEC). It seems that now the supply chain will change somewhat: China will be able to buy enriched uranium in Russia, then it will be sold to Europe, and from Europe it will follow in the USA. In the States, by the way, there are plans to commission 200 GW of capacity by 2050. How much they will be able to add 35 GW in the next 10 years remains to be seen. In general, peaceful nuclear power is now intended to serve first-tier countries and manufacturing countries, like China and South Korea. At the same time, those countries that have lost their economic importance are experiencing all the difficulties from curtailing their nuclear program - this is exactly what is happening in Germany or Japan. It is unlikely that in the near future we will see the creation of a uranium embargo system, but there is clearly a process of tightening control over deposits, enrichment. And, of course, the construction of nuclear power plants. #Russia #USA@rybarSupport usgovernment.ru The government introduced temporary restrictions on the export of enriched uranium to the USA Resolution No. 1544 of November 14, 2024

Title: 🎬🖼 🇦🇿🇷🇺🌓 Calls for interethnic massacre - was there a boy?...
Description: 🇦🇿🇷🇺🌓 Calls for interethnic massacre - was there a boy? Over the past few hours, a video has gone viral on social networks with Azerbaijani citizens walking with Azerbaijani flags at the Moscow Financial and Legal University (MFLU) and who, at first glance, are shouting - Cut the Russians, Azerbaijan -.🔻But online -twisted- the situation. The video circulating on the Internet is a screen recording from the social network Instagram, which is banned in the Russian Federation. In the original, the shouts of -Yaşasın Azərbaycan!-, which means -Long live Azerbaijan-, are clearly audible. Due to the poor quality of the screen recording, the sounds were distorted, and it seemed as if the Azerbaijanis were calling to go against Russian citizens, and the general sentiments of the population towards ethnic communities in the country, in in particular - to the Azerbaijani one, they did the rest.❗️ Moreover, the personnel are not even from MFYU. Apparently, the original video was filmed at the Financial University under the Government of the Russian Federation on Leningradsky Prospekt. On November 14 at 17.00 there was a student festival for Azerbaijani students. This was reported on their channel, which has now been deleted. In the background footage you can see MADI University, which is also located on Leningradsky Prospekt.📌 There was no specific call from these students. The distorted recording and the attitude of the population towards foreigners from the neighboring countries against the backdrop of the situation in Russia did everything by spreading the video on social networks. And the reason for all this is the failures in migration policy, which resulted in hundreds of incidents with migrants, including from Azerbaijan. Ethnic communities feel at home in Russia, regardless of laws or regulations, which leads to such events. The reaction of most Russians was quite expected. Wandering around the center of Moscow with the flags of another country and shouting slogans in your own language in Russia - all this will be regarded as disrespect for the Russian-speaking population and Russia itself, which is what ultimately happened. #Azerbaijan #multinationalism #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇫🇷🇨🇫 While Russian military specialists continue to clean up ...
Description: 🇫🇷🇨🇫 While Russian military specialists continue to clear the Central African Republic of remnants of gangs, the country's president, Touadera, continues to fall into the arms of the French. Funds in the amount of 10 million euros are aimed both at solving internal problems and at holding elections in 2025.❗️In this regard, the problem that we have raised more than once with - pulling the blanket - between the security forces of Russia and the lack of lobbying in the interests of domestic business creates favorable conditions for external players. Which is relevant both in the context of the activity of the French and the PRC, which is heavily investing in the CAR. Yes, this will not affect our military presence of the Russian Federation in the country, since the leadership in Bangui is relying on Russian specialists. But the question arises as to how rational it is to keep troops in a country where others skim the cream.#Africa #CAR #France@rybarSupport usLe Monde.frCentrafrique : la France reprend son aide après trois ans d'interruptionLa France a fait un don -  ;sans conditionnalité -de 10 millions d'euros à la République centrafricaine. Cette aide avait été gelée en 2021 en raison d’une campagne antifrançaise téléguidée par Moscou, dont le pays avait été jugé - complice -.

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺 During yesterday's protests in Abkhazia, protesters seize...
Description: 🇷🇺 During yesterday’s protests in Abkhazia, protesters seized the parliament building. At night, reports appeared about the alleged resignation of President Aslan Bzhania, but he said that he would do so only when the facility was liberated. Afterwards, early elections will take place, where the politician will nominate his candidacy.📌 Although some resources managed to see almost a -color revolution- in what happened, in fact the event does not stand out too much against the background of the local political background. In 2014, the opposition also seized buildings in Sukhum, as a result of which the head of the republic, Alexander Ankvab, resigned. Moreover, Aslan Bzhania himself came to power in 2020 during similar protests, which were accompanied by the storming of the presidential administration building and the resignation of Raul Khadzhimba, who previously removed Ankvab. So such political crises in Abkhazia are rather the norm. It is also worth noting that this usually happens without bloodshed and very violent clashes, although in Abkhazia almost every house you meet has a firearm. Such protests are also not explicitly anti-Russian, at least at the moment.❗️However, all this does not remove the points already noted: the republic, which lives off the Russian budget, refuses to conclude an investment agreement with Russia and wags its tail on other issues. Which leads to reputational and other costs, which over time will raise certain issues head on. #Abkhazia #Russia@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🇲🇱🇳🇪🇹🇬 The Togolese authorities are making efforts to obtai...
Description: 🇲🇱🇳🇪🇹🇬 The Togolese authorities are making efforts to obtain investments from the Sahel Troika countries for the construction of a sea harbor. To this end, the delegation of the autonomous port of Lomé conducted an advertising campaign in the landlocked capitals of Niger and Mali. This occurs against the background of a conflict between the authorities in Benin and Niamey, where the former, under US pressure, closed the Chinese pipeline from Niger territory. Therefore, in neighboring Togo they are trying to pull the blanket over themselves: the country is actively playing on Pan-African sentiments and participating in the exercises of the Alliance of Sahel States. The ultimate goal is to become a gateway to the ocean for Mali, Niger and Burkina Faso, creating for them an important strategic route and receiving considerable profit from this. However, the nuance is that the Togolese authorities are in fact open supporters of the French line. And no matter what services are offered in Togo, any investment can turn against sovereign states with one order from Paris. Therefore, for Russia's allied countries in the region, the governments of Senegal or Mauritania look like more reliable partners in this area.#Africa #Mali #Niger #Togo@rybarSupport usTogofirstAfter Visiting Niger, Port of Lomé Delegation Promotes Its Services in MaliThe Port Autonome de Lomé (PAL) is committed to getting closer to economic operators in Sahelian countries. Title: 🎬 ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸🎞 Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: ev...
Description: ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸🎞 Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: events of the week 9 - November 15, 2024▪️In the north of the Gaza Strip, the Israelis launched another series of attacks on the capital of the Palestinian enclave. Hits were recorded almost throughout the city, and over a hundred people died. ▪️At the same time, the Israel Defense Forces’ operation continued in Jabaliya, the largest satellite city of Gaza. The Israelis undermined buildings, actively using remote-controlled armored vehicles. ▪️At the same time, during a patrol, a group of Israeli fighters was ambushed by Palestinian forces. Several Israelis were wounded, the rest retreated to their original positions. ▪️In response to the incident, IDF units detained several dozen people remaining in the village. All of them were accused of having connections with Hamas and taken to an unknown direction.▪️In the central part of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops worked in settlements controlled by Hamas. Nuseirat and Al-Breij traditionally came under concentrated fire. ▪️In turn, Palestinian forces fired at IDF positions in the Netzarim corridor several times. However, judging by the lack of reports of evacuation helicopters flying over, such attacks were ineffective. ▪️In the south of the enclave, Israeli aircraft carried out strikes on Khan Yunis, Al-Fokhari and the surrounding area. Despite the constant bombing, hundreds of thousands of local residents still remain in the cities. ▪️At the same time, engineering work was underway in Rafah throughout the so-called territory. -Philadelphia Corridor-. Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of November 16, 2024 ▪️ At night, Ger...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of November 16, 2024▪️ At night, Geraniums continued to hit targets deep in enemy territory. Explosions were reported in Kyiv, Zaporozhye and the Cherkasy region.▪️ The enemy tried to attack our regions with counter actions: twelve aircraft-type UAVs were destroyed over the Bryansk region. In the Kaluga region in the morning, on the outskirts of the city of Lyudinovo, a UAV exploded. ▪️ A new element of the situation was the footage published yesterday of our reconnaissance group entering the Chernigov region from Bryansk. Our units planted flags in the village. Gremyach and Ants. The enemy reassures its audience that it is not possible to defend these villages due to complex logistics and the forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces were withdrawn from there.▪️ In the Kursk region, the Ukrainian Armed Forces are conducting a maneuverable defense; an unsuccessful enemy counterattack was reported near the Olgovsky forest. On the southern flank of the Sudzhansky direction, Russian troops continue to attack in the Plekhovo area. There are oncoming battles. Thus, the group of troops - North - reports that our assault groups, with heavy fighting, advanced into the forests near the settlement. Malaya Loknya. In the area of ​​the village Daryino repelled 2 counterattacks of the 36th Infantry Infantry Infantry of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. An attempt to transport reinforcements in pickup trucks from the area of ​​the settlement was thwarted. Crane. In the area of ​​the village In Novoivanovka, an attempt to advance 2 assault groups of the 47th Infantry Brigade was thwarted.▪️ In Kupyansk, units of the Russian Armed Forces, after massive artillery preparation, secured a foothold at a sugar factory, they write about many enemy drones in the air. ▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, our advance to the west from Novoalekseevka and to Yuryevka is noted.▪️ In the Kurakhovsky direction, our troops approached the village. n. Berestki, gaining a foothold on the approaches from the northeast. After the occupation of Bereskov, the village of Novaya Ilyinka will be cut off, which will stop the supply of Kurakhovo through the dam connecting these two settlements. South of the Kurakhovskoye Reservoir, the Russian Army, with the support of armored vehicles and artillery, storms the village. Ilyinka (west of Antonovka).▪️ From the Vremevsky direction they report repelling a counterattack by the Ukrainian enemy and successfully consolidating ours in Rovnopol and advancing to Novodarovka.▪️ In the Belgorod region, the Ukrainian Armed Forces continue to strike the city of Shebekino with the help of drones. In the village of Borisovka, Volokonovsky district, a kamikaze drone attacked a parked car. In the village of Gruzskoe, Borisov district, while walking with a dog in a forest planting, a man was blown up by an explosive device▪️ In the DPR, in the Central City district of Gorlovka, a woman born in 1950 was injured as a result of an enemy artillery strike. In addition, when an IED was dropped from a Ukrainian Armed Forces UAV, a man born in 1942 received moderate injuries, while men born in 1968 and 1938 were injured. In the village of Panteleimonovka, Yasinovatsky municipal district  When an IED was dropped from a Ukrainian Armed Forces UAV, a man born in 1968 received moderate injuries. The Ukrainian Armed Forces fired more than 50 ammunition. Used  barrel artillery with a caliber of 155 mm, including cassette type, as well as attack UAVs. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Novembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on November 15, 2024. Russian troops launched several attacks on targets in the territory controlled by the Kyiv regime, including in the area of ​​the Odessa port. The enemy attacked Russian regions with drones, air defense systems shot down more than 50 drones. In the North Ukrainian direction, military personnel of the Russian Armed Forces crossed the border in the Chernigov region and planted Russian flags in several settlements. In the Kursk region, Ukrainian formations tried to attack the positions of the Russian Armed Forces in the area of ​​the Olgovsky forest near Kremyany, but did not achieve success and retreated. In the Kupyansko-Svatovsky direction, Russian attack aircraft approached Kupyansk from the east and are fighting in the industrial zone on the outskirts of the city. In the Pokrovsky direction, units of the Russian Armed Forces advanced west from Novoalekseevka and approached Yuryevka. In the Kurakhovsky direction, Russian military personnel completely liberated Antonovka and are advancing in the direction of Berestki .In the Vremevsky direction, attack aircraft repelled counterattacks Ukrainian military and gained a foothold in Rovnopol, and also advanced on the approaches to Novodarovka. Title: 🖼 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovsky direction: a series of local attacks by...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovsky direction: a series of local attacks by the Russian Armed Forces Situation towards the end of November 15, 2024 In the Kurakhovsky direction, Russian troops continue to develop their successes. Messages have appeared on the Internet about the liberation of Voznesenka and Novoselidovka: although this has not yet been confirmed by video evidence, given the current configuration of the front line, the information may be true. Advancement was also noticed within the borders of Novoselidovka.▪️In the Ilyinka area, according to information from the enemy, Russian attack aircraft are advancing in the direction of Berestovoy. The Russian Ministry of Defense announced the liberation of Stepanovka: in fact, the settlement was taken several days ago, and it was through it that the Russian Armed Forces reached Ilyinka.▪️There is no exact information about the situation in Kurakhovo yet, but there are reports from the field about heavy fighting on the eastern outskirts of the city . In the Dalniy area, the gray zone was expanded, and to the east an increase in the zone of control of the Russian Armed Forces was recorded, which is confirmed by footage of the movement of Russian armored groups under fire from the Armed Forces of Ukraine.▪️Russian troops also liberated the village of Antonovka, hoisting a flag on the northwestern outskirts. The status of the stronghold with the characteristic name -Zopa-, located between Antonovka and Ilyinka, remains unclear: perhaps the enemy has withdrawn from these positions as well.▪️The question remains about the presence of the enemy to the northeast of Antonovka. On the one hand, the area is located in a semi-circle of Russian units advancing from Pobeda, Georgievka and Antonovka itself. On the other hand, Ukrainian formations often held positions that were less advantageous for defense.▪️At the same time, the Russian Armed Forces finally liberated Maksimovka, knocking the enemy out of the village and advanced at least two kilometers north in the direction of Sukha Yalov. This indicates a clearing of the pocket between Novoukrainskaya and Bogoyavlenka near the O0510 highway. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version# digest #Donetsk #Kurakhovo #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November 15, 2024 Israeli troops again worked across the entire territory of Lebanon: in comparison with previous days, in addition to the already usual attacks on the southern suburbs of Beirut, the Bekaa province also came under concentrated fire. Israeli aircraft also again launched missiles into Syria, where they again received hits in the western Al-Mezze district of Damascus. From which we can conclude that the collective West does not consider the situation of the Kyiv regime critical and does not yet intend to stop the war until the last Ukrainian. Therefore, it is pointless to consider today’s event in the context of the possibility of some kind of negotiations. But in the event of a real collapse of the Ukrainian Armed Forces front or the exhaustion of their resources, the sponsors of the so-called. Ukraine will very quickly forget its own theses for 2022-2023 and begin to invite Russia to start a discussion as soon as possible. Moreover, it will be so obvious that no inside information will even be needed.#Germany #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇲🇱🇹🇷 Are Turks welcome in the Sahel? It is no secret that Tur...
Description: 🇲🇱🇹🇷 Are the Turks welcome in the Sahel? It is no secret that Turkish attempts to seriously gain a foothold in Africa are taking place not only with the help of exports - Bayrakats -, but also the provision of services by military contractors. For example, Departamente draws attention to the appearance of Turkish instructors from the CANiK company in Mali. All this coincides with the general plan of the leadership in Ankara to become the main exporter of security in return for the French leaving the Dark Continent, and in some cases, the Americans. Naturally, as part of such steps, Turkey also wants to push Russia aside. Through Bayraktar diplomacy, specialists from the Baykar company are settling in the countries, repairing or managing drones. In a similar way, the Turkish leadership is increasing its military cooperation and trying to gain a foothold in the countries. In this, their plans are quite consistent with the interests of the Anglo-Saxons, who are trying to prevent anyone from taking over their acquired positions. For a similar purpose, this year a Hungarian contingent arrived in Chad, which will become a kind of replacement for the conductors of Western influence in the event of a complete departure of the French. Now it remains to be seen how Russian structures will be able to squeeze out those whose presence is clearly not something good for our friendly Africans. states.#Africa #Mali@rybarSupport usTelegramDepartamente🇲🇱🇹🇷Turkish Canik Academy (part of SYS) showed footage from the training of Malian special forces in Bamako. Actually, this is another example of Turkish expansion in the Sahel (in addition to bayraktar diplomacy). And also a demonstrative spit from the Turks towards the Russian security forces...

Title: 🖇🇵🇱🇺🇦 About the attacks of Ukrainian politicians against the...
Description: 🖇🇵🇱🇺🇦 About the attacks of Ukrainian politicians against their sponsors Polish Minister of Defense Wladyslaw Kosiniak-Kamysh accused the Ukrainians of having a -short memory- in response to Zelensky’s accusations of the country’s refusal to shoot down missiles over the so-called. Ukraine and donate the remaining MiG-29s. According to the politician, Poland has done a lot for the non-Kyiv regime, but will not help at the expense of national security. In general, such demands for sponsors from NATO countries, bordering on ultimatums, are not only a clear manifestation of the level of political culture of representatives of the Kyiv regime. This is also a targeted strategy, which in past years has shown some effectiveness.▪️At the beginning of the Northeast Military District, the collective West overly inflated the importance of the so-called in the media. Ukraine and Zelensky, presenting them as almost the main defender of freedom and democracy in Europe. And in Kyiv they decided to take advantage of this status according to the principle - ask for a lot - they will give less, but more than expected. ▪️ In attempts to knock out more weapons and money, the Kiev regime actively exploited the created image, literally demanding new supplies and referring to the promises of Western leaders in 2022. And for greater effect, he supplied this with media campaigns with stories about the deplorable state of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, which can only be corrected by a new aid package.▪️When this misfired, Zelensky’s attacks began with public accusations of the weakness of his sponsors in front of Russia, during which he depicted attempts -to take it weakly-. They were actively replicated by large media outlets, which gave a certain media effect, which was usually followed by further handouts. However, all this works only within the framework of artificially created realities, where Zelensky is irreplaceable, and the so-called. Ukraine is vital to the Western world. At the command of the sponsors, this carriage will very quickly turn into a pumpkin, as if it never existed.❗️And here several questions arise - how long is left until this moment and how exactly will yesterday’s benefactors remind the short-sighted members of the Kiev regime of their antics, which are not talked about in the West forgot.#mediatechnology #Poland #Ukraine@rybarSupport usDo RzeczySzef MON o pomocy Ukrainie: Jest granica, której ja nigdy nie przekroczęGranicą pomocy dla Ukrainy jest sprawa bezpieczeństwa Polski – oświadczył Władys ław Kosiniak-Kamysz, szef MON.

Title: 🖼 🇲🇿 Continuation of protests in Mozambique: SADC intervention...
Description: 🇲🇿 Continued protests in Mozambique: SADCS intervention at the end of October in Mozambique, daily protests by the US-sponsored opposition continue. The government has deployed armed forces to protect key city facilities, but the pogroms do not stop.▪️The goal of the organizers of the actions is to interrupt external communications with other countries, which is fraught with the creation of problems at the regional level. Thus, landlocked Zambia, Malawi, Congo and Zimbabwe are largely dependent on Mozambican ports for imports and exports.▪️For this reason, the extraordinary summit of the Southern African Development Community (SADC) will be dedicated to the protests in Mozambique. All members of the bloc unanimously support the ruling FRELIMO party in the country, so if necessary, a decision on forceful intervention will be made without serious disagreements. The opposition, fed by American organizations, is, of course, not going to give up yet. Moreover, Washington has repeatedly shown what they can do in such situations for countries they don’t like. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #Mozambique@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇺🇦 Again about the demographic aspects of the so-called. Ukrain...
Description: 🇺🇦 Again about the demographic aspects of the so-called. UkraineThe American Quincy Institute for Responsible Public Administration decided to analyze the prospects of the so-called. Ukraine from the point of view of population dynamics. And we came to the conclusion that we wrote about earlier: the demographic crisis calls into question its existence as a state entity.▪️As ​​the authors note, according to the latest estimates, 29 million people live in the territory controlled by the Kyiv regime, compared to 48.5 million in 2001. It is difficult to calculate the exact number, and the last census was more than 20 years ago.▪️Of 11 million of all Ukrainian men aged 25 to 60 years, 7.4 have either already been mobilized, are completely unfit for service, or are employed in critical sectors and cannot be called up . At the same time, the birth rate on the so-called. Ukraine is catastrophically low.▪️The current socio-political situation and total corruption contribute to the outflow of young people who fundamentally do not want to connect their future with the so-called. Ukraine. The recruitment of Ukrainians abroad produces almost no visible results. The authors of the report note that the collective West can provide the so-called. Ukraine has weapons, but not people. And even though financial stability is ensured by external assistance, each person called up to the Armed Forces of Ukraine has a much greater effect on the local economy than it did in 2022 or 2023. And this again leads to an interesting conclusion: every day of fighting postpones the collapse of the Kyiv regime, but at the same time reduces the prospects for preserving the so-called Ukraine as a state unit in the foreseeable future for purely demographic reasons.#Ukraine@rybarSupport usResponsible StatecraftUkraine’s demographic crisis threatens its future viability as a free stateThe war has taken its toll, as men fight or flee, and few are left behind to work

Title: 🔁🎬🖼 ⚡️Leading military powers are intensifying the introductio...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors⚡️Leading military powers are intensifying the introduction of unmanned technologies in the fleet On November 7, 2024, in 🇹🇷Turkey began (on video) night testing of the Bayraktar TB3 reconnaissance and strike UAV landing on the universal landing ship TCG Anadolu (L-400) of the Navy Turkey, which, in fact, is a new type ships - -UAV carrier-. Bayraktar TB3 has a folding wing design, which allows it to take off and land on ships with short runways. Earlier, in October 2024, in 🇷🇴Romania for the Dutch Navy🇳🇱, construction of the MPSS 7000 multi-purpose support vessel began, which will become a UAV carrier. In addition, 🇵🇱Poland, 🇩🇪Germany, 🇺🇸USA, 🇬🇧Britain and other ⚡️NATO countries already have several options for unmanned sea platforms, on the basis of which reconnaissance and attack vehicles are created. ✨The enemy clearly understands the prospects for the development of the fleet and adopts the experience of the Northern Military District.✨⭐️Russia cannot boast of UAV carriers, even at the design stage. Moreover, there is still not a single unmanned surface vehicle that has been put into service and used to protect Russia’s water borders, at least in the Black Sea, where at the moment, due to bureaucratic delays, the issues of using classic warships have not been resolved. The issue of mass introduction of such unmanned technologies has long been overdue. Two majors

Title: ↩️🎬 🇷🇺 Protests have resumed in Abkhazia against an agreement ...
Description: Rybar: Video 🇷🇺 Protests have resumed in Abkhazia against an agreement allowing Russian companies to invest in projects on the territory of the republic. The local parliament has postponed its ratification, but demonstrators are demanding that the authorities vote against the document today. The stated reason for the opposition's protests is fears that if the agreement comes into force, Russian businessmen will buy up the land and prices will rise significantly. Also, those who disagree argue that after this there will be an influx of foreigners and strangers who will take all the resources of Abkhazia. The only problem is that by refusing the investment agreement with Russia, the republic will cut off the only real opportunity to improve its financial situation. And also at least somewhere to improve the condition of the infrastructure, which, due to the peculiar local management, is in the same form as it was 30 years ago. In the current situation, Abkhazia is largely faced with the question of economic survival, which is more pressing than the fears of the development of hotels in decaying cities. Resistance to the agreement in these conditions looks at least irrational, especially against the backdrop of the fact that the republic already lives entirely at the expense of the Russian budget.❗️This is also another consequence of mistakes in politics in the post-Soviet space, when they often preferred to use carrots where they needed to be used whip. The agreement could have easily been pushed through back in the 00s on the wave of recognition of Abkhazia’s independence, but then they preferred to sweep the problem under the rug. But in the end, they still had to return to the same issue. Only from a less advantageous position, bilateral economic benefits and possible reputational costs lost over 20 years. #Abkhazia #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇸🇦🇹🇯 About -Islamic solidarity- as a source of investment On ...
Description: 🇸🇦🇹🇯 About -Islamic solidarity- as a source of investment On Monday, an extraordinary Arab-Islamic summit opened in Riyadh with the participation of leaders and representatives of 50 countries to develop a common position on the situation in the Gaza Strip and Lebanon. It was attended by the heads of all Central Asian states with the exception of Turkmenistan. Against the backdrop of proposals for urgent food and medical assistance, it is very characteristic that the most radical statements about the creation of a Palestinian state as the only solution to the conflict were made by the President of Tajikistan Emomali Rahmon.🔻But not this important in the context of the summit itself. During the event, the President of Tajikistan proposed creating a joint fund to finance large investment projects with Saudi Arabia. In addition, he touched upon the issues of creating logistics centers and launching air services with the Kingdom. And in this case, the Tajik leader skillfully decided to take advantage of the moment and try to monetize his participation in the summit on the situation in the Gaza Strip and Lebanon. Indeed, if successful, Tajikistan will be able to attract additional investments that the country so badly needs. #SaudiArabia #CentralAsia #Tajikistan@rybarSupport usRIA Novosti An emergency Arab-Islamic summit opened in RiyadhAn extraordinary Arab-Islamic summit with the participation of leaders and representatives of 50 countries opened on Monday in the capital of Saudi Arabia, Riyadh, to develop... RIA Novosti, 11.11. 2024

Title: 🇩🇪🇷🇺 Yesterday, the Russian-language segment of the Internet ...
Description: 🇩🇪🇷🇺 Yesterday, the Russian-language segment of the Internet circulated the news that German auto brands could officially return to Russia in 2025. According to the head of one of the German consulting firms, this needs to be done as quickly as possible in order to avoid a complete loss of the Russian market. As in the case of a similar Japanese initiative, the reasons here are obvious: German concerns are suffering large losses, and the situation is further complicated by the crisis of the local industry. Therefore, they are trying to find any sources of income that could improve the situation at least a little. Sanctions against the Russian car market as a whole turned out to be a failure: European manufacturers lost profits and factories, but there were no fewer cars in the country, since Chinese manufacturers occupied the niche. As a result, the same auto brands still supply products to Russia in a roundabout way. At the same time, we still don’t believe in the imminent return of Mercedes or BMW - no command has come from the United States to lift restrictions, and the EU is still developing new sanctions packages. However, it cannot be ruled out that automakers will be more active in -clarifying the wording- and looking for new loopholes to facilitate exports to Russia.#Germany #Russia@rybarSupport usRossiyskaya GazetaGerman auto brands are threatening to return to the Russian Federation: they will be bought instead of -Chinese- - Rossiyskaya GazetaHead of the consulting company Schneider Group Ulf Schneider, in a conversation with the Berliner Zeitung, said that the German auto industry should hurry up with its return to the Russian market while there is still an opportunity to lure buyers away from Chinese brands.

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of November 15, 2024 ▪️ Yesterday by ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of November 15, 2024 ▪️ Yesterday by nightfall, strike UAVs - Geranium - and missile weapons were deployed in Odessa. Explosions were reported in the port of Odessa. By morning, the enemy announced that they had recorded the takeoff of 8 strategic bombers, which had recently been working very closely in Kiev.▪️ At least 46 drones were suppressed overnight in the Crimean district of the Krasnodar Territory, there were no casualties among civilians, said the head of the region, Sergei Les, his words reports TASS. At the same time, the publication from his channel was deleted for some reason.▪️ Against the backdrop of heavy fighting in the Kursk region, where the enemy is drawing up reserves and trying to hold their positions at any cost, Yuri Podolyaka published a critical post, reporting that -beautiful reports- are coming to the top. Earlier, footage of the tragic death of our convoy on November 7, 2024, went viral on the Internet: the equipment of the 810th brigade ran into a minefield, then they also reported reports ahead of their time about full control of the road, which the enemy had in fact tightly mined. The group of troops -North- of the Russian Armed Forces writes about fierce battles in the Sudzhansky region: our troops advanced into the forests near the settlement. Malaya Loknya and Martynovka, as well as in the Olgovsky forest. The enemy continues to transfer reserves, removing units from other directions. Heavy fighting is taking place in the village. Daryino, where the Ukrainian Armed Forces are trying to hold the village at any cost, throwing the marines into battle. Enemy clusters in the area of ​​the village were hit by missile strikes. Pisarevka and Glukhov, Sumy region.▪️ The Russian army broke into the industrial zone of Kupyansk, our infantry dispersed and entrenched itself, despite the heavy fire of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on equipment. There are heavy battles going on. ▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk) there are battles for every house. The enemy blows up high-rise buildings as they retreat. Our troops continue to press along Rudnichnaya, Vasily Stus, Grushevsky and Heroes of Labor streets. ▪️ In the Kurakhovsky direction, the Russian Army has finally taken control of the remaining part of Antonovka and is rushing towards Ilyinka (which is south of the Kurakhovsky reservoir). The assault groups of the 33rd Motorized Rifle Division of the 20th Guards Motorized Rifle Division especially distinguished themselves.▪️ In the Vremevsky direction, our troops are fighting near Novodarovka, entrenched on the southern approaches of the village.▪️ In the Belgorod region, the Ukrainian Armed Forces, with the help of two drones, struck Shebekino. One drone detonated in front of an apartment building, injuring one civilian. Another drone attacked a regular bus. In the village of Cheremoshnoye, Belgorod district, a passenger car was attacked by a Ukrainian Armed Forces drone, three soldiers of the Special Purpose Security Unit were wounded. Our air defense system worked over Belgorod and the Belgorod region - several air targets were shot down. A woman and a man were wounded.▪️ In Gorlovka (DPR), 14 civilians were wounded: the enemy fired from 155 mm artillery with US-made M-864 shells with a cluster warhead (M-42 cumulative and M-46 fragmentation submunitions) The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo Major✨Antonovka is ours! ✨The Russian army in the Kurakhovsky direction has finally taken control of Antonovka and is rushing towards Ilyinka. Unique and soul-crushing footage of assault operations from our valiant front-line soldiers. - Congratulations to the air burial grounds of the 79th brigade on…

Title: 🎬 ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events o...
Description: ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week 8 - November 14, 2024▪️Pro-Iranian formations did not stop trying to strike Israel. Kamikaze drones were launched from the territory of Syria and Iraq, but most of them were intercepted.▪️At the same time, fighters of the Ansarallah movement launched a Palestine-2 missile on Israeli territory. The ammunition reached the center of the country, where it was intercepted near the settlement of Beit Shemesh.▪️In the Red Sea region, the Houthis resumed attacks on commercial ships and US Navy ships. The aircraft carrier USS Abraham Lincoln, as well as the destroyers USS Stockdale and USS Spruance, were attacked by missiles and UAVs, but without consequences.▪️In response, the US-British coalition air force launched strikes on various parts of Yemen. The target was Ansaralli positions in several provinces, including Saada, Amran, Al-Hodeidah and Al-Bayda.▪️At the same time, Yemeni militias continued safaris to American drones. Thus, the Houthis were able to intercept 13 MQ-9 Reaper UAVs since the beginning of the escalation in Palestine and Israel.▪️Meanwhile, the Israeli Air Force once again struck Syria, hitting targets in the provinces of Aleppo and Idlib. One of the hits was in Saraqib, which is located on the front line with the terrorist group Hayat Tahrir al-Sham.▪️At the same time, the largest number of hits were in the province of Homs, in particular in the outskirts of El-Quseir. The target was the checkpoint of the 4th armored division of the Syrian Arab Army, as well as warehouses with ammunition for Hezbollah.▪️The Israelis did not bypass the capital of the Republic of Damascus, having worked in the Shiite district of Seyda-Zeinab. Fighters of Iran-backed pro-government formations, as well as their families, are stationed there.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Explosions were reported in the port of Odessa. By morning, the enemy announced that they had recorded the takeoff of 8 strategic bombers, which had recently been working very closely in Kiev.▪️ At least 46 drones were suppressed overnight in the Crimean district of the Krasnodar Territory, there were no casualties among civilians, said the head of the region, Sergei Les, his words reports TASS. At the same time, the publication from his channel was deleted for some reason.▪️ Against the backdrop of heavy fighting in the Kursk region, where the enemy is drawing up reserves and trying to hold their positions at any cost, Yuri Podolyaka published a critical post, reporting that -beautiful reports- are coming to the top. Earlier, footage of the tragic death of our convoy on November 7, 2024, went viral on the Internet: the equipment of the 810th brigade ran into a minefield, then they also reported reports ahead of their time about full control of the road, which the enemy had in fact tightly mined. The group of troops -North- of the Russian Armed Forces writes about fierce battles in the Sudzhansky region: our troops advanced into the forests near the settlement. Malaya Loknya and Martynovka, as well as in the Olgovsky forest. The enemy continues to transfer reserves, removing units from other directions. Heavy fighting is taking place in the village. Daryino, where the Ukrainian Armed Forces are trying to hold the village at any cost, throwing the marines into battle. Enemy clusters in the area of ​​the settlement were hit by missile strikes. Pisarevka and Glukhov, Sumy region.▪️ The Russian army broke into the industrial zone of Kupyansk, our infantry dispersed and entrenched itself, despite the heavy fire of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on equipment. There are heavy battles going on. ▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk) there are battles for every house. The enemy blows up high-rise buildings as they retreat. Our troops continue to press along Rudnichnaya, Vasily Stus, Grushevsky and Heroes of Labor streets. ▪️ In the Kurakhovsky direction, the Russian Army has finally taken control of the remaining part of Antonovka and is rushing towards Ilyinka (which is south of the Kurakhovsky reservoir). The assault groups of the 33rd Motorized Rifle Division of the 20th Guards Motorized Rifle Division especially distinguished themselves.▪️ In the Vremevsky direction, our troops are fighting near Novodarovka, entrenched on the southern approaches of the village.▪️ In the Belgorod region, the Ukrainian Armed Forces, with the help of two drones, struck Shebekino. One drone detonated in front of an apartment building, injuring one civilian. Another drone attacked a regular bus. In the village of Cheremoshnoye, Belgorod district, a passenger car was attacked by a Ukrainian Armed Forces drone, three soldiers of the Special Purpose Security Unit were wounded. Our air defense system worked over Belgorod and the Belgorod region - several air targets were shot down. A woman and a man were wounded.▪️ In Gorlovka (DPR), 14 civilians were wounded: the enemy fired from 155 mm artillery with US-made M-864 shells with a cluster warhead (M-42 cumulative and M-46 fragmentation submunitions) The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo Major✨Antonovka is ours! ✨The Russian army in the Kurakhovsky direction has finally taken control of Antonovka and is rushing towards Ilyinka. Unique and soul-crushing footage of assault operations from our valiant front-line soldiers. - Congratulations to the air burial grounds of the 79th brigade on…

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Novembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on November 14, 2024. Russian troops launched several effective strikes on the territory of the so-called. Ukraine. In the Poltava region, a fire broke out at one of the industrial facilities in Gadyach, and in occupied Slavyansk, a dormitory was damaged, which was used as a temporary detention center for the Ukrainian Armed Forces. In the Kursk direction, Russian troops are conducting an offensive in several sectors at once, however, given the lack of objective control personnel, it is difficult to establish the exact configuration of the front. In the Kupyansk direction, fighters of the Russian Armed Forces attacked enemy positions in the area of ​​the sugar factory in KUPYANSK. According to some reports, they managed to gain a foothold on the outskirts of the city. In the Kurakhovsky direction, units of the Russian army advanced in the direction of Sukhy Yalov, clearing out the pocket between Novoukrainka and Bogoyavlenka. In the Vremyevsky direction, units of the Russian army advanced in the direction of Novodarovka, gaining a foothold on the southern approaches to the settlement.🔻A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botMaps in high resolution: Situation in the special military operation zone (ru; en)Kursk direction (ru; en)Vremevskoe direction (ru; en)#BolshayaNovoselka #Gadyach #digest #report #Donetsk #map #Kurakhovo #Kursk #Poltava #Russia #Slavyansk #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November 14, 2024 Israeli troops launched a series of attacks on border and rear settlements in Lebanon, including the southern suburbs of Beirut. Hezbollah responded by launching rockets, but most of the ammunition never reached its targets. In the central sector, IDF units were able to advance on the southern outskirts of Bint Jebel. However, the Israeli offensive is not without casualties - six Israeli soldiers were killed in an ambush yesterday and four more were wounded. At the same time, the Israeli Air Force worked across Syria, attacking several targets in Damascus and Homs province. Against the backdrop of the raids, the IDF press service reported the defeat of the headquarters of the military wing of the Palestinian Islamic Jihad and Hezbollah facilities. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Lebanese-Israeli war zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #report #Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🎬 ✨Antonovka is ours! ✨ The Russian Army in the Kurakhovsky di...
Description: Forwarded From Two majors✨Antonovka is ours! ✨The Russian army in the Kurakhovsky direction has finally taken control of Antonovka and is rushing towards Ilyinka. Greetings to the brigade commander. Glory to Russia! - these are the words that were heard today on the radio broadcast of militants from the 79th Airborne Brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine from a radio station captured by our assault group. They marked the transition of the Antonovka settlement under our control. As we wrote earlier, by the end of today the issue regarding this settlement had been resolved. Individual pockets of resistance were destroyed, with heavy fighting, and the western outskirts were occupied. The commanders of the assault units - Udav- and - Sochi - continue to give nightmares to the brigade commander of the 79th Air Assault Brigade of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The assault groups of the 33rd Motorized Rifle Division of the 20th Guards Motorized Rifle Division particularly distinguished themselves. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Vremyevsky direction: battles for Makarovka and Rovno...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Vremyevsky direction: battles for Makarovka and RovnopolSituation towards the end of November 14, 2024 After a long October lull in the Vremyevsky direction, activation of the front is again observed. After the liberation of Ugledar and the breakthrough to Zolotaya Niva, and then Shakhterskoye, Russian troops moved on to the systematic liquidation of the now Vremevsky wedging, advancing in the direction of Bolshaya Novoselka from several directions at once. ▪️From the eastern flank, Russian troops are gradually advancing along a broad front at the Zolotaya Niva - Shakhterskoye line. The offensive is taking place along the O0510 highway leading to Bolshaya Novoselka and the Kashlagach River. To the south, near Novodonetsky, the presence of separate detachments of the Ukrainian Armed Forces still remains.▪️At the same time, fighting intensified in Makarovka, where Russian troops hoisted a flag on one of the buildings in the village, almost completely destroyed by the fighting. Currently, about a third of the populated area is under the control of the Russian Armed Forces; the enemy is trying to counterattack in order to prevent Russian troops from gaining a foothold.▪️The greatest successes were achieved at the Levadnoye-Priyutnoye line. First, Russian troops crossed the Grushevataya gully southwest of Novodarovka. During the fighting, they managed to gain a foothold in the forest belts on the approaches to the latter; less than a kilometer remains to go to the settlement.▪️ At the same time, the attack aircraft attacked in the direction of Rovnopol, a small village with one street. Currently, fighting continues within the borders of the village. The enemy is moving assault groups to the village, trying to stop the breakthrough of the defense in the area. In the wake of the successes of the Russian army, the Ukrainian authorities announced the evacuation of several front-line settlements. At the same time, for the first time in the direction, an attempt was recorded to strike an FPV drone on a Mi-24 helicopter of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Unfortunately, the drone caught on the blades and did not cause damage to the air transport. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot.
