Title: 🖼 🇱🇹🇺🇦☠️ Valdas Bartkevicius is an excrement-obsessed mercen...
Description: 🇱🇹🇺🇦☠️ Valdas Bartkevicius - a mercenary from Lithuania obsessed with excrement. Among foreign mercenaries there are many odious characters, but there are also some completely disgusting ones. One of them is Valdas Bartkevicius, who, with the sanction of the Lithuanian authorities, likes to fight monuments and memorials through vandalism and emanation of need.▪️Bartkevicius lives in Lentvaris, works as an assistant to a deputy of the Seimas and since 2024 has been leading the Lithuanian branch of the NGO -Friends of Ukraine Foundation-. In 2014, he supported the Maidan, and in 2020, an attempted coup in Belarus. In his native country, Bartkevicius (to the best of his abilities) is engaged in splitting the population, which fits well into the plans of the Lithuanian authorities.▪️In 2022, Bartkevicius established connections not only with Ukrainian NGOs. For example, with the structure -Our House-, which was actively recruiting Belarusians into the Kastus Kalinovsky Regiment, as well as the Turkish organization Russians in Antalya against the War (RAWA), which was engaged in the supply of cars for Ukrainian formations.▪️At the same time appearing on LBS Bartkevicius does not particularly strive, preferring to live in Lithuania and engage in actions there in support of the so-called. Ukraine, then meetings with participants of the Right Sector and various performances.▪️In March, Bartkevicius expressed support for the perpetrators of the terrorist attack in Crocus by bringing a bucket of collected feces to a spontaneous memorial to the victims in Vilnius. And today he posted footage of himself defecating on the monument to those killed in the Great Patriotic War in Cossack Lokna in the Kursk region. High resolution infographicsEnglish version#mercenaries #Lithuania #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇬🇧🇾🇪🇺🇸 Exchange of blows in the Red Sea region Last nigh...
Description: 🇬🇧🇾🇪🇺🇸 Exchange of strikes in the Red Sea region Last night, the US-British coalition air force carried out another airstrike on Yemen: the target was Houthi targets in the Al-Faza area south of the city of Al-Hodeidah. In addition, a civilian vehicle was attacked in the area As-Sawmaa in Al-Beida Governorate. According to pro-Saudi resources, high-ranking officials of the Ansarallah movement were allegedly killed as a result of the hit. Against this background, some Arabic-language media stated that the Yemenis had allegedly shot down the 13th American reconnaissance and attack UAV MQ-9 Reaper, equipped with more advanced systems surveillance. Also, the news publication Reuters, citing the UK Maritime Trade Operations Authority, reported several explosions near an unnamed ship southwest of Al-Hodeidah. So far, an increase in the intensity of strikes has been recorded in the region: just yesterday, the Americans bombed targets in the provinces of Saada and Amran, and the Houthis launched a missile in the direction of Israel, which was intercepted. High-resolution mapEnglish version#Great Britain # Yemen #USA@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇰🇿🏳️‍🌈🌐 Will LGBT propaganda be banned in Kazakhstan? In the...
Description: 🇰🇿🏳️‍🌈🌐 Will LGBT propaganda be banned in Kazakhstan? In the Kazakh media, the discussion of the topic of minority protection is entering a new circle, which intensified after the partial satisfaction of the petition - We are against open and hidden LGBT propaganda in the Republic of Kazakhstan! -, as well as the recent parliamentary request of the ruling AMANAT party activities of the queer feminist collective - Feminita - addressed to the Prime Minister and the Prosecutor General of the country. To introduce restrictions on the dissemination of sexualized content among children, the Ministry of Culture of the Republic of Kazakhstan had to turn to all the laws of the Republic - from the Constitution to the Act on the Rights of the Child, according to which government agencies, individuals and legal entities are obliged to protect the child from the negative impact of the social environment, information , propaganda and agitation -. However, the decision began to be challenged by the Kazakhstan International Bureau for Human Rights and Rule of Law and Human Rights Watch, which are funded by the Soros Foundation. So the victorious reports of the local press and hopes for the defeat of LGBT are premature: the protection of the rights of minorities in Kazakhstan is carried out by serious, well-rooted organizations with impressive funding.🔻For more information about who, under the guise of LGBT, is promoting the traditions of bacha-bazi in Kazakhstan, read our new article .High resolution infographicsEnglish version#Kazakhstan #LGBT #globalismProject -Rybar-Will LGBT propaganda be banned in Kazakhstan* It all started in the summer, when it suddenly became clear that there is a civil society in Kazakhstan

Title: 🖼 🇦🇺🇸🇬 About Exercise Trident 2024 The Australian Armed Forc...
Description: 🇦🇺🇸🇬 About Exercise Trident 2024 The Australian Armed Forces continue to conduct bilateral international exercises. In addition to ongoing training with the Indonesians, they have also started the Trident 2024 event with Singaporean military personnel. About two thousand troops are involved in the exercise. The parties plan to practice landing personnel on the coast of Queensland, as well as conduct two operations in urban areas and the jungle. IAI Heron-1 reconnaissance UAVs will also be used. By the way, conducting such training in Australia is due to a specific reason - in tiny Singapore there is simply not enough space for such events, which is why they have historically resorted to the services of Taiwan and other allied states. 📌 This is precisely why the Singaporean authorities made a deal with the Australians to modernize a training site in Queensland worth a billion dollars. In return, military personnel from Singapore will be able to use the facility once construction work is completed. Given that one of Singapore's policy priorities is to build up its military power, the opportunity to conduct training in Australia is of utmost importance. So the scale and complexity of exercises like Trident 2024 will only grow in the future. High resolution mapEnglish version#Australia #Singapore@rybar in collaboration with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺💰 And again about measures to support Russian business While...
Description: 🇷🇺💰 And again about measures to support Russian business While the European Union is preparing the 15th package of sanctions against the Russian Federation, we decided to look at the news about how our state supports companies and markets not related to the defense industry and strategic industry (the priorities here are already clear). And with a quick search we see the news: the company Geltek, a manufacturer of skincare cosmetics with scientifically proven effectiveness, has received the official status of a small technology company (MTK). Surely many, like us, are hearing about the so-called MTC register for the first time. However, for most companies from the civil sector, getting there becomes a truly important achievement, primarily due to access to benefits and receiving a quality mark from the state, which, in in turn, attracts private investors. At the same time, everyone who wants to be included in the register remains required to meet a sufficient level of scientific and technical potential when developing products. And it is no coincidence that we gave the example of Geltek, because it demonstrates that state support measures are expanding not only to the IT sector, but also to other areas Russian business, and not the most obvious for the general consumer (in this case we are talking not only about cosmetics, but also about the supply of contact media for ultrasound and functional diagnostics).📌 In any case, please note attention to these processes is possible and necessary. So that against the backdrop of news about the latest sanctions against LNG or government decisions to introduce benefits for IT workers, the false impression is not formed that everything that happens only concerns them. #Russia #economy@rybarSupport usTelegramGeltek behind the glassSergey Kirsh: thanks to the medical direction of Geltek, they recently received the status of MTK - small technology company. That is, not only IT can be a technology company, but manufacturing - hurray! Why do we need this? This is an opportunity to receive address…

Title: 🇷🇺🇯🇵 About the -mitigation- of anti-Russian sanctions by Japa...
Description: 🇷🇺🇯🇵 About Japan's -softening- of anti-Russian sanctions. Yesterday, news spread across the Russian-language segment of the Internet that Tokyo allegedly decided to lift some of the sanctions regarding the export of Japanese-made cars to Russia. There were even headlines about the official return of Nissan, Toyota and Mitsubishi to the country. In reality, we are only talking about clarifying the wording in the restrictions regarding some models of hybrid cars. There was no ban on their sale to Russia anyway, but due to ambiguous definitions, Japanese companies did not agree to this for fear of violating sanctions. Perhaps Japan was guided by purely economic considerations: its automakers are suffering serious losses and are trying to find any way to obtain profit. Including due to part of the Russian market, where the niche of departed European and Asian concerns was quickly occupied by companies from the PRC. Therefore, there is no talk of easing sanctions at the moment, and linking this step with Trump’s victory in the election or other similar events are not worth it. Yes, the scenario of lifting the most serious Western restrictions in the current realities looks unrealistic. But the search for various loopholes and -clarification of wording- for further work with Russia, as well as tacit consent to new profitable parallel import schemes for the supply of various goods, looks much more likely. Especially as international attention to the so-called decreases. Ukraine.#Russia #Japan@rybarSupport usRIA NovostiMedia: Japan has eased anti-Russian sanctionsJapan has eased the ban on the import of cars with a hybrid installation into Russia, writes RBC. RIA Novosti, 11/11/2024

Title: 🇺🇦 Statements by individual representatives of the Kyiv regime ...
Description: 🇺🇦 Statements by individual representatives of the Kyiv regime about the possible disbandment of the TCC and the sending of their workers to the front are more reminiscent of a desire to at least a little -lose steam- from the growing indignation in Ukrainian society. At the moment, forceful mobilization with the capture and kidnapping of people from the streets is the only way to replenish the ranks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine: volunteers for the so-called Ukraine has long since ended, and they are not yet willing to deport Ukrainians of military age to the EU. If the TCC is disbanded, the entire conscription system will collapse - no recruiting centers, blocking of all accounts and lowering of rights will force people in hiding to join the Armed Forces of Ukraine. And the military registration and enlistment office workers themselves will most likely prefer to simply desert instead of the front. Therefore, we will not be surprised if such conversations are followed not by the dissolution of the TCC, but by vesting them with the powers of the police and all law enforcement agencies in general to expand mobilization. In clear accordance with the strategy - war until the last Ukrainian -.#Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramTurned in war 🇷🇺We continue the locomotive of pushing. We must clearly understand that there is no pluralism of opinions in Ukrainian politics. Everything, I repeat, everything that representatives of the establishment say is the voiced idea of ​​the main leadership of the country. Whether it’s the mobilization of yesterday’s...

Title: 🇪🇺🇮🇳🇫🇷 Interesting news illustrating the problems of the Eu...
Description: 🇪🇺🇮🇳🇫🇷 Interesting news illustrating the problems of the European military-industrial complex: the head of the department of the General Staff of the French ground forces said that in Paris they are considering the option of purchasing Indian Pinaka MLRS as a replacement for the old American M270 MLRS. It turns out that France cannot meet the needs for the jet artillery either independently or with the help of European NATO allies. Therefore, for the supply of conventional MLRS, they are forced to turn to India, which has only recently entered the world arms market. Yes, it is reckless to write off the French military industry - the same CAESAR, Rafale, Mistral or SCALP-EG are quite advanced examples of military products. However, even 10 years ago, the statement that the Fifth Republic would consider purchasing Indian artillery would have been considered a joke. In general, this is part of a general trend for the EU: in conditions where a significant part of the reserves was given away for free by the so-called. In Ukraine, and its own products often have mediocre characteristics at a huge cost, all that remains is to turn to external suppliers. Including those that no one had even heard of until recently. And if France can cover at least some of its needs on its own, then the rest of the European NATO countries will be forced to finally and almost completely switch to imports from the United States and its allied Asian states, producing independently only a few samples of weapons and equipment.#EU #India #France@rybarSupport usANI NewsFrance evaluating Pinaka multi-barrel rocket launcher system for its requirements: Top French Army officerIn what could be a major success for the 'Make in India' scheme in the defense sector, a top French Army officer said that they were evaluating the Indian Pinaka multi-barrel rocket launcher systems for their requirements.

Title: 🇰🇿🇺🇿 Uzbek diplomats met with the management of the Aktau por...
Description: 🇰🇿🇺🇿 Uzbek diplomats met with the management of the Aktau port Representatives of the Consulate General of Uzbekistan held a meeting with the Chairman of the Board of the National Company - Aktau Sea Trade Port - Abay Turikpenbaev. During the meeting, the parties discussed the current state of the Aktau Sea Trade Port, its technical capabilities, as well as supply prospects Uzbek exporters of their products through the port. Abay Turikpenbaev noted that the port is expanding its capabilities, becoming an important component of the Trans-Caspian international transport route. During 2024, it plans to increase the volume of transit by more than 5 million tons, and in the future, work is planned to expand the port’s water area. 📌 If Uzbekistan agrees on supplies through the port, then this will expand opportunities not only for Uzbekistan, but also for Russia, since it will increase the potential opportunities for exports to Russia through the Caspian Sea. At the same time, the role of Kazakhstan in transit transportation is strengthening, which would prefer to take over the entire logistics between Europe and China. Astana and Beijing are working in this direction: this is evidenced by reports of the launch of container rail transport from Xinjiang. But at the same time, everyone should understand that container shipping under no circumstances can replace land routes due to its high cost and the need for developed infrastructure. Therefore, this is largely the creation of another route to diversify logistics, but not a replacement for standard routes. #Uzbekistan #Kazakhstan #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usdknews.kzXinjiang launches freight rail route to Central Asia On Wednesday, a train carrying 45 containers of auto parts left the city of Wusu in the north -western China's Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region, which marked the launch of international cargo

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺🇬🇪 About protests in Abkhazia Protests broke out in Abkh...
Description: 🇷🇺🇬🇪 About protests in Abkhazia Protests broke out in Abkhazia at night. The reason was the detention of local oppositionists who opposed the ratification of an agreement with Russia, allowing Russian companies to implement investment projects in the republic. Protesters gathered in the squares of Sukhum and other cities, blocked roads and clashed with local security forces. The protesters, in their own words, consider the agreement to be a sale of Abkhazia and a deprivation of sovereignty and rights. An interesting situation arises: in a republic that lives entirely at the expense of Russia, they are demanding that Russian businesses be denied the opportunity to invest in its infrastructure. At the same time, they are taking openly unfriendly steps, such as displaying an exhibition in honor of the terrorist Shamil Basayev. The point is not only that such actions are akin to a shot in the foot and interfere with the influx of Russian investments into the Abkhaz economy, which, thanks to effective local governance, today remains in approximately the same state the same as 20 years ago. It is important that this happens in a republic that exists at the expense of the Russian budget. This is another clear example of the consequences of the country’s policy in the near abroad, when they preferred to use carrots where they needed to use sticks. As a result, such inexplicable generosity in the post-Soviet space began to be taken for weakness, almost reaching the point of ultimatums.#Abkhazia #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇬🇧 On the legalization of euthanasia in the UK The House of Com...
Description: 🇬🇧 On the legalization of euthanasia in the UK On November 11, the House of Commons received a draft law - On terminally ill adults -. According to it, a patient who may die within 6 months will have the right to voluntarily die. To do this, two independent doctors will have to verify the independence of the decision, and the High Court will have to approve the request. At least seven days must pass between the doctors’ reports, and after the judge’s decision, another 14 days. The person will be allowed to change his mind at any time, and if he finally agrees, he will have to self-administer the lethal substance. Pressure or coercion to commit suicide will be punishable by up to 14 years in prison. Members of the House of Commons will take part in the first debate and vote on the bill on November 29. If it is approved during the first discussion, then parliamentarians will gradually begin further discussions and introduce amendments to the legal act. Looking at what is happening, the question arises: wouldn’t this be the first step towards allowing people to die not only incurably? sick people, or anyone in general for absolutely any reason? How has this already been implemented, for example, in Canada? #Great Britain #globalism@rybar together with @oldGBRSupport usbills.parliament.ukTerminally Ill Adults (End of Life) Bill publications - Parliamentary Bills - UK ParliamentDocuments, and debates for Terminally Ill Adults (End of Life) Bill

Title: 🇮🇩🇨🇳 Last weekend, Indonesian leader Prabowo Subian arrived i...
Description: 🇮🇩🇨🇳 Last weekend, Indonesian leader Prabowo Subianto arrived in Beijing. There he met with Chinese President Xi Jinping, who during the negotiations expressed hope for the beginning of a new chapter in bilateral relations. During the meeting, the situation in the South China Sea was not discussed. The parties entered into a memorandum of understanding in the field of oil and gas production in those parts of the water area where the claims of Indonesia and China intersect. 🔻The signing of such an agreement is a significant event. The wording - overlapping maritime claims - in the joint statement makes it clear that Indonesia takes into account the claims of the PRC to the water area. And although Jakarta has already stated that its position on the issue has remained unchanged, before that the authorities claimed that, in general, they do not recognize Chinese claims to Indonesia’s exclusive economic zone. 🔻After Prabowo was elected to the presidency, experts and observers assumed that he would defend rights to the water area in the same way as last President Joko Widodo did, if not even tougher. Now it seems that everything could go according to a slightly different scenario. However, taking into account the foreign policy course of the Jakarta authorities, it is too early to discount the chance of implementing tough measures in this area. After all, Indonesia most often tries to seek a balance in international relations with other states, especially with such important players as China. #Indonesia #China@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usThe China-Global South ProjectChina’s Xi Hails ‘New Chapter’ in Relations With IndonesiaChinese President Xi Jinping told his Indonesian counterpart that Beijing hopes for a

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of November 12, 2024 ▪️ In the Kursk ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of November 12, 2024▪️ In the Kursk region, assault groups of our troops advanced in the area of ​​the village with heavy fighting. Daryino, Novoivanovka and adjacent forest areas. The enemy puts up fierce resistance and throws elite airborne and marine units into battle. The Ukrainian Armed Forces launched 8 attacks during the day. Heavy footage of the destruction near the village was dispersed. Cellars on November 7, 2024 of our column of the 810th Guards Marine Brigade in a minefield. According to information from the field, leaked onto the network, armored vehicles and personnel died due to - beautiful reports - about supposed control of the road and, as a result, unconducted engineering reconnaissance of the area. At the same time, the total mining of the territory of the Kursk region by the Armed Forces of Ukraine is an absolutely clear fact for our military.▪️ Yesterday morning, 13 Tu-95ms strategic bombers caused a blackout in Ukraine (to avoid overloads in networks in the event of an attack). However, the expected missile strike was never carried out. That night the enemy reported a nightly -norm- of several dozen -Geraniums-. Enemy drones flew to Voronezh yesterday, causing damage to an industrial enterprise.▪️ Our troops are moving deeper into the eastern part of the Kurakhovo urban area - the enemy’s main fortified area after the capture of Ugledar in the Yuzhnodonetsk direction. Kurakhovo is also surrounded on three sides by a wide area, attacks from the south are coming to the village. Further, from the north, the Russian Army is developing its success along the Kurakhovskoye reservoir, the dam of which was blown up by the Ukrainian Armed Forces yesterday. This action, at most, will make it difficult to cover Kurakhovo from the north.▪️ The troops of the Zaporozhye Front of the Russian Armed Forces, according to the estimates of the speaker of the enemy’s southern defense forces, are planning to begin assault operations in the coming days. At the same time, the enemy declares that in the Zaporozhye direction our troops numerically exceed the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The main target of the strike, as reported by the enemy, is the city of Zaporozhye with a pre-war population of 710 thousand people.▪️ Also indicative was the visit of Russian Defense Minister Belousov to the Dnepr group of troops (Kherson direction). Inspection may also indicate an assessment of the situation on the ground before making decisions.▪️ In the Belgorod region, the Ukrainian Armed Forces used a drone to attack an oil depot on the territory of the Stary Oskol urban district. As a result of the explosion, one of the tanks caught fire. Ten fire brigades worked at the scene and quickly extinguished the fire. There were no casualties. In a closed village, a man was blown up by an explosive device. The emergency occurred in the village of Dronovka, Grayvoronsky district, entry into which is limited by the decision of the operational headquarters from August 28, 2024. Strikes by the Ukrainian Armed Forces also fell on Oktyabrsky, Belgorod district, settlement. New Tavolzhanka in the Shebekinsky municipal district, Balka farm. Palace in the DPR in the Nikitovsky district of Gorlovka, when resetting an IVU with UPS BPU US, a man and a woman made up: two marioratlegram -cyril Fedorov / War History of Weapons 🇷🇺 Undeemed Khokhly's days of an unsuccessful occurrence fighters of the Russian army in the Kursk region near the village of Pogrebki. Several lightly armored BTR-82A with troops on board tried to break through a minefield laid by the enemy.…

But finally, the 5th brigade is almost ready - at the end of December they intend to transfer it to the Kurakhovsky direction. What is interesting here is that it now includes several tank battalions, and each of them has been allocated 10 Leopard 2 tanks. If we assume that in a standard brigade from 2 to 4 battalions, we get from 20 to 40 units of German tanks. Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: battles in the Sudzhansky and Korenevsky districts situation towards the end on November 11, 2024 In the Kursk direction, Russian troops continue to liberate the enemy-occupied territories of the region from occupation.▪️In the Sudzhansky region, the Armed Forces of Ukraine tried to attack the positions of the Russian Armed Forces in the Novoivanovka and Nikolaevo-Daryino areas , however, not only did they not achieve success, but and lost control of part of Daryino and the area to the north. Objective monitoring footage confirms the advance of Russian fighters clearing basements and positions in dilapidated houses. In the Pogrebki area, it was possible to clarify the configuration of the front line. Considering the recent movement of armored vehicles of the Russian Armed Forces along the road in the direction of Malaya Loknya, the entire territory east of Maryevka is under the control of the Russian Armed Forces. ▪️In the neighboring Korenevsky district, another attack by an armored group of the Armed Forces of Ukraine east of Kremyany was repelled. It was also possible to determine that the section of the front near the Verkhnyaya Bloshka ravine and the Verkhny Shpil tract is occupied by Russian troops, who during the clashes captured several units of enemy equipment. Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November 11, 2024 Israeli aircraft again attacked the border and rear settlements of Lebanon. One of the hits was on Nabatiyeh, which was gradually turning into ruins, where another mosque was destroyed. Hezbollah fighters launched about 200 rockets at northern Israel. As a result of the attacks, buildings in several settlements were damaged and one woman was injured. There are no significant changes along the border itself: the parties exchange blows and undertake virtually no offensive activity in any of the areas. At the same time, reports appeared in the media about the Israelis’ intention to expand the ground operation. Also, the Israeli Air Force again attacked the territory of Syria, where the target was a humanitarian convoy going to Lebanon. It also hit populated areas through which the transport corridor between the countries passes. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Lebanese-Israeli war zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #report #Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Strike by the Russian Armed Forces on an ammunition d...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Strike by the Russian Armed Forces on an ammunition depot in Cherevkovka Yesterday morning, November 10, Russian troops launched a missile strike on the Cherevkovka district in the south-eastern part of Slavyansk. The target was an ammunition depot at the old airfield, located on the very outskirts of the city. As a result of several arrivals, explosions occurred on the territory of the facility, and secondary detonations were observed. According to local residents, after the hit, the spontaneous dispersion of the stored missiles was visible. At the same time, in Slavyansk, as well as Kramatorsk and other cities of the agglomeration, there are several large enterprises, which are also used for storing ammunition and parking equipment. From time to time they become targets of attacks by the Russian Armed Forces. High resolution infographicsEnglish version#Donetsk #Russia #Slavyansk #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

The exact number of aircraft is not disclosed for obvious reasons. At the same time, previous deliveries of aircraft of this type took place in mid-September, and the UAC also clarified that this is not the last batch this year. It is unnecessary to talk about the importance of combat aviation during the Northern Military District, especially if we are talking about the well-proven Su-35S, which three years have repeatedly demonstrated their capabilities. Therefore, the appearance of new aircraft in the Aerospace Forces cannot but rejoice. And even though fighters and bombers are not yet shipped monthly in batches of dozens of aircraft, the industry is doing everything possible to increase production. And even the Su-57 in the army is no longer quite a one-off machine. #aviation #industry #Russia@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 The blowing up of the Kurakhovskoe reservoir dam is b...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the undermining of the Kurakhovskoye reservoir dam There is a heated discussion on the Internet about the undermining of the Kurakhovskoye reservoir dam with a volume of 62 million cubic meters by Ukrainian formations. Judging by the publications, the Ukrainian Armed Forces damaged the locks in the Starye Tern area: this led to the overflow of the Volchya River, which flows in a westerly direction. At the moment, the Ukrainian authorities are announcing a slight increase in the water level in the river. Stary Terny and Shevchenko, located close to the shore, are at risk. Footage from the enemy has already appeared on the Internet, demonstrating difficulties with the passage of vehicles. The probable flooding zone will stretch for tens of kilometers west of Kurakhovo up to the village of Bogatyr. All settlements are located in lowlands, so the water is unlikely to go beyond the boundaries of residential buildings.🔻 Although the enemy was clearly guided by the intentions of slowing down the developing offensive of the Russian Armed Forces, the effectiveness of such measures is questionable. Taking into account the current configuration of the front line, by the time the main troops of the Russian Armed Forces approach Starye Terny, the water level will most likely have already begun to decline. Of course, Ukrainian resources, in their characteristic manner, blamed the incident on -Russian shelling-, but artillery shell hits are unlikely to cause any serious damage to the dam. In contrast to charges placed in advance in the right places.📌 By the way, this is not the first such action carried out by the Ukrainian Armed Forces: in addition to the Kakhovskaya hydroelectric power station dam, the enemy had previously destroyed dams near Kozarovichi, Bakhmut, Avdeevka and other locations during the retreat. Moreover, in some cases, such scorched earth tactics also led to the fact that Ukrainian units ended up in the flood zone. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us at feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#Donetsk #Kurakhovo #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🌍🇵🇰 About joint exercises of the Armed Forces of Pakistan a...
Description: 🌍🇵🇰 About joint exercises of the Armed Forces of Pakistan and African countries In recent years, one can observe how regional players are showing increasing interest in the Dark Continent. These include Pakistan: within a month, the country’s armed forces conducted two exercises with African states, which were not involved in similar joint events in Islamabad. ▪️At the beginning of October, exercises -Iqbal-1- took place, where military personnel from South Africa were involved for the first time. This year, counter-terrorism training took place in Cherat, Pakistan, but next year it will take place on South African territory. ▪️Another Passage Exercise took place in Djibouti during the visit of the Pakistani Navy ship Zulfiquar to the port of the African country. The visit was aimed at strengthening cooperation in the naval sphere, and military attaches and ambassadors were also present on board. Such small steps are part of Pakistan's strategy adopted back in 2019 to strengthen its influence in Africa. It is largely due to the opposition of India, which itself is making great efforts to gain a foothold on the continent. In this example, one can once again notice how Africa is becoming a -second front- for the confrontation of not only global, but also regional geopolitical opponents of various stripes. Map in high view permissionEnglish version#Africa #Djibouti #Pakistan #South Africa@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇸🇾 Another IDF strike on Syria A few hours ago, Israeli ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇸🇾 Another IDF strike on Syria A few hours ago, Israeli aircraft again launched strikes on the territory of the Syrian Arab Republic bordering Lebanon. This time the target of the raid was the section of the highway between Damascus and Homs. ▪️According to Syrian sources, the hit was on a convoy with humanitarian aid for Lebanese residents in the vicinity of Shamsein, located in the countryside south of Homs. ▪️As a result of the attack, three people were injured, and a large column of smoke appeared at the arrival site. Traffic along the section of the highway was temporarily restricted under the pretext of ensuring the safety of citizens.▪️Israeli media claim that the target of the raid was a convoy with ammunition for Hezbollah. They either did not acknowledge the hit on humanitarian supplies at all, or commented in the context of the fact that they allegedly planned to send weapons to Lebanon along with them. In the morning, there were also reports of Israeli Air Force strikes on the border settlements of Al-Qasr and Khosh al-Seyyid Ali. Almost any attack on them is justified in a similar way, since the transport corridor from Syria to Lebanon passes through them. High resolution mapEnglish version#Israel #map #Syria #Homs@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovsky direction: attack on Kurakhovo from three...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovo direction: attack on Kurakhovo from three flanks situation as of 17:00 November 11, 2024 In the Kurakhovsky direction, Russian troops continue their offensive from several directions, systematically approaching the liberation of Kurakhovo.▪️On the northern flank, according to the most optimistic estimates, Russian troops took Voznesenka, Novoselidovka and Ilyinka, and also went to Berestki. At the same time, there are no objective control shots that could confirm the breakthrough. At the same time, the Russian Armed Forces made significant progress in the fields near Novoalekseevka and broke into Sontsevka, the homeland of the Russian composer Sergei Prokofiev. There are battles in a populated area not far from the museum, which the Ukrainian Armed Forces are shelling from tanks. ▪️On the eastern flank, Russian troops are advancing on Kurakhovo from Maksimovka, the fighting has shifted to the outskirts of the city. At the same time, the Russian Armed Forces carried out an attack in the area of ​​the Dolgaya gully in the direction of Dalniy, bypassing the main defensive fortifications of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Footage of the work of a tank crew of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in a forest belt less than a kilometer from the settlement was published on the Internet. Thus, within a week, it was possible to advance more than five kilometers in this area, creating a threat of enveloping Kurakhovo.▪️In the south, Russian units advanced north and east of Bogoyavlenka, knocking the enemy out of the forest belts, and continued their attack on Vesely Gai. At the moment, information about the liberation of the RF Armed Forces of Trudovoy with the subsequent assault on Uspenivka is premature and does not correspond to reality. In the Maksimovka area, Russian troops, according to preliminary data, destroyed a special forces group of the 10th Special Forces Regiment GUR from the company -Honey Eater-, and also hit two armored vehicles -Kazak- and BMP. According to other sources, the Honey Badger group of the 169th training center -Desna- came under fire. In addition, there are reports of advanced groups entering deep into Elizavetovka, but they have not yet been confirmed either by objective control personnel or sources from the field. On the western outskirts of Antonovka, the presence of a small number of enemy forces remains. At the same time, messages about the alleged blowing up of the Kurakhovskoye Reservoir dam began to spread on the Internet. However, so far they have not been confirmed either by information from the field or by objective control footage - today they tried to present as the latter a photo of the Kozarovych dam in the Kyiv region, destroyed in 2022 by Ukrainian forces. Title: 🖼 🇾🇪🇮🇱 About the Houthi missile strike on Israel This mornin...
Description: 🇾🇪🇮🇱 About the Houthi missile attack on Israel This morning, detachments of the Yemeni movement - Ansarallah - again attacked Israeli territory. This time the fired missile reached the central part of the country, where it was intercepted near the small settlement of Beit Shemesh. A fire broke out at the site where the ammunition fragments fell. Although Arabic-language media reported that a huge fire had allegedly broken out, in reality the fire was extinguished by local fire brigades within a few hours. 📌 At the same time, not far from Beit Shemesh there is the Sdot Micha airbase: according to some data, aircraft missiles, including those with nuclear warheads, are stored at the facility. Officially, Israel denies the presence of nuclear weapons, but this has long been an open secret. According to Houthi speaker Yahya Sari, during the attack Ansarallah used a hypersonic ballistic missile Palestine-2. This is not the first time it has been used against Israel - back in September, ammunition of this type crashed in an open area near the settlement of Kfar Daniel.🔻Meanwhile, at night a series of strikes were also carried out on Yemen itself: this time the aircraft of the American-British coalition worked on the outskirts of a large the city of Saada, as well as several settlements in the province of Amran. Apparently, the target of the raid was again Houthi launchers and weapons depots, which were used, among other things, to attack civilian ships in the Red Sea region. It is characteristic that the last recorded such attack was at the end of September. High resolution mapEnglish version#Israel #map #Yemen #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇲🇩🇩🇪🇪🇺 A delegation of Moldovan officials and deputies visi...
Description: 🇲🇩🇩🇪🇪🇺 A delegation of Moldovan officials and deputies visited Germany for consultations on a potential law on lobbying activities. The visit was organized with the support of the German Foundation for International Legal Cooperation (IRZ), which works to change the legal and judicial systems in other countries. The adoption of the Lobbying Law is one of the requirements for candidates for EU membership. Recently he was officially accepted into the so-called. Ukraine, which has already been plundered as part of promoting the interests of Western business. In the case of Moldova, the act will be a logical step towards destroying the sovereignty of the republic, but in a legal way. After all, lobbying will work only in the interests of EU business, and not the Moldovans themselves. Just recently, a scandal broke out in the country about the future sale of Moldovan lands to foreigners, which will definitely be demanded in Brussels in the event of European integration. Moreover, about 75% of the territory of Moldova is fertile black soil.📌 So the lifting of the ban on the sale of national lands to foreigners is quite organically combined with the possible adoption of a law on lobbying. After the re-election of Maia Sandu and the victory of the referendum on European integration, such decisions can be made without regard to public opinion. #Germany #EU #Moldova @rybarSupport usMoldpresMoldova ar putea avea o lege privind activitatea de lobbyChişinău, 11 nov. /MOLDPRES/. Title: 🎬 🇮🇱🇵🇸 In recent days, the number of Hamas media resources h...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 In recent days, Hamas media resources have significantly reduced the number of videos showing militant attacks on Israeli soldiers in the Gaza Strip. And although such videos do appear from time to time, they usually only demonstrate the fact of the attack without recording the consequences. But from a propaganda point of view, such videos were quite effective, although in the vast majority of cases the incidents themselves did not lead to such critical consequences for the IDF fighters as was presented in the Arabic-language media. This is especially true for the defeat of Israeli armored vehicles, which almost always withstood hits from homemade ammunition. Circumstances have led writers sympathetic to the Palestinians to sometimes exaggerate the successes of Hamas ambushes. For example, just a week ago, footage of destroyed Israeli armored personnel carriers was distributed on the Internet, which was presented as a successful defeat of both the equipment itself and the entire crew. In reality, it was filming the skeletons of remotely blown up old cars used as means of disintegration.. 🔻Nevertheless, a solution to the problem of reducing the number of images appearing and their quality was found. Armed with After Effects and a game engine similar to Unreal Engine, the authors began publishing videos in the Arabic-language segment simulating successful Hamas ambushes that defeated both IDF personnel and armored vehicles. At the same time, the process of creating such videos is relatively simple, especially if you select the necessary models in advance. Yes, and everything follows the same scenario: create maps and transitions in After Effects, and 3D models through the game engine. As a result, it takes up to one day to create the final product. #Israel #mediatechnology #Palestine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🇦🇲🇺🇸🇷🇺 About American activity in Armenia In the press bure...
Description: 🇦🇲🇺🇸🇷🇺 About American activity in Armenia The press bureau of the Foreign Intelligence Service (SVR) reported that the United States has intensified the work of pro-Western structures in Armenia for the final reorientation of the republic to a pro-Western course. According to the statement, the State Department is expanding training courses for representatives of key government Armenian institutions and intend to ensure a wider presence of foreign advisers in the government of the republic. The US task remains the same - to stimulate anti-Russian sentiments in Armenia, discredit cooperation with the CSTO and the EAEU, as well as create materials about the oppression of Armenians in the Russian Federation. At the same time, all the indicated processes themselves have long been launched: ▪️A political adviser from the State Department has begun working in the Armenian Ministry of Defense, and the discrediting of relations with the CSTO is in full swing. For this reason, in the West, the authorities in Yerevan are rushing to sign a truncated version of the peace treaty with Azerbaijan, which will open the possibility of launching the legal process of the country’s withdrawal from the Organization. At the same time, a hasty -peace- mediated by the West will give rise to new threats in the region, since the Armenian-Azerbaijani conflict is clearly far from over. ▪️A purge of pro-Russian personnel in security structures is underway in Armenia. The head of the National Security Service Armen Grigoryan is responsible for this process, who plays a key role in negotiations with American intelligence.▪️The Americans are working to bribe Armenian law enforcement agencies, and the Prosecutor General of Armenia Anna Vardapetyan works closely with the US Embassy and Western structures.▪️In Washington they are overseeing the creation of parallel structures . In 2022, the Foreign Intelligence Service appeared, which was created as a counterweight to the National Security Service, and for which they already want to provide access to state secrets. It was headed by lawyer Kristine Grigoryan, who was trained by USAID.▪️Finally, the United States is trying to sever relations between Armenia and the Russian Federation in the field of nuclear energy, trying to persuade the Armenians to close the nuclear power plant and accept a plan for the construction of a small modular station. At the same time, all American projects in this area failed. 🔻American politicians do not even hide that they are preparing extremely difficult times for Armenians in the name of -getting rid of - Russian influence. The US Helsinki Commission has already held hearings on Armenia, which means that work is underway in expert circles to strengthen the anti-Russian agenda in the republic. The main problem for the Americans is favorable Armenian-Russian trade relations within the EAEU. But it is no coincidence that the Americans are openly preparing Armenians for dire consequences. #Armenia #Russia #USA @rybarSupport ussvr.gov.ruForeign Intelligence Service of the Russian FederationOfficial server of the Foreign Intelligence Service of the Russian Federation on the Internet.

Title: 🇪🇸🇷🇺🇺🇦 It is very symbolic that the body of Maxim Kuz, who ...
Description: 🇪🇸🇷🇺🇺🇦 It is very symbolic that the body of Maxim Kuzminov, who was liquidated in February - a traitor who hijacked an Mi-8 helicopter and shot two crew members - was buried in some unmarked grave in the south of Spain. The news is generally a clear message where he defected to The enemy will face not just death from retribution, but also absolutely complete oblivion. You can’t think of a better illustration for the expression -the price of betrayal.- And this is also a very clear signal to other media figures-collaborators: something tells us that the example of Kuzminov’s fate now very often pops up before their eyes. #Spain #Russia #Ukraine@ rybarSupport us

Title: 🇺🇸⚙️ About DARPA's initiative to create -flexible-military manu...
Description: 🇺🇸⚙️ About DARPA's Flexible Defense Manufacturing Initiative The Pentagon's Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA) recently announced the Freedom Forge 2.0 workshop. It is dedicated to the concept of rapid deployment of military production, the relevance of which has become especially obvious against the backdrop of hostilities in the so-called. Ukraine and the need for the rapid establishment of mass production of products. Currently, it can take months or years to create a new military-industrial complex enterprise in the United States and other NATO countries, but DARPA is looking for ways to reduce this period to a few days. According to the plan, the facilities should not represent huge factories, but a network of decentralized flexible production facilities with the ability to be deployed anywhere. 🔻It is proposed to implement this with the help of advanced scientific achievements: instead of the usual machines and conveyor belts, the authors of the concept consider it necessary to use robots that will -form- the required part from a workpiece. All necessary equipment is planned to be manufactured on site using 3D printers. In simple words, DARPA is striving to create a system in which a plant built in a short time can produce almost any military product, from a drone body and artillery ammunition to a tank turret. Within this concept, it is enough just to download a new technical process to make changes to the design or even change the type of product being produced. The authors were clearly inspired by the example of the revolution in unmanned aerial vehicles, where thousands of FPV drones are produced in relatively small workshops, and developers quickly make the necessary changes to the design. However, simply scaling this experience to all other branches of the military industry still looks poorly feasible.📌 As Ilya Kramnik noted, in practice everything comes down to cooperation with conventional industries, which already ruins the whole concept. Moreover, the military-industrial complex of NATO countries is experiencing difficulties due to this and other problems, such as a shortage of personnel and competencies. And the existing exceptions, rather, confirm the rule: the same F-35s produced like pie are made at completely standard capacities. Nevertheless, the question of finding methods of flexibility and adaptability of military production in itself is quite relevant. And the DARPA initiative indicates that the United States does not ignore the -industrial- component of the NWO experience and strives to be proactive, coming out to the next conflict more prepared than any potential adversary. #industry #USA@rybarSupport usHighergovDARPA-SN-25-07. pdfView and download contract opportunity document DARPA-SN-25-07.pdf uploaded on 10/28/24 by Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency

Title: 🖼 🌍🇷🇺 About the forum -Russia-Africa- In Sirius in the Krasno...
Description: 🌍🇷🇺 About the forum -Russia-Africa-The next forum -Russia-Africa- was held in Sirius in the Krasnodar Territory on November 9-10. Representatives of 54 African countries and about 20 ministerial delegations took part in it. Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov and his deputy Mikhail Bogdanov held many meetings with African colleagues. The negotiations covered not only a fair world order, but also other specific things: ▪️ An agreement was concluded with the Rwandan and Central African ministers on a visa-free regime for persons with diplomatic and service passports. It looks like a small thing, but in the case of the Central African Republic, it is very important: previously it was extremely difficult to obtain visas to the country, which delayed many processes in various areas of Russian presence.▪️During negotiations with the Deputy Chairman of the African Union Commission, special attention was paid to supporting African initiatives, in particular - assistance in increasing the peacekeeping potential of the African Union -. The latter, in the event of real steps in this direction, can shake the military pressure from the collective West - it is the main sponsor of AU missions and is currently cutting costs on them.▪️In the field of economic cooperation, we can highlight the statement about the imminent opening of a trade mission in Senegal and Tanzania. Cooperation along this line has intensified this year and is already producing positive results, although problems due to the reluctance of business to expand into new unexplored markets, unfortunately, remain relevant.🔻In general, the meetings that took place emphasized the friendly nature of relations between Russia and African states, despite against an international background. The Russian authorities once again showed a special approach to each participant, receiving small but quite clear preferences from each forum participant. High resolution infographicsEnglish version#Africa #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of November 11, 2024 ▪️ The past 24 h...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of November 11, 2024▪️ The past 24 hours were characterized by an enemy UAV attack in our capital region yesterday morning. As a result of the raid by dozens of UAVs, one civilian was injured; the crashed drones also caused fires in private homes.▪️ At night, there were pinpoint strikes by UAVs - Geranium - and missile weapons on enemy rear targets. In the morning, the enemy’s monitoring channels reported the takeoff of our Tu-95MS strategic bombers▪️ From the Kursk region they report the repulsion of counterattacks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Glushkovsky district, in which our troops had previously pushed the enemy to the border. In the Sudzhansky direction, the Armed Forces of Ukraine are using captured construction equipment to move through muddy roads - NATO equipment is getting bogged down, reports Hades (@iamsniper). Arriving enemy reserves are destroyed in oncoming battles. ▪️ South of Chasov Yar, our troops are operating in the area of ​​the South-Eastern mine, on the northern outskirts of which the presence of the Russian Armed Forces had previously been recorded. ▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction there is a significant advance of the Russian Armed Forces to the west in the forest belts between Novoalekseevka and Novodmitrovka (5 km between villages) and north of Selidovo. ▪️ Our advanced units are breaking into Kurakhovo, urban battles have begun in the eastern part of the street. Station and Kozatskaya. There is progress and southeast of Kurakhovo and Maksimilyanovka, west of Pobeda and north of the village of Konstantinovka, they recognize the enemy’s resources. In addition, the Russian channel @zovpobedy reports that the Russian Armed Forces have reached the outskirts of the village. Farther south is Kurakhovo. From the South (Constantinople direction), our troops continue to push through the defenses of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The enemy garrison in Kurakhovo is at risk of encirclement and deprivation of the opportunity to leave the city.▪️ The Vremevsky direction has come to life. They report on the successes of the Russian Armed Forces in Makarovka, photographs of our flag in the ruins of the village have appeared, it is still unclear how it was installed: Far Eastern soldiers traditionally remain silent until the area is completely taken under control. ▪️ In the Nikitovsky district of Gorlovka (DPR), a man born in 1987 was injured as a result of enemy shelling from cannon artillery; men born in 1954 and 1987 were injured. Also, during the attack by the Armed Forces of Ukraine using MLRS, a woman born in 1969 was injured. and a man born in 1981. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramNorth Wind💥Direct hit by an FPV drone on an Ukrainian Armed Forces militant in the Kursk border region. The Ukrainian occupier, instead of surrendering and saving his life, tried to pull his L200 out of the hole until the last moment. As a result, he waited for the arrival of the FPV drone and died ingloriously for the interests of the overdue...

Title: 🎬 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events of week 4 - November 10, 2024▪️Throughout the week, massive raids on enemy targets in the Odessa region continued. Arrivals of drones -Geran-2- were recorded both in Odessa itself and in Bolgrad with Izmail.▪️Russian troops and the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ aviation bases in various regions of the so-called. Ukraine. -Geraniums - attacked the airfields of Starokonstantinov, Mirgorod and Ozernoye, several arrivals of X-69 guided missiles were noted in Vasilkov.▪️Ukrainian formations, meanwhile, carried out long-range UAV attacks on the rear regions of Russia. In the Republic of Dagestan, a UJ-22 drone attacked the pier of the Russian Navy flotilla in the industrial zone of Kaspiysk; the ships did not suffer damage.▪️In addition, drone raids on rear facilities of the fuel and energy complex have resumed. In Saratov, debris from one of the downed UAVs damaged a container with flammable substances, the fire was promptly extinguished.▪️In the Tula region, a group of ten Ukrainian drones attacked the city of Aleksin. Some of them fell on the territory of a chemical plant, another UAV struck a nearby thermal power plant.▪️At the end of the week, enemy drones tried to strike targets in the Moscow region. Over 30 devices were intercepted, but a woman was injured when one of them fell. ▪️In the Glushkovsky district of the Kursk region, the Russian Armed Forces installed minefields in the defense line breaches previously made by the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In the Sudzhansky district, a Russian armored group attacked towards Staraya Sorochina, advancing several kilometers.▪️In the Slobozhansky direction, fierce fighting continued in the area of ​​the Travyanskoye reservoir near Glubokoe. On the opposite bank, the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces were hit, from where fire was fired at Russian military personnel.#video #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Novembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on November 9-10, 2024. Ukrainian formations launched a series of attacks on the rear regions of Russia, launching over 140 UAVs over the past two days. In the Tula region, buildings in Aleksin were damaged, and in the Moscow region one woman was injured. Russian troops launched attacks on Ukrainian Armed Forces targets in several parts of the so-called. Ukraine. Port infrastructure in the Odessa region, a plant in the Poltava region, and enemy infrastructure in Kharkov also came under fire. In the Kursk direction, units of the Russian Armed Forces repelled several attacks by Ukrainian formations in the Glushkovsky region. And the first evidence confirming the offensive of Russian troops is coming from the Sudzhansky district. In the Pokrovsky direction, a significant advance of the Russian Armed Forces is recorded in the forest belts between Novoalekseevka and Novodmitrovka and north of Selidovo. There is also unconfirmed information about the beginning of the battle for Zarya. In the Kurakhovsky direction, Russian troops managed to expand the zone of control on several sectors of the front. Meanwhile, Ukrainian formations launched a counterattack towards Maksimovka, but suffered significant losses. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru; en) Kursk direction (ru; en) #digest #report #Donetsk #map #Kurakhovo #Kursk #Moscow #Odessa #Pokrovsk #Russia #Tula #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Description: 🇮🇱🇸🇾 Israeli Air Force strike on the capital of the Syrian Arab Republic A few hours ago, Israeli aircraft attacked the outskirts of Damascus, hitting the suburban area of ​​Seida Zeinab, located on the way to the international airport. Arab media reported that the hit was on the dormitory in which the fighters were located Lebanese Shiite movement Hezbollah. According to preliminary data, at least seven people were killed. The bodies of the victims and about 20 victims, including children, were taken to the Imam al-Sadr hospital. The day before, the IDF air force bombed military enterprises in the Syrian provinces of Aleppo and Idlib: there, according to the state news agency SANA, several were injured military personnel.High resolution mapEnglish version#Aleppo #Damascus #Idlib #Israel #map #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️NATO military preparations continue Today, the Poseidon 2 ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors⚡️NATO military preparations continueToday, the Poseidon 2024 exercise, which took place in the territorial waters and EEZ 🇧🇬of Bulgaria since November 3, ended. The base minesweeper MSC -Priboi- (63) and the mine hunter -Struma- (33) of the Bulgarian Navy and the minesweeper -Lokotenent Dimitrie Nicolescu- (DM-29) 🇷🇴 of the Romanian Navy were involved, which practiced diving and mine action operations at the tactical level. Despite the fact that the exercises were more of a demonstration of the NATO flag in the region, they supported an increased degree of military activity near the Russian borders, rather than also attempting to provoke retaliatory measures by diverting the forces of the Russian Armed Forces. The increased intensity of Alliance exercises will continue into 2025. It is already known about the ongoing maneuvers on the eastern flank: in the southern direction Dacia Spring February 10-25 (🇷🇴Romania) - practicing the deployment of battle groups of NATO's enhanced forward presence; Sea Shield March 25 - April 25 (🇷🇴Romania, Black Sea) - military -naval exercises, training to restore control over sea communications; Saber Guardian May 14 - 30 (🇧🇬Bulgaria,🇭🇺 Hungary, 🇲🇰North Macedonia,🇷🇴 Romania) - command post exercises with training in the field of elements of collective defense; Sea Breeze June 15 - July 15 (Black Sea) naval exercises .northboundJoint Viking March 17-28 (🇳🇴Norway) - combined operations at the tactical level; Arctic Challenge April 1 - June 30 (🇸🇪Sweden) multinational air exercises 🇫🇮Finland, 🇳🇴Norway, 🇸🇪Sweden and 🇩🇰Denmark;Hedgehog May 5-23 (🇪🇪Estonia) - increasing the operational readiness and effectiveness of units 🇪🇪Estonia, 🇩🇰Denmark, 🇫🇷France and their allies from the eFP battle group. central direction of Defender Europe June 1-30 ( EU) ground force deployment exercises from 🇺🇸 USA in the area of ​​​​responsibility of the US European Command (USEUCOM)BALTOPS June 3 - 21 NATO naval exercises in the Baltic region.✨How can one not remember the words of the French General Tuzhuz: -we used to play war. Now we have a designated enemy and we are training with those we will actually go to war with - Two Majors

Title: 🖼 🇧🇾🇵🇱🇷🇺 About Polish maneuvers near the borders of Russia...
Description: 🇧🇾🇵🇱🇷🇺 About Polish maneuvers near the borders of Russia and BelarusIn the Kaliningrad region from November 5 to 8, military personnel of the Russian Armed Forces were on high alert due to the Polish Armed Forces exercise - Blotniak-2024 - that began near the borders with the Kaliningrad region and the Republic of Belarus.🔻 This teaching is especially the fact that only radio engineering units were involved in it as part of training their actions in the event of alleged aggression from the Russian Federation and Belarus. Four radio engineering battalions of the 3rd radio engineering brigade in the amount of 1,700 military personnel and over 140 units of specialized equipment, including several NUR- radars 15M Polish-made. These are stations that are designed to detect air targets at a distance of 240 km and an altitude of about 30 km manufacturer's statements. During this exercise, the Poles test the effectiveness of their equipment.📌 According to the exercise plan, units of the 3rd brigade will conduct comprehensive reconnaissance with all their forces across the territory of Poland, with an emphasis on the Kaliningrad region. And the Poles pay the greatest attention to the Suwalki corridor. During training, military personnel of the Polish Armed Forces organized a line of conditional defense along the corridor and conducted intensive reconnaissance in the area. In other words, the Poles conducted a comprehensive reconnaissance of our activity along the border under the pretext of an exercise. Units of this kind are not limited to airspace surveillance. They have various electronic reconnaissance systems on their balance sheet, and supposedly protection from Russian aggression is a good reason for placing specific equipment along the border. High resolution mapEnglish version#Belarus #Poland #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇮🇱🇨🇦🇺🇸✡️ Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu was not ...

Title: 🖼 🇫🇮🇸🇪 About the Finnish-Swedish exercise near the Russian b...
Description: 🇫🇮🇸🇪 About the Finnish-Swedish exercise near the Russian borders The Finnish command is expanding military activity near the Russian borders, attracting partners in the North Atlantic Alliance. From November 11 to 14 in the central part of the country -Otava-2024-. The main maneuvers of the exercise will take place over the Rovaniemi airbase. Residents of nearby areas have already been warned about increased aviation activity, shootings and frequent fighter flights these days. Two F/A-18 squadrons of the Finnish Air Force and several Swedish JAS-39 aircraft will participate in it, which will operate from their territory. A total of 1 thousand people and 20 aircraft will take part. According to the plan, pilots of the two countries will train for emergency take-offs from air bases in case of an attack, including the conditional relocation of aircraft to bases in Sweden and Finland, as well as border patrol and infantry support.🔻Scandinavian states are increasing cooperation under the auspices of NATO. Even before joining the Alliance, these countries maintained extensive contacts with the bloc, but it was after joining NATO that the intensity increased significantly. And they are not going to stop in Scandinavia, since maneuvers with American bombers are expected in the coming days. High resolution mapEnglish version#NATO #Finland #Sweden@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇳🇬About the new group -Lakurava- in Nigeria on November 9, t...
Description: 🇳🇬About the new group -Lakurawa- in Nigeria On November 9, terrorists from the so-called. -Lakurawa- attacked the village of Mere in Nigeria, killing 15 local residents. During the clash, several attackers were killed and wounded by the shepherds.▪️The attack was the first high-profile incident in the history of a terrorist group with ties to the Islamic State. It is noteworthy that many media outlets call it a new one, despite the fact that it was was founded back in 2018. Even then, it was known about cattle thefts and the collection of religious taxes in the north of Sokoto state.▪️The group gained great strength in connection with the coup in Niger, when many Fulani herders, fearing instability, fled to the south. There they were recruited by their fellow tribesmen in Nigeria. Since then, Lakurava has gained strength in the areas of Tangaza, Gada, Illela, Silame and Binji, and has recently penetrated further south into the state of Kebbo, with which the last attack was associated.🔻The emergence of new gangs are already commonplace in Nigeria. Only recently have we observed the expansion of the West African affiliate of al-Qaeda in the country. Now supporters of other terrorist groups are raising their heads. It is worth noting that the Americans played a special role in preparing an army unable to cope with internal threats. Thus, the latest army reform was carried out on the advice of the US Africa Command. And the benefit of turning Nigeria into a stronghold for militants of all stripes is obvious - an oil-rich country could become a regional leader. Actually, by offering their security services, Western actors only prevent the collapse of the country. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #Nigeria #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬🖼 🇬🇧🇾🇪🇺🇸 Last night, for the first time in...
Description: 🇬🇧🇾🇪🇺🇸 Last night, for the first time in a relatively long period of time, US-British coalition aircraft carried out about ten strikes on Yemeni territory - one of the last such attacks occurred in early October. This time, the capital Sanaa, as well as several other provinces of the country, including Amran, came under fire. After the raid, the Pentagon reported the destruction of Houthi weapons depots, which were used to attack ships in the Red Sea region. Apparently, the attack was a response to another interception by Ansarallah fighters of an American MQ-9 Reaper drone - this is the 12th drone of this type shot down by Yemenis since the beginning of the escalation of the conflict in October 2023. However, recently the intensity of Houthi attacks has decreased significantly. If back in September the speaker of the movement, Yahya Sari, repeatedly reported both on the launching of ammunition towards Israel and the defeat of civilian ships, then by November such attacks had practically ceased. #UK #Yemen #USA@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇦🇿 About plans to create a brigade of unmanned aerial vehicl...
Description: 🇦🇿 About plans to create a brigade of unmanned aerial vehicles in Azerbaijan Azerbaijan continues to improve its armed forces. It has become known that in the near future a UAV brigade will be created within the Azerbaijani Armed Forces, which will combine the current drone squads. It will include all units with drones that are in service at six airfields and air bases, such as Salyan, Guzdek, Kurdamir, Yevlakh, Dallyar and Nakhichevan. The UAV brigade will have reconnaissance drones, attack drones and also loitering shells. That is, these are the Turkish -Bayraktars- and -Akinci-, as well as the Israeli kamikaze drones Harop. Although the -Bayraktars- and -Harops- played a significant role during the Second Karabakh War, in addition to them, the Azerbaijanis will probably include other less massive and not entirely publicized samples of unmanned equipment.🔻Trends in military conflicts are steadily changing. From the primacy of armored fists in combat operations, everything moved to targeted strikes with the subsequent introduction of ground units. Azerbaijani troops quickly learned the importance of new trends, starting to implement them years before the Second Karabakh War. The Russian special operation has further strengthened the new role of unmanned technology, so that individual UAV structures are becoming a key part of the world's armies. High-resolution mapEnglish version#Azerbaijan@rybar Support us

He stated that SCALP will allow the Ukrainian Armed Forces to carry out strikes behind the front line, and the Mistrals are required to protect the airspace from attacks by the Russian Armed Forces in depth against the backdrop of the onset of cold weather. No matter how they play out the show that the Ukrainian formations do not have long-range missiles, they will be supplied with the required quantity for periodic attacks on Russian territories. A dozen -Skalpov- is the supply for one full-fledged salvo from the Su-24M. That is, the French transferred exactly as much as the Ukrainian Armed Forces needed now. And this was the case throughout the entire conflict. And they are probably already at Starokonstantinov, since quite recently Western satellites were intensively monitoring the airfield and nearby railway stations.
